product.product_body: For cleaning and degreasing during maintenance and repair work. Fast flash-off behaviour and excellent cleaning performance. • Fast, effective removal of soot, grease, brake dust and oily residues. • Cleans without leaving residue Acetone free High material compatibility with paints, plastics, seals and rubber AOX-free and silicone-free

product.title: Würth Masking Tape low bake 38mm x 50m
product.product_body: High temperature, low bake masking tape for use in vehicle spray booths, up to 80°C. Automotive, household and commercial brush painting, Masking of curves and angles, Attaching of masking paper. Instructions of use: •To assure residue-free removal, the tape must be removed immediately after drying of the paint or enamel •The masking tape is not UV-resistant and therefore not suitable for outdoor applications

features.feature: The tape is very well suited to painting work which requires baking.
Very good adhesion on all smooth surfaces in automotive, household and commercial brush painting applications, e.g. painted metal, glass, chrome-plated parts or rubber
This tape can be removed immediately after painting without leaving any residue
Moisture and solvent resistant, The tape is suitable for all painting work with all commonly available water, solvent and enamel based systems. Very well suited for wet sanding.

product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Die Cut Star 150 Sheets
product.product_body: Product DescriptionPost-it Super Sticky Notes stick around as long as you need them to. Perfect for vertical and hard-to-stick-to surfaces, they are super-strong, super-adhesive, super-versatile - and super-stand-out. With a range of sizes and bright colours they really get your messages noticed.These notes feature a strong but repositionable adhesive - they can cling to both smooth and rough surfaces and stick for longer on walls, doors, mirrors and fridges. The adhesive won't leave marks on your walls or pages, so you can stick them wherever they’ll be noticed to keep your family, colleagues … and yourself organised!This pack contains 2 pads of star-shaped Post-it Super Sticky Notes – 1 x yellow pad and 1 x orange pad. Each pad contains 75 sheets measuring 73mm x 71mm - the perfect size for a quick reminder! Do your kids forget their lunchboxes or sports kit every morning? Why not leave them a message on the inside of the front door so they see it before they leave the house? Will your husband remember to pick up his dry cleaning on the way home? Stick a note on his laptop or briefcase so he’s got no excuse! The star shape adds a bit of fun and will really catch their attention.For messages that really stick, get organised with Super Sticky Post-it Notes!Box Contains2 star-shaped pads of Post-it Notes, each containing 75 sheets

product.title: 3MTM Fine Line Masking Tape Blue, 6 mm x 32.9 m Roll
product.product_body: A highly flexible Fine Line Masking Tape with excellent adhesion to plastic and rubber mouldings. Specially adapted for masking narrow curves, rivets and other surface details

features.feature: Uniquely constructed, vinyl backed tape gives outstanding paint line definition
Suitable up to 70 degrees celsius
Excellent adhesion to plastic and rubber mouldings
Excellent for masking narrow curves and rivets

product.product_body: Strong scouring power - more durable than conventional pads Low scratch - ideal for glassware and other delicate surfaces Multipurpose sponge for wiping surfaces and cleaning spills and scouring surface for removing encrusted food residues The 3M 2020 Nailsaver Low Scratch Sponge Scourer is suitable for general purpose cleaning. It comes in purple.

Low scratch - ideal for glassware and other delicate surfaces
Multipurpose sponge for wiping surfaces and cleaning spills and scouring surface for removing encrusted food residues

product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Notes Star Shape Cube (144)
product.product_body: Personalise your messages and make them really stand out from the crowd with our bright and cheerful star-shaped Post-it® Notes. With enough space for a short note, phone message or even a drawing, they're the tried and tested way to communicate with friends, family, colleagues - or yourself! In a vibrant blue and yellow design these notes will really make your messages stand out - perfect for important reminders around your workspace; and a great tool for teachers and parents who want to make learning that little bit more fun! The Post-it® Super Sticky Adhesive holds stronger and longer - even on vertical and rough surfaces - but removes cleanly without leaving marks on walls or pages. With Post-it® Super Sticky Notes you can be sure that your message will stick, for as long as you need it to! Each pack contains 2 pads, 1 yellow and 1 blue star-shaped paper note pad, each backed with a strip of Post-it® Super Sticky Adhesive. Each note measures approximately 73mm x 73mm. Also available as a pink heart-shaped pad, our range of fun and funky Post-it® Notes make great gifts for friends, family, teachers and colleagues.

features.feature: Star-shaped notes made from cheerful, patterned paper
Post-it® super sticky adhesive holds stronger and longer
Great for vertical surfaces
Bright neon yellow and orange to make your messages really stand out
2x 75 sheets. Each sheet measures approx. 73 mm x 73 mm

product.title: 3MTM Microfibre Detailing Cloth, 1 Per Pack (39016) (1)
product.product_body: The 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth made from super soft, non-linting microfibre that quickly and effectively removes wax residue, finger marks and even light scratches from vehicle bodywork. Easy to use, it does the hard work for you and makes completing those finishing touches a breeze and is also great with 3MTM Glass Cleaner. As with all of our products, we pride ourselves on the incredibly high quality of the 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth. Designed to be durable, hardworking and long lasting, it offers excellent value for money and comes highly recommended by automotive professionals and customers who have used it at home. If you only have one detailing cloth in your collection, this is definitely the one to choose. The 3M Microfibre Detailing Cloth performs well with all of the cleaning products in the 3M Car Care Range and is the ideal accessory for cleaning, polishing and dusting inside and out. Its super soft construction won't scratch surfaces but as with any detailing cloth, be careful to use it only on clean surfaces and shake it out regularly. Any particles that it picks up could cause scratches. Step by Step 1. Fold cloth into quarters to create a flat uniform surface. Wipe surface to remove any residue and buff to a high shine with a clean section of the cloth 2. Unfold and refold the cloth frequently to expose a clean surface in order to avoid scratching by particles which may have been picked up by the cloth 3. Because of the Detail Cloth's superior dust and dirt lifting and trapping properties, frequent washing is recommended. The cloth is hot water, chlorine bleach and dryer safe. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m32pwiKv80Q

features.feature: Super soft, non-linting microfibre cloth
Easily removes wax residue and finger marks
Ideal for paintwork, chrome, glass, dashboards, and more
Works with all products in the 3M car care range

product.title: Scotch Pouch Tape 8240, 5 in x 6 in, 500 pouches per roll (Pack of 1) by 3M Office Products
3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion
product.product_body: Ultrathon Lotion provides long lasting protection from biting insects via advanced 3M Time Release Technology, with up to 12 hour protection against mosquitoes from one application. Recommended by Ray Mears, the TV expert on bushcraft and survival, this insect repellent lotion will ensure you and your family have a high level of protection both for holidays to tropical climates and for breaks and outdoor trips closer to home. This is also the product of choice for the UK Armed Forces. Ultrathon Lotion comes in a 60 ml tube and contains 34% DEET. The Ultrathon formula contains 3M Time Release Technology, meaning the DEET is released slowly, over a longer period of time compared to conventional products. One benefit of a lower DEET content is that the product is also suitable in lower risk environments; another is a more pleasant odour for the user, since the DEET smell is not so strong. The Ultrathon formulation is also splash and sweat resistant, affording long lasting protection even when you are active, against a range of biting insects--including mosquitoes, midges, ticks, fleas, gnats and biting flies.

features.feature: 3M Ultrathon

product.title: 15m White Reflektif® Reflective Curtain Grade Tape (ECE 104) - Solid Style
product.product_body: Reflective tape for use on Lorry's, trucks, vans, cars, trailers, caravans and motor homes etc. it could also be used on motor bikes, cycles, invalid cars and even wheelchairs. Basically any rigid area on a vehicle (not for use on fabric curtains on trucks etc). Tape can easily be applied to the vehicle, instructions are supplied, once correctly applied you can power wash the car, van, truck, caravan etc without the risk of the tape coming off, and their is no need to specially the treat the tape for this to work, simply clean the surface of the vehicle, remove the backing paper and stick it on! Vehicle, trailer or caravan will be a lot more visible in the dark or fog with the tape applied, you can expect to see the tape reflect at over 1km away. Ideal for marking the rear of the vehicle as well as the sides, important when pulling out onto a road etc, allowing oncoming traffic to see that you are across their lane. this reflective tape is slowly becoming law on certain vehicles and in certain countries in Europe, there is information below regarding Heavy goods vehicles and directive ECE104, but there are other requirements like caravans to have reflective tape in Spain (event if you are a foreign visitor). Our tape is fully ECE 104 compliant and you can buy safe in the knowledge that it meets the required standards. Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear.

features.feature: Approved to ECE 104 Class C. Outstanding long distance night-time visibility
No edge sealing necessary Resistant to power washing
Easy to cut with scissors - Full installation instructions provided
3 Year Warranty - 50mm squares
Trucks, vans, trailers, and other curtain sided vehicles

product.title: Yellow Reflexite Reflective Vehicle Tape (ECE 104) 1 Metre Long 50mm Wide
product.product_body: Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear. Amendments to the UK Road Vehicles Lighting Regulations 1989 (RVLR) The Department for Transport has made a commitment to align RVLR with UNECE Regulation 48 and require conspicuity marking material to be fitted to new heavy goods vehicles and their trailers from 10 July 2011. DfT has completed amendments to the Road Vehicles Lighting Regulations 1989 which entered into force on 4 January 2010, detailing the requirements for conspicuity markings including optionally-fitted markings. Rear marker plates which have been mandatory on certain vehicles and trailers for some time in the UK are intended to serve the same function as conspicuity marking material, so DfT has made the decision not to mandate both. Optionally-fitted conspicuity markings. The amendments allow vehicles to be fitted with optional conspicuity markings, but where fitted they are required to conform to the relevant ECE Regulation 48 requirements. If compliant conspicuity markings are optionally-fitted to vehicles, then there is no requirement to fit rear marker plates to vehicles. However, the optional use of rear marking plates in addition to conspicuity markings will continue to be permitted. The RVLR have also being updated to require rear marker plates, when fitted optionally from the mandatory conspicuity marking implementation date of 10 July 2011, to comply with the latest technical specifications set out in UN ECE Regulation 70.01. This aligns with the latest requirements in UN ECE Regulation 48.

product.title: Yellow Reflexite Reflective Vehicle Tape (ECE 104) 50 Metres Long 50mm Wide
product.product_body: Reflective tape for use on Lorry's, trucks, vans, cars, trailers, caravans and motor homes etc. it could also be used on motor bikes, cycles, invalid cars and even wheelchairs. Basically any rigid area on a vehicle (not for use on fabric curtains on trucks etc). Tape can easily be applied to the vehicle, instructions are supplied, once correctly applied you can power wash the car, van, truck, caravan etc without the risk of the tape coming off, and their is no need to specially the treat the tape for this to work, simply clean the surface of the vehicle, remove the backing paper and stick it on! Vehicle, trailer or caravan will be a lot more visible in the dark or fog with the tape applied, you can expect to see the tape reflect at over 1km away. Ideal for marking the rear of the vehicle as well as the sides, important when pulling out onto a road etc, allowing oncoming traffic to see that you are across their lane. this reflective tape is slowly becoming law on certain vehicles and in certain countries in Europe, there is information below regarding Heavy goods vehicles and directive ECE104, but there are other requirements like caravans to have reflective tape in Spain (event if you are a foreign visitor). Our tape is fully ECE 104 compliant and you can buy safe in the knowledge that it meets the required standards. Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear.

product.title: White Reflexite Reflective Vehicle Tape (ECE 104) 5 Metres Long 50mm Wide
product.product_body: Reflective tape designed for application onto vehicles and trailers (with rigid surfaces) to meet regulation ECE104. It is especially important for haulage companies who's vehicles travel into Europe as this has now become a legal requirement. You can use White or Yellow on the sides of a vehicle and yellow or red on the rear. Amendments to the UK Road Vehicles Lighting Regulations 1989 (RVLR) The Department for Transport has made a commitment to align RVLR with UNECE Regulation 48 and require conspicuity marking material to be fitted to new heavy goods vehicles and their trailers from 10 July 2011. DfT has completed amendments to the Road Vehicles Lighting Regulations 1989 which entered into force on 4 January 2010, detailing the requirements for conspicuity markings including optionally-fitted markings. Rear marker plates which have been mandatory on certain vehicles and trailers for some time in the UK are intended to serve the same function as conspicuity marking material, so DfT has made the decision not to mandate both. Optionally-fitted conspicuity markings. The amendments allow vehicles to be fitted with optional conspicuity markings, but where fitted they are required to conform to the relevant ECE Regulation 48 requirements. If compliant conspicuity markings are optionally-fitted to vehicles, then there is no requirement to fit rear marker plates to vehicles. However, the optional use of rear marking plates in addition to conspicuity markings will continue to be permitted. The RVLR have also being updated to require rear marker plates, when fitted optionally from the mandatory conspicuity marking implementation date of 10 July 2011, to comply with the latest technical specifications set out in UN ECE Regulation 70.01. This aligns with the latest requirements in UN ECE Regulation 48.

product.title: TRADITIONAL LINO PRINTING BLOCKS MOUNTED 3.2mm GREY 300x200x3.2mm (2)
product.product_body: Item Package Quantity: 2The traditional craft of Lino cutting and printing is a popular and creative educational pastime for children and adults in schools and colleges and an enjoyable creative craft at home. Lino prints well onto most papers, card and fabric giving endless creative opportunities, the opportunity to develop new skills and an appreciation of traditional printing techniques. Students can be encouraged to make their own prints, scrapbook artefacts, greeting cards, party invitations, gift labels, posters or even great works of art! Our Lino, made especially soft for block printing, is ideal for the student and master alike. Made using natural materials such as linseed oil and wood flour, our Lino is even biodegradable. Supplied in popular sizes, this is the first choice for education, hobby and professional use, achieving rapid results without specialist material or equipment. Can be used with oil and water based inks and prints on a wide range of paper, board and fabric.

Comes pre-mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks
Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.

Scotch-BriteTM Pot and Pan Brush
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The Scotch-BriteTM Pot & Pan Brush is perfect for reaching into deeper cookware to work out crusts of crumble or greasy grill left-overs. The comfort-grip handle keeps your hands out of hot water, whilst allowing you to exert pressure on burnt-on biscuit crumbs or resilient residue. It's non-scratch composition is suitable for non-stick cookware and more delicate pots, for fast and effective cleaning.

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Multi Purpose Cellulose Scourer (2)
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 2From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The versatile Scotch-BriteTM Multi-Purpose Cellulose Sponge Scourer is ideal for everyday cleaning tasks around the kitchen. Its medium-duty scouring surface is safe to use on glass, stainless steel, copper, non-stick and other delicate cookware; whilst the sponge side, made from super-absorbent cellulose, makes quick work of wiping surfaces and mopping up spills. Shaped to provide a comfortable grip, it reaches right into tight corners for a really thorough clean. The Scotch-Brite Multi-Purpose Cellulose Sponge Scourers, can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage.

features.feature: Multi-purpose non-scratch sponge scourer for a variety of kitchen tasks
Safe on glass and premium cookware including stainless steel, copper and non-stick
Super absorbent cellulose sponge makes wiping and drying surfaces quick and easy
Shaped to reach corners and narrow spaces for a thorough clean
Tough and long-lasting

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Easy Grip Scourer Non-Scratch Twin Pack (2)
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 2From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. When you have everyday chores around the kitchen, these all-purpose Scotch-BriteTM Non-Stick Sponge Scourers will allow you to clean quickly and efficiently, up to 50% faster than similar sponge scourers. The medium-duty scouring surface is safe to use on glass, plastic, stainless steel, copper and non-stick cookware and is comfortable to hold thanks to its easy-grip sponge backing. Once you've powered through the washing up, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. This scourer is suitable for use on most household surfaces, however you should exercise caution with extremely delicate, highly polished or painted surfaces as these may scratch. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Easy Grip Non Scratch Sponge Scourers, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water.

features.feature: Easy-grip sponge scourers for a variety of kitchen tasks

Safe on glass and premium cookware including stainless steel, copper and non-stick
Each pack has 2 sponge scourers
Ideal for everyday use when washing up and wiping down surfaces

product.title: 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion
product.product_body: Product Description3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent lotion provides protection from biting insects via 3M Time Release technology, with up to 12 hour protection against mosquitoes from one application. Ultrathon lotion comes in a 60 ml tube and contains 34 per cent DEET. The Ultrathon formula contains 3M Time Release technology, meaning the DEET is released slowly, over a longer period of time compared to conventional products.Time Release Technology - up to 12 hours protection against mosquitoes. Contains 34 per cent DEET lasting protection against mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, gnats, fleas and more. Splash and sweat resistant to ensure consistent protection through all your outdoor activities. Ultrathon products have been tested in the harshest environments in the world. Ultrathon Insect Repellent is a highly effective barrier suitable for everything from low risk areas to the most extreme conditions.DirectionsNot suitable for children less than 2 years old. Does not damage nylon, cotton or wool. Squeeze into hand and apply just enough repellent to cover exposed skin. During application, avoid contact with eyes and lips and use sparingly around ears. Do not apply over cuts, wounds or irritated skin. Reapply as necessary (after swimming or depending on environmental conditions). Avoid over application of the product. Irritating to eyes. Harmful to aquatic organisms. May cause long-term adverse effects in the aquatic environment.See all Product Description

features.feature: Provides long lasting protection from biting insects
Incorporates advanced 3M Time Release Technology
Splash and sweat resistant
Up to 12 hrs' protection against mosquitoes
Contains only 34% DEET

product.product_body: AOX-free • Reduces soil and water pollution and prevents violations of the local waste water regulations. * The effectiveness of the disinfection was examined in accordance with the guidelines of the DGHM (German Association for Hygiene and Microbiology) for testing and evaluating chemical disinfection procedures.

features.feature: Special cleaner for cleaning and disinfecting vehicle air conditioning systems
Direct application on the air conditioning system's evaporator through an extra-long hose with a special nozzle

Disinfects, cleans, protects. • Reliably combats germs, bacteria and fungi. • Effectively stops unpleasant odours. • Prevents allergic reactions that can be triggered by bacteria and other micro-organisms
• Achieves a long-lasting effect by disinfecting and cleaning at the "place of origin". • Penetrates even thicker, greasy layers of dirt thanks to thorough spray cleaning
Effectiveness tested* by an external institute. • Proven killing of germs. • 100% of germs killed after just 5 minutes soaking time

product.title: Würth Plastic Dye Plast PT 75ml (Black)
product.product_body: Areas of application: Bumpers, synthetic leather roofs, folding roofs (including cloth), interior plastic panels, rubber parts, water pipes, foot board strips, etc. Instructions for use: Shake well before use. Moisten sponge with water and clean the surface to be treated with the rough side of the sponge. Squeeze the sponge out slightly. Apply Plastic Dye to the smooth side of the sponge and rub evenly onto the surface to be treated. Remove unwanted dye from trim and paintwork immediately. Already dried Plastic Dye can be dissolved by applying fresh moist Plastic Dye.

features.feature: For visual improvement of vehicle plastic parts.
Solvent free. Easy application. Can be applied in direct sunlight.
Dispersion-based high-quality plastic dye.

Do not store or apply at temperatures below +7°C. Attention: Plastic Dye is humidity sensitive during application. Therefore, ensure part to be treated is dry before application and remains dry until dye is cured.
Restores faded plastic to original condition.

product.product_body: IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTIONScotch-Brite Heavy Duty Grill scrubber with handle 010088Our toughest scourer, designed especially for grills and barbecuesMake quick work of grease and burnt-on foodIdeal for cleaning stubborn residues and splashes from grills and surrounding areaLong-lasting and reusableFrom quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean,scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customersand learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaningproducts for each surface, nook or cranny of your house.Keep your barbecue grill gleaming with the Scotch-Brite Grill & Barbecue Scrub. This heavy duty scourer has anintegrated handle that helps you to apply and control pressure where you need it, allowing you to take a stepback from the grill and the graft! The scourer cuts through grease and burnt-on food with ease and can even beused to remove food splashes from surrounding pots and paving slabs.END OF IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTION

Scotch-Brite? scrub sponges clean faster than regular brands and won't damage non-scratch surfaces. Our unique shape ensures a perfect grip while the sponge surface can be used as a multi-surface wipe From everyday cleaning to the toughest stains, get the job done faster with our range of durable sponges and scourers. *Some delicate cookware, soft plastic or painted surfaces may scratch. Test in an inconspicuous area with pressure you desire to use. Rinse thoroughly before and after each use, especially when using with products containing bleach. May be sterilized by boiling. Not for aquarium use .

product.title: 3M Ultrathon SRL-12 2 Oz Insect Repellent Lotion - 6 PACK by 3M
product.product_body: UltrathonTM Insect Repellent Lotion provides long lasting protection from biting insects via advanced 3M Time Release Technology. UltrathonTM repellent assures the best protection at home & abroad for you and your family. Note - Product best before date is a minimum of 6 months.

features.feature: Time release technology - up to 12 hours protection against mosquitoes.
Contains 34% deet. Splash & sweat resistant to ensure consistent protection through all your outdoor activities.
Long lasting protection against mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, gnats, fleas and more.
Ultrathon insect repellent is a highly effective barrier suitable for everything from low risk areas to the most extreme conditions.
Ultrathon products have been tested in the harshest environments in the world.

product.title: 8 x 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent 60ml Lotion
product.product_body: Multipack, Money saving listing consisting of 8 x 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent 60ml Lotion. Tropical strength Advanced time release technology Splash & sweat resistant Up to 12 hours of protection against mosquitoes 3M Ultrathon inspect repellent. Containing only 34% DEET, Ultrathon insect repellent provides effective protection for up to 12 hours against mosquitoes from one application thanks to its advanced 3M time release technology. When used as directed, provides effective protection against bites from mosquitoes, midges, ticks, fleas, gnats, sand flies and horse flies. Suitable for tropical areas with a risk of diseases such as malaria, yellow fever, Chikungunya fever, dengue fever, West Nile virus and other insect transmitted diseases.Suitable for children over the age of 6 months. Does not damage nylon, cotton or wool. Avoid contact with spectacles, plastics, acetate, rayon, leather, painted or varnished surfaces. Do not use under clothing. Directions for use: Squeeze into hand and apply just enough repellent to cover exposed skin. During application, avoid contact with eyes and lips and use sparingly around ears. Do not apply over cuts, wounds or irritated skin. Reapply as necessary (after swimming or depending on environmental conditions). Avoid over application of the product. Irritant. Caution: N, N-Diethyl-m-toluamide. Irritating to eyes. Harmful to aquatic organisms. May cause long-term adverse effects in the aquatic environment. If swallowed, seek medical advice immediately and show this container or label. Avoid release to the environment. Refer to special instructions/safety data sheets.

product.title: 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion
product.product_body: Ultrathon Lotion provides long lasting protection from biting insects via advanced 3M Time Release Technology, with up to 12 hour protection against mosquitoes from one application. Recommended by Ray Mears, the TV expert on bushcraft and survival, this insect repellent lotion will ensure you and your family have a high level of protection both for holidays to tropical climates and for breaks and outdoor trips closer to home. This is also the product of choice for the UK Armed Forces. Ultrathon Lotion comes in a 60 ml tube and contains 34% DEET. The Ultrathon formula contains 3M Time Release Technology, meaning the DEET is released slowly, over a longer period of time compared to conventional products. One benefit of a lower DEET content is that the product is also suitable in lower risk environments; another is a more pleasant odour for the user, since the DEET smell is not so strong. The Ultrathon formulation is also splash and sweat resistant, affording long lasting protection even when you are active, against a range of biting insects--including mosquitoes, midges, ticks, fleas, gnats and biting flies.

features.feature: 3M Ultrathon

product.product_body: E-A-RTM Classic Earplugs are made from a soft energy absorbing polymer foam which provides excellent hearing protection and all day comfort. Ideal for use where noise is a problem, either in work or leisure activities. E-A-RTM Classic Small Earplugs are also available for users who are looking for all the benefits of the standard size but who want greater comfort in smaller ear canals.

product.title: Würth Super Silicone RTV 200ml (Black)
product.product_body: High-grade adhesive and sealing compound for use with motor vehicles, available in various colours. Suitable for use in critical areas, in which the seal may temporarily be in contact with automotive fluids (e.g. motor or gear oil, coolants of glycol mixtures).

features.feature: RTV Black application: Water pumps, Oil pumps, Front Cover, Cam shaft bearing cover, Thermostat housing, Oil pans, Transmission cover, Drive axle cover, Sunroof, Doors. Excellent resistance to chemicals. Can also be used in critical areas in which the seal comes into contact with various fluids.
Excellent resistance to motor and gear oils, refrigerants, and anti-freeze.

product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth Blue, 1 Cloth (50486)
product.product_body: The 3M Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth is the ultimate car restoration accessory when used in conjunction with 3M UltrafinaTM SE Polish. It easily removes any residue left behind from the product and is suitable for use on a wide range of surfaces including glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather. When used in conjunction with the SE Polish, the ultimate high gloss finish can be achieved quickly and easily. The unique super soft microtexture of this cloth means that it is non-linting and will not leave unsightly scratches on any surfaces. It's the ideal solution when it comes to perfecting any finishing touches and will leave vehicles looking good-as-new. The 3M Perfect-It III Ultra Soft Cloth is part of our range of award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, any products that have a blue bottle cap are recommended for use with blue pads and cloths. This system also ensures that the most effective results are achieved, leaving vehicles free from scratches, swirl marks and residues.

product.title: JL AUDIO M700/5 MARINE AMP
product.product_body: M700/5 5-Channel Class D Marine System Amplifier, 75 W x 4 @ 4 Ω + 300 W x 1 @ 2 Ω - 14.4V M700/5 Product Spotlight The M700/5 is ideal for a complete audiophile-grade, subwoofer + four satellite system, and it fits comfortably in just about any boat's weather-tight compartments. With this incredible little amplifier, you can drive two pairs of quality component speaker systems with plenty of clean power (75 W x 4 @ 4 Ω), while also delivering a stout 300 W of power to a subwoofer system. The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexDTM switching design. The M700/5 includes a 12 dB / octave high-pass filter for one main channel pair, a 12 dB octave high-pass or bandpass filter for the other main channel pair, plus a variable slope low-pass filter for its subwoofer channel. All three filters offer continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz. This amplifier's filters can also be configured as a true 3-way crossover, with a low-pass filter for the subwoofer channel, a bandpass filter on Ch. 3 & 4, and a high-pass filter on Ch. 1 & 2. An "x10" multiplier switch on the Ch. 1 & 2 high-pass filter allows its cutoff frequency to be adjusted from 50-500 Hz or 500-5000 Hz. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately), the amplifier's subwoofer channel level or overall level can be directly controlled from a remote location. This marine amplifier features white and gray powder-coat finishes, a gasketed cover for the controls and stainless steel hardware for durability in the marine environment.

product.title: Garmin Edge 1000 GPS Bike Computer with Premium Heart Rate Monitor and Speed and Cadence Sensors
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe Cycle Computer for Competing, Connecting and Navigating Edge 1000 is a cycling computer for competing, connecting, and navigating. Whether you're riding to improve your own personal best or see where you stand against the Pro's, Edge 1000 lets you connect, compare and compete. Turn every ride into a race by competing on Garmin Connect segments and seeing real-time results on your Edge, including alerts for segment start and finish and leaderboard rankings. The segments feature keeps you motivated and helps you push for continual improvement. Garmin Connect is a free online that can be used for tracking performance, downloading training plans, getting information on segments and leaderboards and more. Edge 1000: Race The Segments Own the Road Along with in-ride challenges and connected features, Edge 1000 offers bike-specific navigation and mapping capabilities. The preloaded Garmin Cycle Map includes OSM (Open Street Map) content with routable road and cycle paths, elevation data, points of interest and address search. Mapping data is stored onboard the Edge, so your access to navigation and performance capabilities isn’t dependent on mobile phone coverage, and map updates are free. Edge 1000: Round Trip Routing Know Where to Go Now you can explore more, on and off-road, thanks to this device’s round-trip routing feature. Simply enter how far you want to ride, and Edge 1000 calculates up to 3 cycling-friendly routes. You can even review the elevation profiles before making your selection. It also offers a route planner capability that allows you to create routes directly on the Edge 1000 using the map, POI and segments you’ve downloaded from Garmin Connect. Again, you can preview the elevation profile of your custom route before you roll. If you do get off course or want to end your ride sooner, Edge can always guide you back to the start or calculate the most direct route and provide turn-by-turn directions to get you back. At Your Fingertips Edge 1000 features a 3-inch high-resolution colour touchscreen display with dual orientation*. It has an ambient light sensor that automatically adjusts the screen brightness to changing light conditions to improve visibility. Unlike your smartphone, the display is optimised to work with gloves and in the rain³. You can customise your training pages with up to 10 data fields and use activity profiles to allow for easy transitions when you switch cycling activity, such as road, mountain or touring. Edge 1000: Easy-To-See Touchscreen Performance Analysis This Edge 1000 comes with a compatible ANT+ speed and cadence sensor as well as a heart rate monitor. It’s the first Garmin cycle computer that integrates with Shimano Di2 electronic shifting systems4 to display your current gear on the screen. Edge 1000 is also compatible with other ANT+ power meters, including VectorTM, Garmin’s pedal-based power meter that measures total power, left/right balance and cadence. A preloaded power-based workout on Edge 1000 allows you to calculate your functional threshold power (FTP), from which you can base your power training zones. The 1000 offers a training calendar and is compatible with advanced workouts, which you can plan, schedule and upload from Garmin Connect. Smartphone Connectivity When paired with your smartphone and the Garmin Connect Mobile app, Edge 1000 offers a suite of connected features, including live tracking, incoming call and text alerts, social media sharing, weather, wireless uploads and the sending/receiving of courses and segments. As soon as your ride is complete, the data can be automatically sent to Garmin Connect via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. This lets you stay connected and instantly share the details of your ride with friends, family and social media contacts. LiveTrack allows your friends and family to follow your races and training activities in real time. Invite followers using email or social media, so they can view your live data on a Garmin Connect tracking page. Once they get your email invite, they can click to follow and see your stats and location on the map. Edge 1000: With Incoming Calls And Text Alerts 1When paired with your Bluetooth or Bluetooth Smart Ready phone; contact your service provider to verify if your phone is compatible. The Bluetooth word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, INC. Wi-Fi is a registered trademark of Wi-Fi Alliance Corporation. 2iPhone 4s or later. iPhone is a trademark of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. 3 Water-rated to IPX7; ANT+ wireless connectivity does not work underwater. 4Compatible with Shimano Di2 electronic shifting systems with Shimano D-Fly Data Management function. 5 Garmin Cycle map includes 34 countries across the European continent, including Andorra, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, (Republic of) Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, (Principality of) Monaco, The Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK and the Vatican City * The dual orientation screen will be available with later scheduled free software updates Edge 200 Edge 500 Edge 500 with Heart Rate Monitor and Cadence Sensor Edge 510 Edge 510 with Heart Rate Monitor and Speed/Cadence Sensor Edge Touring/Plus Edge 810 Edge 810 with Heart Rate Monitor and Speed/Cadence Sensor Edge 810 with Heart Rate Monitor, Speed/Cadence Sensor and City Navigator Street Maps for Europe Edge 1000 Edge 1000 with Heart Rate Monitor and Speed/Cadence Sensor Tracks time, distance, speed, GPS position ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Colour Touchscreen Display ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Barometric altimeter ✔ ✔ Optional (Edge Touring Plus only) ✔ ✔ Customisable data fields ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Training Exercises/Workout compatibility ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ANT+ power meter compatibility ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Wireless uploads, LiveTrack and Weather Alerts ✔ ✔ ✔ Incoming call/text alerts (iPhone 4s or later) ✔ WiFi compatibility ✔ Preloaded Garmin Cycle Map ✔ ✔ Ability to add maps ✔ ✔ ✔ Round-trip routing and Route planner ✔ ✔Box ContainsGarmin Edge 1000 GPS Bike ComputerExtended out-front mountStandard mountPreloaded mapsSpeed sensorCadence sensorPremium heart rate monitorTether USB cable Manuals

product.title: Mio Cyclo 100 Cycle GPS Computer - Black
product.product_body: Product DescriptionMeet the Mio Cyclo 100: the new, stylish bicycle computer specially designed for every sportive cyclist who likes to keep track of his performance. The Mio Cyclo 100 sports an anti-glare 1.8" screen, simple menu structure and a customisable dashboard, which shows you the information you like to see. You are able to get started right out of the box and mount onto any bicycle in portrait or landscape mode. The compact design combined with a rugged waterproof casing (IPX7) makes the Mio Cyclo 100 suitable for every weather condition. And with the long battery life of 18 hours, you can enjoy longer distances without having to worry about recharging. The Mio Cyclo 100 is your ideal everyday training companion: challenge yourself and improve your performance with the with the personal workout partner. The device records your time, speed, distance, height, calorie consumption and your tracks with the built-in GPS. So when you get home, you can easily analyse your recorded tracks, and share your experiences online via the Mio Share desktop application. Mio Share is also your one-stop shop for managing your device and finding out the latest product information or software updates.Manufacturer's DescriptionThe Mio Cyclo 100 is an easy-to-use bicycle navigation device for anyone who enjoys cycling. With the option to have a Heart rate monitor and a cadence sensor this device will give you all the training information you need.See all Product Description

product.title: Mio Cyclo 315 HC with Western Europe maps and complete with Heart Rate & Speed/Cadence sensors
product.product_body: Meet the Mio Cyclo 315HC: the lightweight, easy-to-use bicycle navigation device, designed with an anti-glare fl at screen, perfectly readable in the brightest sunlight. With cycle paths and road maps pre-installed, you can get started right out of the box. The Mio Cyclo 315HC allows you to navigate easily from point A to B or to follow your preferred routes. However, if you choose to use the unique Surprise Me feature, the Mio Cyclo 315HC will offer you three surprising bicycle routes based upon your entered time, distance or destination. This is the ideal feature for anyone who doesn't feel like downloading tracks: you just choose Surprise Me, and you can get on your bike and go. The flat, anti-glare 3" touch screen and lightweight design make the Mio Cyclo 315HC perfect for anyone who likes stylish design and wants a slimline device to fit on their lightweight bike. The turn-by-turn navigation effortlessly guides you, indicating every instruction with a clear sound alert. With a simple menu structure and clear on-screen buttons, the Mio Cyclo 315HC offers you true ease of use. With the MioShare desktop application you are able to store your data and manage your route history. The easy-to-use application allows you to download routes and enjoy new roads and areas that others find interesting. And as the Mio Cyclo 315HC is compatible with most third party platforms, you can easily upload your tracks to your preferred one. The Mio Cyclo 315HC is fully equipped for the dedicated cyclist. As well as measuring everything you need to know about your performance, it also offers you workout programs, which can be done outdoors, but also indoors when the weather is not allowing you to cycle outside. It comes with a built-in ANT+ sensor, allowing you to easily connect with a wireless heart-rate monitor, wheel- and cadence sensor. And with the Mio Cyclo 315HC, a wireless heart rate monitor and wheel and cadence sensors are included in the box.

product.title: Garmin vívoactive White Bundle
product.product_body: UK stock so has full UK/EU warranty unlike any imports which won't have any warranty at all. The Face Doesn't Lie, It's into Sports From the company that has been developing robust, dedicated wearable technology to improve training metrics for athletes for more than a decade comes the GPS smartwatch for the active lifestyle. Introducing vívoactive - the ultra-thin, lightweight smartwatch with built-in Garmin sports apps that you can wear every day to help you keep a healthy balance between work and life. From Work to Workout Play harder, work smarter, live better with vívoactive. Built-in sports apps keep you active while smart notifications allow you to stay in contact with pressing work matters - all so you can keep your life in balance. The high-resolution, colour touchscreen stays readable in direct sunlight, so you can view your stats when you step out of the office for a run. The ultra-thin profile - 8 mm - is comfortable to wear all day and can easily transition from office to golf course. You won't have to worry about vívoactive keeping up with your active days. The rechargeable battery lasts through all your activities with up to 3 weeks in watch/activity-tracking mode or up to 10 hours using GPS. Built-in Sports Apps vívoactive features built-in sports apps that track your stats - even when away from your phone. Simply tap to choose among GPS-enabled running, golfing and cycling apps plus swimming and activity tracking. https://buy.garmin.com/en-GB/GB/prod150767.html

product.title: Garmin Vivoactive GPS Smart Watch with Sports Apps - White
product.product_body: Product DescriptionPlay harder, work smarter, live better with Garmin vivoactive, the GPS smart watch that enhances your active lifestyle. The ultra-thin, lightweight GPS smart watch with sunlight-readable, high-resolution colour touchscreen comes with built-in running, cycling, golf, swimming and activity tracking apps that follow your progress. The running feature tracks your pace, time and distance. For golfing, you can download golf course maps from over 38,000 courses worldwide, measure shot distance and support individual scorecards as well as know yardage to layups and doglegs. The cycling feature allows you to measure time, distance and speed. With the swimming feature, you can track distance, pace and stroke rate. The activity tracker counts your steps, calories burned and distance throughout the day. The move bar alert motivates you to move when you've been sitting too long. Use Garmin vivoactive on its own or pair with your smart phone (Must be within 9 metres of smart phone) to gently alert you to incoming calls, emails and texts, plus notifications from social media and other mobile apps. Garmin vivoactive automatically syncs with your smart phone at strategic times throughout the day. The rechargeable battery lasts through all your activities with up to 3 weeks in watch/activity-tracking mode or 10 hours using GPS. product.title: OpticludeTM Boys & Girls Orthoptic Eye Patches - Mini Size Pack 30 Coloured Patches
product.product_body: During the first four months of a child's life the visual pathways develop as the eye matures and receives images which are then sent to the brain. For correct development of vision the brain needs to receive equally clear and focused images from both eyes at the same time. However, if anything interferes with this development, it can result in amblyopia and reduced vision. Amblyopia is a condition that only children develop and needs to be treated in the early years in order to be corrected. The use of an eye patch - or occlusion therapy - to cover your child's stronger eye will encourage their weaker eye to start working and stimulate vision, hence helping the part of the brain that manages sight to further develop. The length of time and the number of hours per day that your child is required to wear the patch varies, so it is important to follow the specific treatment routine that is prescribed. OpticludeTM Boys & Girls Eye Patches are tried, proven and trusted through years of use by orthoptists across Europe to provide a comfortable solution to childhood amblyopia. Our Eye Patches are specially designed for children, featuring different sizes, pictures and colours to brighten up their day - and yours! This pack contains 30 oval mini patches, measuring 5cm x 6cm, in 3 different colourful patterns. They have a central pad which absorbs excess moisture and are made from a breathable, hypoallergenic and latex-free material. Easy to apply and remove, now you can make patching a pleasure. N.B.: Occlusion therapy should only be conducted under the guidance of an orthoptist or other suitably qualified healthcare professional. This product should only be used as advised by an ophthalmologist.

features.feature: For the treatment of common childhood eye conditions such as lazy eyes, squints and cross eyes
Central, absorbent pad reduces stickiness from eye secretions
Worn over the preferred eye, the eye patch encourages the weaker eye to function
Oval-size, measuring 5.7cm x 8.0 cm. 30 patches per pack in three different, colourful patterns
Breathable, hypoallergenic, latex free. Easily applied and removed with minimal skin irritation

product.title: Command Medium Antique Bronze Hooks with Strips (FC12-AB)
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Style Name: BronzeProduct DescriptionGive your bits and pieces a place to live with Command Antique Bronze Hooks. These decorative metal hooks can each hold up to 1kg in weight, making them the ideal organisational solution for your home or office. They can be applied to almost any flat, clean surface. When you want to rearrange, the hooks are easily and cleanly removed without damaging the surface underneath – no cracks, holes, damaged plaster, sticky residue or stains. Want to use a hook again? Just reattach it using a new Command Adhesive Strip – each pack includes a spare, and refill packs are available. These antique-effect hooks will complement classic home décor perfectly. The medium-sized version is ideal for hanging coats, towels and bathrobes. Many Command fans tell us that they use this type of hook to display their Christmas wreath on the front door, as the antique finish matches the rest of their door furniture. Once January rolls around, it’s easy to take down the hook without damaging the paintwork underneath, and the hook can be used year after year with replacement adhesive strips. Command products are perfect in rented accommodation where you can’t put screws in the walls or are worried about marks and stains. They hold strongly on a whole range of surfaces including paint, wood, metal and tiles, but aren’t suitable for use on wallpapered surfaces or for hanging antiques or other valuable or irreplaceable items. When you want to take one down, grasp the hook and slide it upwards to remove it from the mounting base. The hook and mounting base can be re-used with a new adhesive strip. To remove the Command Adhesive Strip from the wall, hold the plastic base gently and pull the tab straight down, slowly stretching it until the strip releases from the wall. All of these instructions are detailed on the back of the pack. Command is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pack, each containing 1 hook and 2 medium adhesive strips.

product.title: 3M Littmann White Light Optics Otoscope
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe 3M Littmann White Light Optics Otoscope delivers Littmann quality, design, and advanced LED technology. Low-reflection, bright and white light - aids more efficient diagnosis in comparison with halogen or xenon bulbs. Supplied with a Littmann branded soft Velcro fastening carry case, the pocket size Otoscope is portable, easy to handle and conveniently sized. Thanks to long LED bulb (20,000hrs) and battery service lives (50hrs) there are low maintenance costs. Whilst the service life of a xenon light source is only approx. 20 hours, LED burns for at least 20,000 hours. The LED light allows uniform illumination of the examination field as there is pure white light (5500 K). The LED illumination shows colours as they really are. Helpful for efficient diagnostics plus an almost unlimited LED service life.5 year warranty with 3M Littmann quality and service supported by dedicated customer service and support. The Fibre Optic LED Otoscope provides 5500K pure white LED light illumination for true tissue colour. The fibre optics produces a ring of even light for an unobstructed, glare-free view. 12 disposable speculae are included with the Otoscope with affordable pack size replacements available (100, 1000) promoting infection control. 3 x Magnification with swiveling precision optics.Box ContainsLittmann White Light Optics Otoscope12 Disposable Speculae2 x AA BatteriesCarry Case

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Tub & Shower Scrubber, 1 Scrubber Per Order
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. For a beautiful bathroom, you need to pay special care and attention to your surfaces to avoid scratches or scuffs. Tight corners, tricky taps and high tiling can also make cleaning your shower a challenge. Scotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Tub & Shower Scrubbers are made from a gentle but highly effective material, for superior scuff and stain removal from your bathtub or shower. They are specially designed to conform to the curves of your bathroom suite, with a light-weight water-resistant handle, meaning you can easily reach and clean those trickier areas. They are long-lasting and reusable. Now can you can buff your bathroom to perfection, and restore it to a sparkling sanctuary!

features.feature: Shaped sponge scrubber with handle
Non-scratch technology
Sponge designed to conform to the curves of your tub
Long-lasting and reusable
Light weight handle enables you to reach tricky corners and angles

product.title: Post-it Heart Shaped Notes Pad of 225 Sheets Pink Tones Ref 2007H
3M Heart Shaped Post-It Notes | Post It | Sticky Notes| 76mm x 76mm | 225 sheets | Pink Tones
product.product_body: For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. Post-it Notes are great for phone messages, shopping lists, to-do lists and instructions. Keep your cube handy by the phone to note down contact details, and then peel and stick the note into your address book until you have time to create a permanent entry. At work, school or college this cube format gives you a long-lasting stock of notes for your desk. Use them to annotate documents, books and projects, or for quick messages, reminders and revision notes. This Post-it Notes Cube contains 225 heart-shaped sheets measuring 76mm x 76mm, in various shades of pink. Post-it Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. The practical choice for everyday communication, a Post-it Note makes your message really stand out. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.

product.title: Scotch Super Glue Pen (505569) - 2g
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe Scotch Super Glue Pen contains 2g of advanced formula super glue designed for bonding a wide variety of non-porous materials including wood, metal, some plastics, ceramic and more. Dispensed through a fine, push-point tip, it is ideal for precision tasks requiring only a small amount of glue. The pen is extremely easy to use and gives ultimate control over the amount of glue released onto the surface of your item – meaning less mess, a neater finish and reduced wastage. What’s more, the tip of the pen resists clogging, sucking excess glue back down to prevent it from drying out, blocking up and rendering the remainder unusable. Once you have finished the job in hand, simply wipe the pen tip with a cloth or tissue, replace the cap and push it on tightly. Store your Scotch Super Glue Pen with the tip upwards in a cool, dry place and you’ll find you can use it over and over again.This pack contains 1 Scotch Super Glue Pen. Please note that Scotch Super Glue is not suitable for use on polystyrene foam, foam rubber, polyethylene and polypropylene. Follow the directions for use on the back of the pack carefully.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pen containing 2g of super glue

product.title: Scotch Super Glue Liquid in a Precision Applicator (SGAD-874) - 4g
product.product_body: Product DescriptionScotch Super Glue Liquid is advanced formula super glue that bonds securely to wood, metal, some plastics, ceramic and more. What sets it apart from the rest is the patented droplet control technology incorporated into its precision applicator – meaning you get up to 60% less mess compared to traditional metal tube super glue liquids. It is ideal for fiddly tasks where precision is essential, accurately dispensing one drop of glue at a time right where you need it. You’re far less likely to end up gluing your fingers together, or sticking something to the workbench or table!With the Scotch Super Glue Precision Applicator, you’ll also cut down on wastage. This “stay fresh”, clog-resistant bottle sucks excess liquid back down from the opening to prevent it from drying out, blocking up the top and rendering the remainder unusable. Once you have finished the job in hand, simply wipe the applicator tip with a cloth or tissue, replace the cap and screw it on tightly. Store your bottle of Scotch Super Glue Liquid with the tip upwards in a cool, dry place and you’ll find you can use it over and over again.Please note that Scotch Super Glue Liquid is not suitable for use on polystyrene foam, foam rubber, polyethylene and polypropylene. Follow the directions for use on the back of the pack carefully.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 bottle containing 4g of liquid super glue

product.title: TRADITIONAL LINO PRINTING BLOCKS MOUNTED 3.2mm GREY 75x75x3.2mm (pack of 2)
product.product_body: The traditional craft of Lino cutting and printing is a popular and creative educational pastime for children and adults in schools and colleges and an enjoyable creative craft at home. Lino prints well onto most papers, card and fabric giving endless creative opportunities, the opportunity to develop new skills and an appreciation of traditional printing techniques. Students can be encouraged to make their own prints, scrapbook artefacts, greeting cards, party invitations, gift labels, posters or even great works of art! Our Lino, made especially soft for block printing, is ideal for the student and master alike. Made using natural materials such as linseed oil and wood flour, our Lino is even biodegradable. Supplied in popular sizes, this is the first choice for education, hobby and professional use, achieving rapid results without specialist material or equipment. Can be used with oil and water based inks and prints on a wide range of paper, board and fabric.

features.feature: Mounted high-quality easy-cut lino in 3.2mm thickness
Comes pre-mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks, giving extra rigidity allowing consistent, flat prints
Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.
Pack of 2

product.title: Watercolour Paper Stretcher Half Imperial
product.product_body: Ideal for watercolour classes. Stretch your watercolour paper with ease - No more gum strip! This infallible device takes the chore out of stretching watercolour paper of all weights. You will never need to buy brown paper tape again! All who have attempted watercolour painting will know the frustration of painting on un-stretched paper...even the heaviest papers can cockle and buckle under a wash, causing the paint to flow unevenly and ruining your work. Let's face it...watercolour painting can be difficult enough, so anything which makes it technically easier has to be a bonus. The cure is to pre-stretch your paper. Normally this means soaking the paper and then sticking it to your drawing board with pins or old-fashioned brown-paper tape, both very haphazard methods. Get the paper too wet and it can tear as it dries or even break the board. Get the tape too wet and it won't stick at all! Furthermore you have to let the paper dry naturally which can take several hours. As a watercolour teacher the inventor of this system needed a reliable device to stretch several sheets a day quickly and effortlessly, hence this invention. No tape, No clips, No fuss.

features.feature: Made in the UK.
No need for gummed tape.
Perfectly flat paper every time.
Waterproof, mould resistant board, lightweight, easy for travel.
Quick and simple to use, again and again, cost effective and durable.

product.title: Mastercut Carving Blocks 300x200x4mm (Pack of 2)
product.product_body: Carve your own printing stamps or experiment with artisan printmaking techniques using this amazingly easy to carve, eraser-like material. Essdee MasterCut TM is formulated for extremely easy carving making it safer and easier to use than other materials. MasterCut TM holds fine detail without cracking or crumbling and yet resists pressure making it usable in a printing press. This double-sided material can be drawn upon with a pen or pencil due to its light colour and ink receptive surface. It can be used with ink pads or block printing inks for a multitude of creative possibilities. MasterCut TM comes in retail packs of 2 pieces with instructions in 4 languages.

product.title: Karcher NT65/2 Eco (110V) Wet & Dry Vacuum
product.product_body: **NEW MODEL** The NT 65/2 Eco is a powerful twin motor wet/dry vacuum cleaner featuring Kärcher's exclusive Power Filter Clean system for constant high suction power and long periods of uninterrupted operation. Ideal for the building trade, agriculture and automotive industries, the NT 65/2 Eco is equipped with an electronic level monitor which shuts off the suction when maximum capacity is reached during wet pick-up to prevent overflow. An oil-resistant drain hose allows easy discharge of fluids into a drain while the clip system ensures simple and quick accessory changes. With 110V power supply for safe site use.

features.feature: Drain hose (oil-resistant) Auto shutdown when max. level is reached. Eco filter system
Crevice tool. Integrated power cable reception. Power filter Clean
Bumper bar. Metal suction tube, 2 x 0.5 m Push handle.
Large on-board storage area for tool and accessory storage.
Easily accessible drain hose for convenient liquid disposal.

product.title: Numatic WV570-2 Wet & Dry 15 Litres 110v
product.product_body: Numatic WV570 Wet and Dry Clearner 15 Litre. When the need is for bigger but still portable commercial wet and drys, the Numatic WV570 sets an entirely new standard. Firstly there is the full Structofoam construction - a Numatic first unmatched worldwide. Structofoam is a material formulation embodying all the strength needed for bigger machines, yet without weight penalty. It is truly rugged. It doesn't dent, scratch or deteriorate and yet is light in weight and resists all known cleaning chemicals. To this high standard you then add the full dry performance specification, with large filters providing performance to hospital standards and optional big capacity disposable filter bags that ensure simplicity and cleanliness when emptying. In the wet operation mode the unique spinning ball valve ensures safety in operation, whilst the 'bucket' design of the container provides a simple and practical method of emptying for a mcahine of this size. The WV570 is supplied as standard with a truly professional 38 mm. wet and dry kit comprising a 2.5 metre Nuflex double swivel hose, 3-piece stainless steel tubeset and two Multiflo' 400 mm. floor nozzles - one for dry use, one for wet - which are also of Structofoam construction. When you're looking for a machine that will go on and on, wet or dry, the WV570 is surely a commercial must. Features -Full structofoam simplex bypass power head. -Service centre handle. -Heavy duty toggle clamps. -Pail handle for easy emptying. -Structofoam one-piece container. -Float valve with safety net filter Optional large disposable filter bags 4. -Heavy-duty castors for mobility.Specifications Motor - 1000 watt. Power supply - 110 volt. Airflow - 43.5 Litre/second. Suction - 2300 mm. Capacity Dry - 23 litres.

product.title: 3MTM NexcareTM Maternity Support For Pregnancy (Medium)
product.product_body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C9AO7yXs8V4 3MTM Maternity Band - Providing Comfort and Support During Pregnancy As your baby develops in pregnancy, your tummy grows and may start to feel heavy. You might feel more tired and may even experience aches and pains in your abdomen and back. The NexcareTM Maternity Support is a latex-free, elasticated support belt that can help to ease some of the physical discomfort associated with pregnancy. It provides gentle but firm support underneath your bump to lift the extra weight, relieve pelvic girdle pain and reduce pressure on the lower back. Fully adjustable with an easy-to-use Velcro fastening, the Nexcare Maternity Support grows with your bump. Tension and support can be altered by simply stretching the belt a little more or less and adjusting the fastening position. This support can be used throughout pregnancy, but is particularly effective in the second trimester or for relatively smaller bumps. All parts of the Nexcare Maternity Support can be hand washed in cold or warm water with mild detergent. Not suitable for machine washing or tumble drying. The Medium size suits pre-pregnancy dress size 10 - 18. The Large size Large Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 18-28. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product.

features.feature: A maternity support band to be worn around the abdomen during pregnancy
Expands to accommodate your baby's growth
Helps to reduce pressure on your lower back and tummy
Medium Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 10-18. Large Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 18-28
Latex free, whisper-soft elastic provides gentle, yet firm support. Lifts the abdomen to achieve relief from sagging weight and leg pain.

product.product_body: Product Benefits Nano-Fusion Paint Protection Film is a smart investment. •Choosing Nano-Fusion PPF to protect your vehicle now means you're more likely to get a higher trade-in value in the future. •Virtually invisible, Nano-Fusion's superior clarity allows your vehicle's vivid colour to shine through. •Wherever it's installed, Nano-Fusion's outstanding strength helps shield your vehicle from road debris, bug stains, and harsh weather. •When installed by a certified professional, Nano-Fusion is backed by a limited lifetime warranty* against peeling, yellowing, bubbling or cracking. •Nano-Fusion helps eliminate the need for detailing or paint touch-ups by protecting your paint finish from chipping or staining. •Special care products aren't necessary; simply follow the manufacturer's recommendations for keeping your car clean and shiny. http://www.nanofusionfilm.com/ https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=nano+fusion+paint+protection+film

product.title: Würth Diesel Treatment AR 300ml
product.product_body: For all diesel engines with common rail and pump-nozzle technology. Add the contents of the can to the tank. There should be at least 10 litres of diesel fuel in the tank. 300ml is sufficient for 70 litres of diesel. We recommend use every 2000km (1250miles) and preventatively after every repair to the injection system and to the engine. For any further information please contact SignLine.

features.feature: Prevents deposits in the combustion chamber and injection system.
The function enhancer increases the lubricating effect of low-sulphur fuel, thus prevent surface friction and a resulting failure of the injection system.
Compatible with all modern diesel-oxidation catalytic converters.
For all diesel engines with common rail and pump-nozzle technology.
Add the contents of the can to the tank. Free of sulphuir, phosphor, metals and acids.

product.title: Würth Petrol Treatment 300ml
product.product_body: Add contents of the can to the tank, optimum dosage is 150ml for 35-40 litres. 300ml is sufficient for 70-75 litres. The product is self-mixing. An excess dosage is not harmful. For any further information please contact SignLine.

features.feature: For all petrol engines with and without catalytic converter.
Removes coating and resin deposits in fuel lines, petrol pumps, carburetters, valve tips, valaves and injectors.
Also removes oxidation residue.
Prevents water which is produced in the fuel tank by the hygroscopic characteristic of E10 fuel.
Add contents of the can to the tank.

product.title: Würth DieselCure (25 Litres)
product.product_body: Suitable for all types of diesel fuel, including biodiesel, used in trucks, the marine industry, agricultural and plant machinery. Properties •DieselcureTM is a corrosion inhibitor, it binds and neutralises acidic condensation, preventing acid formation, which causes gumming or resin deposits •Improves atomisation and the lubrication properties of diesel •Makes water content in the fuel tank combustible •Approved by MTU Friedrichshafen GMBH-Detroit Diesel Corporation Characteristics DieselcureTM conforms to all known fuel specifications. This product does not use cetane boosters, to enhance performance (short term performance enhancer). DieselcureTM eliminates water contamination in the fuel, which ultimately leads to better performance and decreased fuel emissions, for the long term.

features.feature: Reduces fuel consumption, black smoke and other harmful emissions
Cleans and protects from the fuel tank to the combustion chamber
Removes dirt deposits in injector pumps and injector nozzles
Prolongs engine life
Improves the lubricating properties of the fuel. Makes water content in the fuel tank combustible

product.title: Würth FuelCure 330ml
product.product_body: Moisture in fuel can cause many running issues, moisture and water is abrasive and can damage and wear a vehicles components as it travels through the fuel system. Suitable for both Diesel and Petrol injection engines, with or without catalyst. Fuelcure is designed to turn moisture contamination in fuel into a combustible lubricant which will not damage fuel lines, filter and components. Characteristics Fuelcure does not contain and Cetane booster to enhance performance, It will also not change the specification of the original fuel. Fuelcure eliminates the water content thus increasing engine performance and decreasing fuel emissions.

features.feature: Suitable for both Petrol and Diesel engines. Converts moisture and water in fuel to create combustible lubricant
Reduces fuel consumption. Helps to lower emissions. Increases engine performance. Inhibits corrosion.
Cures moisture contamination in fuel. 330ml is suitable for up to 100lt of fuel
For removing moisture in both Petrol and Diesel fuels, for cars, small vans, boats, motorcycles, quad bikes, small agricultural machinery and storage tanks up to 100lts.
Dissolves tar and gum build up. Can be used as a preventative product

product.title: Würth Heavy Duty Spray Adhesive 500ml
product.product_body: High Strength Spray Adhesive is an aerosol adhesive, which does not contain CFC's, Dichloromethane or 1.1.1 trichloromethane. It bonds a wide variety of materials giving rapid bond formation and is economical in use. • Halogen and CFC free. • Faster tack. • Foaming formula for low soak-in. • Economical in use. • Variable spray. High Strength Spray Adhesive bonds wood, concrete, stone, tiles, rubber, foam, metals, rigid plastics, polythylene, canvas fabrics, cardboard, paper and cork. High Strength Spray Adhesive is ideal for fixing polythene sheeting for enclosures prior to asbestos removal, for fixing thermal insulation and for packaging applications such as palletising or case sealing. It may be used for foam bonding, upholstery, automotive, carpets and trim and is useful for temporary bonding instead of double-sided tapes. NOT suitable for use on plasticised PVC or Expanded Polystyrene.
