product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth Yellow, 1 Cloth (50400)
product.product_body: The 3M Perfect-ItTM III Ultra Soft Cloth is the ultimate car restoration accessory when used in conjunction with 3M Perfect-ItTM Extra Fine Cutting Compound. It easily removes any residue left behind by the compound and is suitable for use on a wide range of surfaces including glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather. When used in conjunction with the Extra Fine Cutting Compound, a high gloss finish can be achieved quickly and easily. The unique super-soft microtexture of this cloth means that it is non-linting and will not leave unsightly scratches on any surfaces. It really is the ideal solution when it comes to perfecting those finishing touches, and will leave any vehicle looking brand new once again. The 3M Perfect-It III Ultra Soft Cloth is part of our range of award-winning colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, any products that have a yellow bottle cap are recommended for use with yellow pads and cloths. This system also ensures that the most effective results are achieved, leaving vehicles free from scratches, swirl marks and residue.

features.feature: Easily removes residue left behind by compounding
Unique super soft microtexture that is non-linting
Ideal for glass, metal, chrome, plastic, vinyl and leather
Won't leave scratches on surfaces

product.title: 3M Perfect-it III Ultrafina SE High Gloss Pad Blue, 50388 - for Ultrafina Polish and Polish Rosa, 2 Pad Pack
product.product_body: This high gloss pad is ideal for final polishing and is recommended for use with 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Ultrafina SE Polish or 3M™ Polish Rosa. It takes the hard work out of polishing to ensures a swirl- and hologram-free result. Easily attached to a 3M™ Back-Up Pad for ease of use, long-lasting waffle foam guarantees excellent value for money and ensures that each pad can be used time and time again. 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Ultrafina™ SE High Gloss Pads are big enough to carry out any polishing work quickly and efficiently, yet small enough to store safely as part of a kit, in toolboxes or in the workshop. With our award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes, any paint defect rectification or polishing work can be undertaken with ease and confidence. All of our polishes and compounds are colour-coded with the corresponding polishing pads to make product selection quick and easy. Any products that have a blue bottle cap are recommended for use with a blue pad in order to achieve the most effective results possible.

product.title: 3MTM Perfect-ItTM III Wool Buffing Pad, Pack of 2 Pads (01927)
product.product_body: The 3M Perfect-ItTM III Wool Buffing Pad is the ideal accessory for use with 3M Finesse-itTM Polishes. Used together, these products create a superior, high quality finish on any vehicle. Each 113mm pad is made from fine wool fibres that are stitched onto a polyester backing material, and has been prewashed to reduce traces of lint. This minimises the need to conduct a final dusting step after polishing - saving you valuable time and effort. The soft wool material is gentle enough to use on most surfaces without leaving unsightly scratches or marks behind. Favoured by automobile professionals all over the world, the pad is simple and easy to use yet always achieves the desired results. The 3M Perfect-It III Wool Buffing Pad incorporates the3M HookitTM Attachment System. This hook and loop mechanism is designed to provide easy attachment, removal and centering of the pad to its corresponding back-up pad, ensuring safe, easy and effective polishing with minimal downtime.

features.feature: Buffing pad with 3M Hookit attachment system
Stitched onto polyester backing material for durability
Ideal for use with 3M polishes
Prewashed to reduce lint

product.title: 3M Perfect-it III Compounding Pad Green, 50487 - for Fast Cut and Compound, 2 Pad Pack
product.product_body: This pad works hard to deliver an aggressive cutting action that removes scratches and swirl marks from both refinished and original paintwork. It is highly recommended for use with a machine polisher and 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Fast Cut+ Compound 50417. 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Compounding Pads are easily attached to 3M™ Back Up Pads. The long lasting foam ensures that they can be used time and time again to offer excellent value for money. Large enough to carry out any compounding work quickly and efficiently, they are also compact enough to store as part of a kit, in toolboxes or in the workshop. Available in packs of 2, this product is part of our range of award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, products with a green bottle cap are recommended for use with green compounding pads. This system also ensures that the most effective results possible, leaving vehicles free from scratches and swirl marks.

product.title: 3M Perfect-it III Polishing Pad Yellow, 50488 - for Extra Fine Compound, 2 Pad Pack
product.product_body: This pad has been designed to remove light scratches, swirl marks and defects from both refinished and original paintwork. For the most desirable results, it is recommended for use with a machine polisher and 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Extra Fine Compound 80349. 3M™ Perfect-it™ III Polishing Pads for Extra Fine Compound are easily attached to 3M™ Back Up Pads with a hook and loop system. The long lasting foam ensures that they can be used time and time again, delivering excellent value for money. Big enough to carry out any compounding work quickly and efficiently, they are also small enough to store safely as part of a kit, in toolboxes or in the workshop. Available in packs of 2, these pads are part of our range of award-winning, colour-coded compounds and polishes. Designed to make product selection quick and easy, any products that have a yellow bottle cap are recommended for use with yellow compounding pads. This system also ensures that the most effective results are achieved, leaving vehicles free from scratches and swirl marks.

product.title: 3MTM Electric Car Polisher 240v, 1 Pack (64393)
product.product_body: The new 3M Electric Car Polisher is engineered to work hand-in-hand with 3M Compounds, pads and accessories - the choice of many professional bodyshops. Ready to use and with an innovative body design that keeps the pad contamination free, this polisher has an impressive power to weight ratio for improved comfort and performance. The powerful 1100 watt motor combined with the progressive start-up feature and ergonomic handle provides greater operator comfort and superb performance. For maximum results, use this tool in combination with the 3M Colour Coded Paint Rectification System. Please note, the electric polisher does not come with a back-up pad

features.feature: A powerful 1,100 watt motor for better handling and quicker throughput
Lightweight electric car polisher with ergonomic handle and grip areas for greater operator comfort and reduced vibration
Progressive start-up for spreading compound
Variable speed for increased control

product.title: 3MTM Marine ImperialTM Compound & Finishing Material, Boat Polish (06044), 950 ml
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. Compounding removes the scratch pattern left by abrasives in previous sanding processes, as well as cleaning up oxidisation, waterline marks and other stains and blemishes. Designed for us on gel coats, 3M Marine ImperialTM Compound & Finishing Material is a one-step boat polish with a fast cut that leaves a premium, high gloss finish without swirl marks. It is easy to apply - by hand or using a mechanical buffer - and easy to clean up. This pack contains 1 x 950 ml bottle of 3M Marine ImperialTM Compound & Finishing Material. For best results apply using a rotary polisher with a wool pad, at 2000RPM or less. Can also be applied by hand. Always wipe the surface before compounding then start with medium pressure, reducing to lighter pressure towards the end to clean up.

features.feature: One step boat polish
Removes scratches, oxidisation, stains, blemishes and swirl marks
Easy to apply, easy to clean up
Fast cut leaves a high gloss finish
1 bottle containing 950 ml

product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. Compounding removes the scratch pattern left by abrasives in previous sanding processes, as well as cleaning up oxidisation, waterline marks and other stains and blemishes. Designed for use on gel coats, 3M Marine High Gloss Gel Coat Compound quickly removes P800 dual action or P1000 wet sanding scratches to leave a high gloss finish. Its unique formulation contains no wax or silicone and reduces slinging whilst buffing for a superior, swirl- and hologram-free result. This pack contains 1 x 4.3kg pail of 3M Marine High Gloss Gel Coat Compound. For best results apply using a rotary polisher at 2000RPM or less. product.title: 3MTM Marine Finesse-it IITM Finishing Material, 473 ml, M09048
product.product_body: Getting a perfect finish on your gel coat is imperative in the creation of moulds and general hull finishing. Our professional grade products offer optimum performance across the variety of gel coats found in the marine industry. Designed for use on topside paint and gel coats, 3M Finesse-itTMII Finishing Material is a high quality boat polish that removes scratches, light to medium oxidisation and haze or swirl marks that are left as a result of compounding. Use it as a final finishing step after 3M Marine Compounds to achieve a smooth, high gloss, wet look finish. Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. This pack contains 1 x 473Ml bottle of 3M Finesse-itTM II Finishing Material. For best results apply using a wool pad. Contact SignLine with any questions or queries.

product.title: 3M E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs Adult (XA007703656) - 1 pair
product.product_body: Product Description3M E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs are made from soft, supple material that is preformed to fit the ear – there is no need to roll them down before use. Their unique, triple flange design reduces the amount of water that enters the ear canal during swimming, showering, bathing and other similar activities; a long stem helps make it easier to insert and remove them. E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs are easy to clean after use and are supplied in an attractive case for easy, hygienic storage in your swimming bag or bathroom cabinet. What’s more, they are extremely durable and can be reused time and again to prevent discomfort caused by water trapped in the ear canal.This pack contains one pair of adult-sized, skin-coloured E-A-R Aquafit Earplugs and a storage case. A smaller size (Aquafit Junior) is available for children (not suitable for children under the age of 36 months) or those with a smaller ear canal. To ensure optimum performance, follow the fitting instructions on the pack carefully. Please note that if used underwater, Aquafit earplugs can be worn to a maximum depth of 1 metre. Do not use this product for diving.E-A-R and Aquafit are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x pair of earplugs

product.title: Scotch Single Use Super Glue No-Run Gel (SGAD-929) - 4 tubes of 0.5g per pack
product.product_body: Product DescriptionScotch Super Glue No-Run Gel is advanced formula super glue that bonds securely to wood, metal, some plastics, ceramic and more. Designed to give the user greater control than a liquid super glue, this no-run gel reduces the risk of seepage and dries within seconds to give a strong, long-lasting hold.This pack is a useful addition to your toolbox or kitchen drawer – it includes 4 tubes of Scotch Super Glue, each containing enough for a single application. The tubes are all supplied with their own fine applicator tip – helping you to deliver a small amount of glue precisely where you need it and cutting down on mess and wastage. There’s no need to worry about it drying out after opening – once you have used a tube, discard it safely. Keep the remaining tubes, along with their directions for use, somewhere cool and dry ready for the next time. This pack contains 4 x 0.5g single-use tubes of Scotch Super Glue No-Run Gel and 4 x precision applicator tips. Please note that Scotch Super Glue is not suitable for use on polystyrene foam, foam rubber, polyethylene and polypropylene. Follow the directions for use on the back of the pack carefully.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains4 tubes, each containing 0.5g of super glue gel 4 precision applicator tips

Scotch-BriteTM Kitchen Duo Scourer Twin Pack (1)
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-BriteTM has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. The Scotch-BriteTM Kitchen Duo non-scratch sponge scourer makes scrubbing household surfaces quick and easy. Suitable for use all over the home, it will make light work of cleaning burnt-on food from your pots and pans or stubborn residue from the bathroom sink. The soft silver side is gentle enough for your most delicate surfaces, whilst the coloured side will cut through dirt and grease fast and effectively to leave your home gleaming. Kind to hands and comfortable to hold - even without rubber gloves - its thick inner sponge means that it is flexible enough to wrap around the contours of awkward shapes and squeeze into tight corners to make tricky cleaning jobs a doddle. Unlike traditional scouring pads, the Kitchen Duo is easy to rinse and wring out and will clean effectively for longer. Thanks to its powerful performance, you'll also find you need less chemical cleaning fluid - so it's economical and kinder to the environment too.

features.feature: Dual-purpose kitchen scourers
Coloured side scours through grease quickly and effectively
Superior scouring technology for sinks and surfaces
Silver side gently cleans delicate surfaces

product.title: 3MTM Stainless Steel Cleaner - Aerosol Can
product.product_body: When you have steel or metal surfaces that need a deep clean and a brilliant streak-free shine, polish up your act with 3M Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish. With a pleasant citrus aroma, this high performance product cleans, polishes and restores a glossy sheen to stainless steel and other metal surfaces. Once applied, it leaves behind a light, protective film that restores sheen, helps to hide blemishes and resists fingerprints and streaking. Safe to use in food preparation areas, it is ideal for commercial kitchens and food processing areas. Other applications include cleaning and polishing architectural metal components such as elevators, escalators and hand rails; drinking water fountain backsplashes; and restaurant and food processing equipment. Unlike some chemical cleaning fluids, 3M Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish is solvent-free, water-based and non-flammable with a pleasant citrus fragrance. A little goes a long way, clinging to the surface with a small spray pattern that reduces waste. This product is suitable for use on stainless steel, chrome, aluminium, laminated plastics, enamel, Plexiglas and ceramics. For best results, use with a Scotch-BriteTM Microfibre Cleaning Cloth. This pack contains 1 aerosol can containing 600 ml of 3M Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish. Scotch-Brite Microfibre Cleaning Cloths sold separately.

features.feature: Cleans and polishes metal surfaces in one step
Leaves a light, non-greasy film that protects and resists marking
Safe to use in food preparation areas
Water-based with a pleasant fragrance
Does not contain harmful chemicals. 1 aerosol can containing 600 ml

product.title: Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches (Junior Size,20 Pack)
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFor the treatment of common childhood eye conditions such as lazy eyes, squints and cross eyes. Tried, proven and trusted through years of use by Orthoptists across Europe, 3M Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches provide a comfortable solution to childhood strabismus and amblyopia. Worn over the preferred eye, the eye patch encourages the weaker eye to function. Breathable, hypoallergenic and latex free. Opticlude is easily applied and removed with minimal skin irritation. A central, absorbent pad also reduces stickiness from eye secretions as well. Opticlude Junior size: 5.7 x 8.0 cm oval includes 20 eye patches with cartoon rub offs.Box Contains20 Opticlude Junior 5.0 x 6.0 Oval Size Orthoptic Eye Patches with additional cartoon rub offsLeaflet with Product Description and Instructions for use.

product.product_body: Product DescriptionTried, proven and trusted through years of use by orthoptists across Europe, Opticlude eye patches provide a comfortable solution to a sensitive problem. 3M Opticlude Orthoptic Eye Patches are used for treating childhood strabismus and amblyopia, more commonly referred to as "lazy eye". Worn over the preferred eye, the eye patch encourages the weaker eye to function. Featuring a hypoallergenic 3M Micropore Tape backing, Opticlude eye patches can be applied and removed easily with minimal skin trauma, whilst the unique pressure sensitive adhesive secures the patch throughout the occlusion period. The non-adherent pad is absorbent and prevents lacrimal secretions adhering the pad to the surrounding skin, whilst the Micropore tape backing allows the skin to breathe normally. In addition the thin lightweight design needs no shaping, folding or cutting.Box Contains20 x Opticlude standard 5.7cm x 8.0cm oval orthoptic eye patches with additional cartoon rub-offs1 x Leaflet with product description and instructions for use

Central absorbent pad reduces stickiness from eye secretions

features.feature: SandBlaster® flexible finishing pads makes sanding less work.

product.title: 3M P60 SandBlaster Coarse Dual Angle Sanding Sponge for Paint Stripping - (Pack of 1)
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThis SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge in coarse P60 grit is the ideal choice for challenging tasks such as removing layers of old paint or varnish, or eliminating ingrained marks and blemishes from wood and metal. It is designed for use on detailed surfaces or tricky angles, where you need greater conformability or a sharper angled product. The sponge is easy and comfortable to hold, as well as flexible enough to get into those awkward, hard-to-reach corners. It can be used either wet or dry, and is washable and reusable.When you are faced with the task of stripping old paint, SandBlaster abrasives can make the job of sanding less work, whilst providing superior quality results. They can be used on a wide range of surfaces including wood, metal, plastic, filler and fibreglass, and have a special coating to resist clogging. When dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! The SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge is made of durable, washable foam that is coated evenly with mineral: the result is a long-lasting, reusable sanding sponge that cuts up to three times faster and delivers a more consistent finish when compared to conventional abrasives of comparable grits.The pack supplied here contains a single 3M SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge that measures 118mm x 82mm x 27mm and is coated with coarse P60 grit aluminium oxide mineral.SandBlaster Sanding Sponge: Less work. Cuts fast. Lasts long.3M and SandBlaster are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x 1 pack containing 1 x 1 x 3M SandBlaster Dual Angle Sanding Sponge

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Grout Scrubber 8 Pack
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. Grime and dirt can easily collect in the grout lines of your bathroom, trapping germs and making mould a potential risk. Tight corners, tricky taps and high tiling can also make thorough cleaning a challenge. Scotch-Brite Grout Scrubbers are made from a gentle but highly effective material, for superior non-scratch scrubbing. They are specially designed to thoroughly clean the grout lines in your tub or shower, with a light-weight water-resistant handle that helps you reach and clean those trickier areas. They are long-lasting and reusable. Now can you can buff your bathroom to perfection, and restore it to a sparkling sanctuary!

features.feature: Grout scrubber specially designed for the grout lines in your bathroom
With lightweight handle for hard-to-reach corners
Non-scratch and highly effective
Pack of 8 Grout Scrubbers
Long-lasting and reusable

product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Flat Scourer pads are stubborn and resilient - just like the grease or residue they will tackle, with minimum effort! Tough on grime and dirt, these large and ultra-flexible pads provide unrivalled scouring power but are flexible enough to grip contours and get right into tight corners. Whether it's crusty casserole dishes or greasy grills, they are tough enough to clean the grimiest of your kitchen cookware, hob or oven components. They are also ideal for cleaning garden tools - removing soil and corrosion to help restore your equipment and keep it in good working order. This pack contains 3 Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Flat Scourer Pads. Please note that these pads are highly effective scouring tools that are not recommended for cleaning glass, plastic, porcelain, non-stick cookware or polished, brushed or satin-finished surfaces.

product.title: Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider Refill Rolls x 2 - Acid Free / Photo Safe Tape, 6 boxes, 12 Rolls in Total
product.product_body: ATG Tape Refills - Home Crafts Made Easy Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider and Refill Rolls. These rolls fit easily into the glider to allow for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, giving you a mess-free, professional finish. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, our General Purpose Tape covers all your crafting needs. Using the Advanced Tape Glider makes your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep and wrinkle, the tape leaves flat, neat lines. The adhesive liner is removed as you stick, too, saving your time and patience! Strong and durable, our General Purpose Tape is great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out, yellow or peel and can be used on all sorts of textiles - an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox.

product.title: 3M PFiPad2EOL-1 Landscape Privacy Screen Protector for iPad 2/3/4
product.product_body: Product Description3M Privacy Screen Protectors allow you to use your mobile device in public without revealing confidential information to those around you. Quick, bubble-free attachment method allows the privacy filter to be removed and reapplied numerous times.3M Easy-On Privacy Filter is custom cut to fit your Apple iPad 2/3/4 in landscape orientation. Utilizing 3Ms privacy technology, you can use your tablet in public without revealing confidential information. You clearly see your information on your display while people at your side only see a darkened screen. Unique, removable feature allows you to stay private when needed; remove filter to share. Quick, bubble-free attachment method allows the privacy filter to be removed and reapplied numerous times. Privacy filter protects your device screen from scratches and the rigors of daily use. Privacy filter and adhesive corner tabs are washable to remove any dirt or debris. Convenient storage folder keeps your privacy filter clean while not in use.Box Contains1 x Screen Protector

product.title: 3M Natural View Ultra Clear Screen Protector for iPad 2/New iPad (Pack of 10)
product.product_body: Product Description3M Natural View screen protectors provide long-lasting protection without compromising the image clarity of your tablet screen. The advanced film technology provides superior protection against scratches, and fingerprints, smudges and dirt. What makes this stand out is the thin, optical grade film that 3M have developed that has been used to create a durable hard coat of protection against rigors of everyday use. Laboratory tests show that these screen protectors, out-perform competitive screen protection products in both durability and scratch resistance. They are optically clear as they cover and protect front-facing cameras without affecting performance or picture quality. Even in bright light conditions, your screen image will look as crisp and clear s it did when you first took it out of the box. Tablets spend most of their lives at the bottom of bags and briefcases. 3M have designed stay-clean edges that prevent dust and grime from collecting on the edges of the screen protector and help prevent the edges from peeling once applied. Now everyone knows that tablets are dependent on the intuitive touch screens to surf the web or play games. This screen protector will not hinder you in any shape or form. There will be no interference of touch screen functionality, which means you get all the protection you need while enjoying the easy touch experience you expect. An Exclusive feature is the 3M Scotchgard coating to ensure fingerprints, smudges and oils wipe away easily and cleanly with a soft cloth. Now you can apply your 3M Natural View Screen Protector in minutes with just a few simple steps. All 3M Screen Protectors use is a forgiving, dry adhesive which comes with an in-package applicator and step-by-step instructions. Plus, the adhesive removes cleanly with ZERO residue! With a lifetime warranty let 3M keep your display looking just like new.Box Contains3M, x10 Screen Protector, Cleaning Cloth, Applicator, Step-by-Step Instructions, Limited Lifetime Warranty for damage caused by scratching.

product.title: 3M SandBlaster 02580UK Coarse P80 115mm x 2.5m Sandpaper Roll with Paint Stripping
product.product_body: Product DescriptionWhen you are faced with the task of stripping old paint, SandBlaster abrasives can make the job of sanding less work, whilst providing superior quality results. The 2.5m roll is compact and great for tool boxes: it’s easy to cut or tear pieces off for hand sanding or use with an electrical sander. Sandblaster can be used on a wide range of surfaces including wood, metal, plastic, filler and fibreglass, and has a special coating to resist clogging. When dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! SandBlaster Sandpaper is coated evenly with mineral and features an advanced backing material that resists tearing: the result is a long-lasting, durable sandpaper that cuts up to three times faster, stays sharp and delivers a more consistent finish when compared to conventional alternatives of comparable grits.SandBlaster Sandpaper in coarse P80 grit is the ideal choice for challenging tasks such as removing layers of old paint or varnish, or eliminating ingrained marks and blemishes from wood and metal. This pack contains 1 roll of long-lasting sandpaper which measures 115mm wide x 2.5m long. To make hand sanding easier, why not try the 3M Rubber Sanding Block? product.title: 3M Panel & Solvent Wipes 370 mm x 290 mm. Roll of 400 (34567)
product.product_body: These single use dry wipes are a useful accessory for any home or garage. Used with solvents and other cleaning liquids, they clean and degrease automotive panels and other surfaces quickly and effectively. Easily dispensed, especially when used in conjunction with the 3M Panel or Polishing Wipe Dispenser, they can also be used for other heavy duty cleaning tasks. 3M Panel & Solvent Wipes are highly absorbent and super strong - even when wet - with reduced risk of tearing. With minimal cloth disintegration, they make for a quick and efficient clean, leaving you with more time to get on with other jobs. Highly recommended by automotive industry professionals, these wipes can be used for a number of cleaning and maintenance jobs including degreasing metal panels and removing solvents and other liquids. They can be safely used on stainless steel, chrome, aluminium, plastics, enamel and glass. 3M Panel & Solvent Wipes make a valuable addition to any cleaning kit and with 400 extra strong wipes per box, they also offer excellent value for money.

features.feature: Excellent absorbency
Single use only

product.title: 3MTM Marine Fibreglass Cleaner and Wax, 473 ml Bottle (09009E).
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax is a dual action product that removes imperfections like light oxidation, rust, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains to restore shine in half the time. This unique blend of rubbing compound and waxes is suitable for use on all fibreglass, topside paints and gel coat repairs, where it leaves behind a hard coat of wax that protects surfaces from further damage caused by sunlight, salt water and pollutants. With 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax you combine two restoration steps into one - saving you money and leaving you more time to enjoy your boat. This pack contains 1 x 1 litre bottle of 3M Marine Fibreglass Cleaner & Wax. For the treatment of heavier oxidation, try 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax.

features.feature: Dual action boat wax and fibreglass cleaner
One step restores shine and protects from further damage
Ideal for fibreglass repair, gel coat restoration and general boat detailing
For treatment of medium - heavy oxidation, try our fibreglass restorer and wax
Removes lighter oxidation, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design 2 Packs of 2 Pads
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. When you need to shift stubborn grease or burnt-on food, Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design will quickly scour and clean, working up to 50% faster than similar sponge scourers and with twice the efficiency. Their easy-grip design makes them comfortable to hold, whilst their coarse scouring surface makes cleaning a breeze. For worry-free washing up, these pads have a unique design which protects your nails, reducing the need for gloves and the likelihood of broken nails. Once you've powered through the pots, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. Thanks to their heavy duty cleaning power, these scourers are not suitable for non-stick, delicate or highly polished surfaces. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourers with Nailsaver Design, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage.

features.feature: Heavy duty sponge scourers with a unique ridge to protect finger nails
Make quick work of grease and burnt-on food
Ideal for cleaning stubborn residues from pots, pans ovens and grills
Superior foam sponge helps dry surfaces quickly
Long-lasting and reusable. 2 packs of 2 sponge scourers

product.title: Scotch Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive, 59ml
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Style Name: CLASSICProduct DescriptionEvery home needs some tacky, fast glue in its craft supplies, and fans of the Scotch Brand Arts & Craft Range tell us that this versatile adhesive is hard to beat! Super strong and fast-drying, Scotch Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive is supplied in a tube with a narrow-tipped applicator that produces a fine, controlled stream of glue. This makes it ideal for detailed or precise crafts like card-making, where you can rely on it to hold fast despite repeated handling. Its thicker consistency means it will not wrinkle paper or seep under edges when pressing two surfaces together; it stays exactly where you apply it without creating messy “strings”; and it won’t run. It’s also strong enough to perform on trickier surfaces and hard-to-attach items such as fabric, ribbons and decorative embellishments. Because it dries so quickly, you’ll find that you only need to hold things in place for a few seconds before they are secure. In fact, it’s a great option for any project or repair where you’re short of time and can’t wait around for adhesive to dry. Here’s a top tip for parents – do your children sometimes wait until the very last minute before telling you about homework projects? Scotch Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive dries on paper in less than 5 minutes and on other materials in up to 30 minutes. Next time you need to create a model of the solar system before breakfast, this fast glue could be just the thing! The tube in this pack contains 59ml of glue. Check out the rest of the Scotch Brand Arts & Craft Range – there’s something to help you get great results in all your favourite crafts! Try Scotch Photo Splits or Scotch Photo Corners for arranging photographs or scrapbooking; or one of the other adhesive products specially designed for crafters – Scotch Craft Stick, Scotch Scrapbooking Tape and Scotch Scrapbooker’s Glue. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Manufacturer's DescriptionNew Scotch ® Glue & Adhesive Mixed Pack For Card Making & Scrapbooking. All 3 products ACID FREE and PHOTO SAFE. Newly available from the USA. This 3-item pack consists of 1 x Scotch® Craft Glue Stick 40g, 1 x 59ml Bottle Scotch ® Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive and 1 x Scotch ® 2-Way Glue Applicator - sponge tip / precision tip 47mlScotch ® Craft Glue Stick: Perfect for mounting paper, documents and memorabillia. Long lasting adhesive, non-toxic.Scotch ® Quick Dry Tacky Adhesive. Ideal for paper, metal, plastic and other hard-to-attach items. Precision application, non - stringing. Dries in under 5 minutes to a transparent gloss finish. Won't wrinkle or bleed through. Bonds paper to paper in less than 1 minute. PVC free glue and bottle. Non-toxic.Scotch ® 2-Way Glue Applicator - sponge tip / precision tip. Cover a large area OR make the slightest dab. Permanent adhesive, dries clear. Wide and fine points handle a range of application needs. Precision tip minimizes mess. PVC free adhesive and applicator. Sets in 5 minutes when applied in a thin, uniform coat. Non - toxic.See all Product Description

product.title: Post it Rainbow Notes Pad of 100 Sheets 76mm x 76mm Spring Ref 654RBSP [Pack 12]
Post-it 76x76 mm Stripes Design Z-notes in a Decorative Dispenser - Neon Yellow/Orange
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFor over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message.In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick notes and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, Post-it Z-Notes are concertina-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write. This bright dispenser will bring fun and colour to your workspace or kitchen, and is filled with 200 orange and neon yellow Post-it Z-Notes in the square 76mm x 76mm size. Its clever, suction cup base grips the desk surface to enable you to grab a note one-handed, but can be easily moved around when required.Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are available in a range of colours and styles – to reflect a professional office environment or the fun side of your personality! Whichever you choose, a Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – perfect when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. For messages that really stick, get organised with Post-it Z-Notes!Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 dispenser containing 200 sheets of Post-it Notes

product.title: Post-it Apple Dispenser
product.product_body: Product DescriptionA Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – perfect when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. This glossy, red, apple-shaped dispenser will add colour and personality to your desk or workspace and makes a great gift for kids, students, teachers, friends and colleagues.This dispenser is supplied with one starter pad of Post-it Z-Notes in neon yellow, and is quick and easy to refill with other 76mm x 76mm pads from the Post-it Z-Notes range. In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick messages and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, they are fan-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write.The apple-shaped dispenser is part of a range of fun, colourful Post-it Z-Notes dispensers that also includes a heart-shaped and a handbag-shaped option. Please be aware that Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are only suitable for use with Post-it Z-Notes and will not function with original Post-it Notes.Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.Box ContainsOne dispenser in the shape of a red apple and one pad of Post-it Z-Notes, 76mm x 76mm, in neon yellow.

product.title: Post-it Table Top Meeting Chart 563R - 20 Self-Adhesive Sheets 508 x 584mm
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFlipcharts with a difference! Get real action from your meetings by keeping all your charts visible all of the time. A Post-it Meeting Chart makes it easy to make your point, capture ideas or solve problems in group discussions. These meeting room essentials feature a Post-it Super Sticky adhesive strip along the top of every sheet so you can stick and reposition them around the room. They are ideal for training courses, brainstorming activities, meetings and presentations. Jot down thoughts, ideas, action points, checklists, agendas and minutes, then peel off the page and stick it to the wall for everyone to see whilst you continue on to the next sheet. You won’t need to worry about finding tape, drawing pins or adhesive putty. At the end of your meeting, simply peel off the used sheets to leave the room in exactly the same condition as when you started. Post-it Super Sticky Meeting Charts are made from premium plain white paper with a special coating that eliminates marker bleed-through, meaning that you can write on them on the pad or on the wall without the risk of staining the underlying pages or your wall surface. They pull off the pad easily with no awkward backing paper to remove, and have the holding power to stick securely to most vertical surfaces. When your meeting is over, they remove cleanly without tearing, enabling you to take them back to your desk ready to write up your notes. This pack contains 1 pad of Post-it Super Sticky Meeting Charts. Each flipchart pad measures 51cm x 69cm and contains 20 sheets. The pads have been conveniently designed to fold out into a self-contained easel that can be used on a table top – perfect for smaller spaces, or occasions where you need to carry the pad from room to room. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pad of meeting charts, each mounted on a folding table-top easel

product.product_body: Product DescriptionFor over 30 years, Post-it Notes have given us a clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. They have helped us communicate, kept us organised and made life easier at home and in the office. With Post-it Full Adhesive Notes, you’ll find a host of new uses for them - whether you’re busy keeping your family on a hectic schedule, staying organised in the office, or working on the go.Post-it Full Adhesive Notes have a larger area of Super Sticky adhesive that covers all but one edge of each sheet – meaning they have more holding power and stay put for longer, whilst still removing cleanly when required. The two rounded corners on the non-adhesive edge are less likely to curl or become dog-eared over time, and make it quick and easy to find and peel each sheet off the pad. The result is a note that sticks securely and lies flat for a more reliable hold and a neat, professional look.Post-it Full Adhesive Notes are the ideal solution for high traffic areas or items that are handled frequently, such as long term project documents, instruction manuals and operating procedures. Their increased holding power means they stick better to walls, doors, fridges, purses and briefcases so you can be sure that your message gets through. Organising on the move? The pads hold securely inside folders, diaries, notebooks and portfolios, and this smaller size will fit perfectly on the back of a smartphone or inside a wallet. Simply peel away the last two sheets from the pad and stick it anywhere you might need a note – great when you’re working on the train or with clients, hot-desking, or just packing a lot into your day! Mobile, versatile and reliable: with Post-it Full Adhesive Notes you’ll always have a note within reach, wherever you are.This pack contains 8 pads of Post-it Full Adhesive Notes in assorted colours. Each pad measures 50.8mm x 50.8mm and contains 25 notes. Post-it Full Adhesive Notes are also available in a larger size.Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains8 pads of Post-it Full Adhesive Notes

product.title: Post-it Heart Dispenser
product.product_body: Product DescriptionA Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – ideal when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. This big, bright, heart-shaped dispenser will add colour and personality to your desk or workspace and makes a great gift for girlfriends, mums, teachers and colleagues. It’s the perfect choice for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, leaving presents and end-of-term ‘thank-you’s’.This dispenser is supplied with one starter pad of Post-it Z-Notes in pink, and is quick and easy to refill with other 76mm x 76mm pads from the Post-it Z-Notes range. In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick messages and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, they are fan-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write.The heart-shaped dispenser is part of a range of fun, colourful Post-it Z-Notes dispensers that also includes an apple-shaped and a handbag-shaped option. Please be aware that Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are only suitable for use with Post-it Z-Notes and will not function with original Post-it Notes.Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.Manufacturer's DescriptionStand out from the crowd with this funky Post-it Heart Shaped Z-Note Dispenser. The smart gloss finish makes it ideal for displaying on any surface at home or in the office. Be the envy of your friends - when they notice this stylish, but practical dispenser sitting on your desk, table or other surface. It's bound to become a talking point. Being practical and fun, the Post-it Z-Note Heart Dispenser makes the perfect gift or present for family and friends. Each dispenser also comes with a 50 sheet pad of pink Post-it Z-Notes, so it's ready to use straight away. When it becomes empty just refill with more Post-it Z-Notes in whatever colour you choose. Plus you only need one hand to use the dispenser, so it's really easy and convenient to use.See all Product Description

product.title: Post-it Colour Notes, Joy, 76mm x 127mm (655-12FLJO) - 1 pack of 12 pads, 100 sheets per pad
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFor over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. How are you feeling today? These Post-it Notes in a range of joyful pinks, oranges and purples will put a smile on your face and give your family, friends and colleagues a cheerful pick-me-up. Has your daughter got first-day-of-term blues? A little pink note in her lunchbox might be just the thing to keep her going until the end of the day. Got something to celebrate? Leave a “well done” note on homework, art projects and even reports at work – everyone likes a little recognition sometimes! However you use them, the vibrant splash of colour is sure to get your message across. This pack contains 12 pads of Post-it Notes in colours from the Joy palette – 4 Pastel Pink, 2 Neon Orange, 2 Neon Pink, 2 Ultra Fuschia and 2 Violet. Each pad contains 100 sheets measuring 76mm x 127mm: this rectangular size is perfect for longer messages and lists. Post-it Colour Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. Try the other Post-it Colour Notes to match your mood: spread some sunshine with the Energy palette, or bring peace, calm and creativity with the Dream and Balance ranges. Post-it Colour Notes – a colour for every you!Post-it is a registered trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pack of 12 pads of Post-it Notes. Each pad measures 76mm x 127mm and contains 100 sheets.

product.title: Post-it Colour Notes, Dream, 76mm x 127mm (655-MTDR) - 1 pack of 6 pads, 100 sheets per pad
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFor over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. Feeling full of beans and raring to go? These Post-it Notes in a range of bright colours will fill you full of energy and super-charge your notes and reminders! Add an element of fun into exam preparation by using them to organise and colour-code your revision notes, or jot down ideas for a project or piece of coursework. Leave little messages around the house for loved ones, or in the office to highlight important documents for the boss to read! However you use them, a vibrant splash of colour is sure to get your message across. This pack contains 6 pads of Post-it Notes in colours from the Energy palette – 2 Neon Yellow, 1 Ultra Blue, 1 Neon Orange, 1 Ultra Fuschia and 1 Neon Green. Each pad contains 100 sheets measuring 76mm x 127mm: this rectangular size is perfect for longer messages and lists. Post-it Colour Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. Try the other Post-it Colour Notes to match your mood: spread some sunshine with the Joy palette, or bring peace, calm and creativity with the Dream and Balance ranges. Post-it Colour Notes – a colour for every you!Post-it is a registered trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pack of 6 pads of Post-it Notes. Each pad measures 76mm x 127mm and contains 100 sheets.

product.title: Post-it Set includes 76mm x 76mm Z-Notes - Canary Yellow (Pack of 3, 20 Sheets Per Pad)/ Laptop Z-Notes Dispensers - Pink/ Grey/ Green (Pack of 3)
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFor over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message.In the office, at home or in the classroom, Post-it Z-Notes are great for quick notes and reminders around your workspace and on your papers. Designed for easy, one-handed use, Post-it Z-Notes are fan-folded so pop up one after another - it's easy to just peel and write. These portable dispensers have a self-adhesive backing, enabling you to stick them just about anywhere! At work, school or college they are ideal for use on the lid of your laptop, on the cover of a notebook or inside a folder so you always have a Post-it to hand when you need one. At home, why not stick one on the fridge door? If the phone rings whilst you are busy cooking dinner you won’t have to drop everything to hunt down a scrap of paper! When you want to remove your portable dispenser, you’ll find it easy to peel off cleanly - it won’t leave behind any sticky residue.The pack supplied here contains 1 x pink, 1 x grey and 1 x green portable dispenser plus 3 pads of Post-it Z-Notes measuring 76mm x 76mm. These pads contain 20 sheets each, to fit the laptop note dispenser.Looking for a more permanent option for your desk or kitchen counter? Post-it Z-Notes Dispensers are available in a range of colours and styles – to reflect a professional office environment or the fun side of your personality! Whichever you choose, a Post-it Z-Notes Dispenser makes it super-quick to grab a Post-it Note one-handed – perfect when you need to make a note during a phone call, leave a message or capture an idea quickly. For messages that really stick, get organised with Post-it Z-Notes!Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pack, containing 1 x pink, 1 x grey and 1 x green dispenser and 3 refill pads of Post-it Z-Notes (3 dispensers and 3 refill pads in total)

product.title: 3M 230mm x 280mm Wetordry Sandpaper Sheets Assorted Grits - (Pack of 1)
product.product_body: Product Description3M Wetordry Sandpaper is a high quality abrasive paper that is ideal for sanding between coats, fine finishing or polishing metal, varnish and painted surfaces. The silicon carbide mineral is bonded to its backing paper with waterproof resin, meaning that it can be used wet to reduce heat build-up and dust levels. If the paper becomes clogged, simply rinse it in clean water and re-use. The result is wet and dry sandpaper that gives an improved rate of cut, increased life, flexibility and a uniform, consistent finish.The pack supplied here contains an assortment of fine grades to give you a range of choices for different applications or stages of your project. Inside the pack are 4 sheets measuring 230mm x 280mm: 1 x P240 (fine), 2 x P400 (very fine), 1 x P600 (ultra fine). 3M Wetordry Sandpaper can be used on metal, varnish and painted surfaces. Applications include sanding metal surfaces prior to applying primer or paint; sanding between coats of paint or varnish; fine finishing; polishing; burnishing old finishes and feathering fine edges. 3M and Wetordry are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x 1 pack containing 4 sheets of 3M Wetordry Sandpaper

product.title: 3M P600 230mm x 280mm Wetordry Ultra Fine Sandpaper Sheets - (Pack of 1)
product.product_body: Product Description3M Wetordry Sandpaper is a high quality abrasive paper that is ideal for sanding between coats, fine finishing or polishing metal, varnish and painted surfaces. The silicon carbide mineral is bonded to its backing paper with waterproof resin, meaning that it can be used wet to reduce heat build-up and dust levels. If the paper becomes clogged, simply rinse it in clean water and re-use. The result is wetordry sandpaper that gives an improved rate of cut, increased life, flexibility and a uniform, consistent finish.The pack supplied here contains 4 sheets of Ultra Fine P600 grit Wetordry Sandpaper – ideal for fine finishing, polishing car bodywork and achieving an ultra smooth surface. Each sheet measures 230mm x 280mm. 3M Wetordry Sandpaper can be used on metal, varnish and painted surfaces. Applications include sanding metal surfaces prior to applying primer or paint; sanding between coats of paint or varnish; fine finishing; polishing; burnishing old finishes and feathering fine edges.3M and Wetordry are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x 1 pack containing 4 sheets of 3M Wetordry Sandpaper

product.title: 3M Hand-MaskerTM Masking Systems Film Kit M3000 Filled
product.product_body: The Handmasker masking film kit is all you need to apply Scotch® masking products. Perfect for the professional finish you require. Includes a free instruction DVD with every kit. Refill with 3M masking films & papers; available in 24"", 48"", 72"" & 99"". Replacement 12"" blade also available. Additional Information From Our US Website: Save Time with Trusted 3MTM Hand-MaskerTM Masking System. Productivity directly impacts profitability which is why so many professional painters rely on the 3MTM Hand-MaskerTM Masking System. Combining trusted, time saving products into one simple solution is key because it allows a single painter to quickly and easily mask a job that would otherwise require a two- or three-person crew. The system consists of the Hand-MaskerTM M3000 dispenser, 3MTM masking films, and Scotch® masking tapes, all optimized to work together. The 3MTM Hand-MaskerTM M3000 Dispenser is a versatile tool for heavy-duty masking, covering, and protecting. It dispenses 3MTM masking film while simultaneously applying Scotch® masking tape. The system can be loaded with a wide variety of Scotch® branded tapes and 3MTM masking films. The result is a simple, high-quality masking solution easily adaptable to multiple masking applications and surfaces, including windows, doors, arches, and bagging a room. Applies tape to Masking Film Plus/Contractor's Plastic and to the surface in one easy step. Accommodates various widths of tapes from 3/4, 1, 1 ½ to 2 inches. Tracking pin guides tape and ensures consistently straight masking. Backlash arm evenly dispenses tape and film together.

features.feature: Applies Scotch-BlueTM masking tape pre-attached to masking film for complete area protection
Ideal for masking windows and doors, particularly when spray painting.
Thoroughly seals off the whole masked area protecting from over spray & splashes
Perfect for decorating kitchens or bathrooms, where there may be large fixed items to protect from
Includes M3000 application tool plus starter quantity of Scotch-BlueTM tape and masking film.

product.title: 3M Sandblaster 463-000 Sanding Block for Flexible Abrasive Papers 1 Piece Large
product.product_body: With a few steps to the right sanding pattern: fast, flexible, economical. The 3M Sand Blaster Flexible abrasive papers make sanding easy and provide good grinding results: The basic requirement for the right painting. The 3M Cubitron abrasive grain perennial enables efficient and powerful machining and leads to a fine and uniform sanding pattern. Straight edges and curves, the flexible carrier material shows its merits and also prevents heat transfer. 3M Sand Blaster Flexible abrasive papers last long because they clog less and are washable. For a gentle and uniform operation, the use of the associated sanding blocks is recommended.

product.title: ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Original Multi-Surface, 38mm x 55m (2090-36A) - 1 roll
product.product_body: Product DescriptionScotchBlue Painter’s Tape gives you the opportunity to achieve a high quality, decorator’s finish to your project – without having to call in the professionals! Traditional masking tape products can leave messy edges and sticky, torn pieces of tape to ruin the effect of your hard work: ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape features a crepe backing, meaning that it sticks smoothly and securely, even to curved or uneven surfaces. It is UV/sunlight resistant so is ideal for use on window frames, and can be removed cleanly up to 14 days later with no residue or surface damage, even when used outdoors.Versatile ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Original Multi-Surface is perfect for everyone from DIY painters to commercial and residential professionals. It delivers sharp paint lines and is suitable for use on a wide variety of painted or lightly textured surfaces that are properly bonded - including walls, trim, skirting boards, glass, metal hardware and curved surfaces. This pack contains 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape Original Multi Surface. The roll is 38mm wide and 55m long. This wider tape is ideal for use with rollers or for fixing dust sheets to skirting.ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape is also available in an advanced version (ScotchBlue Edge-Lock Advanced Multi Surface 2093EL or ScotchBlue Edge-Lock Advanced Delicate Surface 2080EL), which features Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector. This 3M proprietary technology repels paint away from the edge of the tape to give you super sharp lines with no bleed-through or seepage underneath.ScotchBlue and Edge-Lock are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter's Tape

product.title: Scotch® 1625 Electrical contact cleaner, 400 ml
product.product_body: Scotch 1625 electrical contact cleaner gently loosens dirt, light oxide layers and impurities. It is electrically neutral and completely residue free, making for an ideal spray cleaner. Uses include switches, relays, r.c.d. protection, instrumentation, time switches, metal cleaning, computer heads, light-duty contacts for video and magnetic heads.

features.feature: Loosens dirt, light oxide layers and impurities of every kind in an effective gentle manner.
Uses include switches, relays, r.c.d. protection, instrumentation, time switches, metal cleaning,
Electrically neutral and totally residue-free, making it ideal for use in almost any environment as
computer heads, light-duty conatcts for video and magnetic head.
a spray cleaner.

product.title: Scotch® 1609 Silicone Spray, 400 ml
product.product_body: Scotch® 1609 is a general use product for preventative maintenance, protection and lubrication. It lubricates moving parts, without becoming resinous and provides long lasting protection against moisture and corrosion.

features.feature: Effective over a wide temperature range (-32°c to + 177°c) maximising its potential Usage.
Can be used in the lubrication of electrical equipment, locks, hinges, other moving parts.
Scotch 1609 is neutral towards paints, plastic, rubber, foamed materials, wood and fabrics
allowing for wider application.

product.title: Scotch® 1602 Insulation Spray, 400 ml
product.product_body: 3M Scotch 1602 is a coloured (Red) insulating and covering paint based on alkyd resin. It 'hardens' into a flexible and resistant film, with excellent adhesion to most common surfaces such as metal, glass, plastic, wood, etc.

features.feature: Scotch® 1602 is resistant to uv-rays, acids, oil and alkalis.
Used as a protective coating on electrical connections, switches, switchgear, terminal boards, elect
Moisture and weatherproof.
Also suitable as a flexible covering on construction drawings and similar items.
High dielectric strength, making for a better quality insulator.

product.title: Scotch® 1601 Clear Insulation Spray, 400 ml
product.product_body: 3M Scotch 1601 is a clear insulating and covering paint based on alkyd resin. It 'hardens' into a flexible and resistant film, with excellent adhesion to most common surfaces such as metal, glass, plastic, wood etc.

features.feature: Scotch® 1601 is resistant to uv-rays, acids, oil and alkalis.
Used as a protective coating on electrical connections, switches, switchgear, terminal boards, elect
Moisture and weatherproof.
Also suitable as a flexible covering on construction drawings and similar items.

product.title: Scotch® 1617 Zinc Spray, 400 ml, Anti Corrosion Spray
product.product_body: Through electrochemical bonding with metal, Scotch 1617 Zinc Spray provides lasting protection against rust and corrosion, even on damaged surfaces. Ideal as a protective covering and as a primer for exposed metal construction. Damaged zinc layers can be repaired quite easily.

features.feature: Excellent adhesion to iron and steel
Is resistant to weathering, uv radiation and moisture.
It is an ideal primer for metal contructions
Can handle heat up to 500°c and is resistant to alkaline solutions and mineral oils.
Complies with din 50976 (zinc content) and din 53167 (corrosion protection.)

product.title: 3MTM PL150 Handheld Label Printer - Pack 1
product.product_body: The 3M PL150 Handheld Label Printer designed with the same features as the computer keyboard layout (QWERTY). With one- touch formatting keys the 3M PL150 allows for quick and easy creation of wire/cable wraps Code 39 and Code 128 barcodes, fixed length labels, and more which meet the ANSI & ISO colour standards. The 3M PL150 is perfect for a wide range of industrial labelling jobs onsite, at home and in the office.

features.feature: "favourites" and "custom" keys to eliminate repeated steps.
Now print labels that meet ansi & iso colour standard
One touch formatting keys for quick labelling of wraps, flags , code 39, code128, barcodes and more.
Prints 2 lines of text in 3 sizes. Prints 6/9/12 & 19 mm labels. Integrated Rubber Bumpers
Large character LCD display. Prints labels that stick and stay stuck. ng lasting- li-ion battery & durable design

product.title: 3M PL200W Portable Label Printer
product.product_body: The sturdy 3M PL200 portable label printer is perfect for professional labelling of cables, wires, terminal blocks, patch panels and switch boxes in harsh conditions. It wins people over with its simple and intuitive handling. A built-in memory allows easy access to around 100 logos and 122 symbols. The large, backlit display is easy to read and view the entire label files for editing. Direct access keys for common applications simplify the creation of labels through automatic set-up of size, distance, format, and vertical and fixed length. Through the use of advanced thermal transfer technology, the smooth processing of various marking tapes is made possible with high durability. The 3M PL200 label printer has been designed for efficient use in your workplace. For labels up to 19mm wide. Delivery includes: 3M PL200, user manual on CD-ROM, quick start guide, cartridge with 19mm flexible nylon tape white.

product.title: Scotch-Brite Disposable Cleaning Pads Easy Eraser 979033
product.product_body: IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTIONScotch-Brite Disposable cleaning pads Easy Eraser 979033Handy eraser pads for removing crayon, pen, scuffs or hard water stainsWave-shaped sponge for an easy gripHighly effective cleaning with no harsh chemicalsHandy all over the house to clean marks that traditional cleaners can't shiftFrom quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrubor shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers andlearning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaningproducts for each surface, nook or cranny of your house.For wear-and-tear on the whitest of walls, the Scotch-BriteTM Easy Eraser Pad is a mini miracle worker! Whenyou need to remove creative crayoning, soap scum or sideboard scuffs, the Easy Eraser Pad gently cleans andremoves all traces, with no chemicals or scratches. You can even use it in the garden to clean dirt and grimefrom plastic furniture.Simply wet the pad, squeeze out any excess water and use the white side to rub gently and erase the mark or stain.The blue sponge side can then be used to wipe away any dampness or residue. The Scotch-Brite Easy Eraser Pad willwear away with each use. Discard the pad after multiple uses when the white foam has disintegrated.END OF IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTION

product.title: 3MTM TS GR100 Touchscreen Smart Pen - Precision Touch Pen for Tablets and Smart Phone devices - Clip on design - Grey
product.product_body: The 3M Smart Pen for Tablets and Smart Phones brings the familiar pen feel to your touchscreen surface with easy' smooth draw and precise icon selection. The compact pen tip provides superior touch accuracy which enables faster texting and emailing. Available in black and grey' the 3M Smart Pen's highly sensitive capacitive tip makes it ideal for the many of the popular capacitive touchscreen devices. With more than 25 years of experience manufacturing capacitive touchscreens, 3M understands the technology and the unique needs that touch-enabled tablet and smart phone users demand from a touch pen or stylus. As a result, the 3M Smart Pen has been purpose built to optimize the interaction between the touch device and pen while enhancing the user experience. No power or software required.

product.title: 3M FR530 55x35cm Adjustable Foot Rest - Charcoal Black
product.product_body: Product DescriptionSitting at a desk for long periods can take its toll, causing aches and pains that affect your health and impact on your productivity. Arranging your physical workspace correctly can go a long way towards resolving these issues, enabling you to work comfortably and effectively throughout the day.The 3M FR530 Adjustable Foot Rest can help to reduce strain and fatigue on the legs, back and neck by helping you achieve an ergonomically correct posture whilst sitting at your desk. Its extra-wide platform provides plenty of space for both feet and is large enough to allow you to shift position comfortably. The tilt is easily adjusted and controlled through pressure with the feet; the height of the platform can also be altered if required.With its sturdy, heavy duty steel construction, this foot rest will significantly outlast its plastic equivalents and comes with a 5 year warranty. It is heavy enough to stay put, even on carpet, and is covered with 3M Safety Walk textured, slip-resistant material that is comfortable underfoot yet prevents feet from sliding - even if you like to work barefoot or in your socks! There is no self-assembly required – set up is as easy as opening the box, positioning it under your desk and using your feet to set it to the perfect angle.3M and Safety Walk are trademarks of 3M Company.Box ContainsAdjustable foot rest

product.title: M-1000 Automatic Electronic Tape Dispensing Machine
product.product_body: An automatic electronic tape dispenser for use with 7mm to 50mm wide rolls of tape with a 76mm core. You can set the length of tape required or press the button to advance the tape and press the scissor button to cut at required length.

features.feature: Electronic Tape Dispenser. Adult use only, not suitable for children.
Load the roll, feed into cutter, set length of tape and off you go.
Feeds tape through and cuts at desired length, when that length piece it taken out the machine automatically feeds and cuts the next bit ready for you to take when you are ready.
Great for keeping hands free for wrapping or holding something in place until taped into position.
Set length in cm's or mm's, from 20mm to 999mm. Supplied fitted with UK Plug.

product.title: FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter, Box of 4 Large, FAPF-03
product.product_body: Replacement Filter For FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Room Air Purifier Large - FAP-03 This replacement air purifier filter is suitable for the FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Room Air Purifier Large (FAP-03). Thanks to the quality materials and high filtering performance of this product, it is simply the best when it comes to filters for air purifier humidifiers. As well as boasting a 99.9% removal rate when it comes to pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores, this FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter also offers an unrivalled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rates and value for money. The filter works by effectively capturing particles that are commonly found around the home including dust, pet dander, cigarette smoke, other smoke and even particles that carry odours and viruses. Securely trapped in the filter, these disruptive particles are no longer floating around the house which means that any potential causes of discomfort - which may result in breathing difficulties, itchy eyes, irritated skin and many of the other symptoms of allergies - are eliminated. With an allergy UK seal of approval when used in conjunction with FiltreteTM Air Purifiers, this product can effectively help to alleviate the symptoms of allergies and hay fever or simply provide a cleaner living environment. * 99.9% effective at removing particles from the air which passes through the purifier. 3M Recommends filter change after 3 months of continuous use: To ensure particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning. To ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained; that's why washing the filters wouldn't work. Replacing the filter is important for maintaining the effectiveness of your FiltreteTM Room Air Purifier

features.feature: The best air purifier filters - highest filtering performance.
Unrivaled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rate and value for money
99.9% effective removal of pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores
Includes 4 x electrostatic filter - for use in the fap-03
Offers high filtering performance. Allergy UK seal of approval.

Thanks to a blend of quality materials and high filtering performance, this product is simply the best when it comes to air purifier filters. As well as boasting a 99.9% removal rate when it comes to pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores, this FiltreteTM Ultra Clean Replacement Filter also offers an unrivalled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rates and value for money. These filters work by effectively capturing particles that are commonly found around the home including dust, pet dander, cigarette smoke, other smoke and even particles that carry odours and viruses. Securely trapped in the filter, these disruptive particles are no longer floating around the house which means that any potential causes of discomfort - which may result in breathing difficulties, itchy eyes, irritated skin and many of the other symptoms of allergies - are eliminated. With an allergy UK seal of approval when used in conjunction with Filtrete Air Purifiers, this product can effectively help to alleviate the symptoms of allergies, hay fever, asthma, rhinitis and breathing difficulties. * 99.9% effective at removing particles from the air which passes through the purifier. 3M Recommends filter change after 3 months of continuous use: To ensure particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning. To ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained; that's why washing the filters wouldn't work. Replacing the filter is important for maintaining the effectiveness of your FiltreteTM Room Air Purifier

features.feature: The best air purifier filters - highest filtering performance.
Unrivaled combination of low noise, high clean air delivery rate and value for money
99.9% effective removal of pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores
Includes 4 x electrostatic filter - for use in the fap-01 or fap-02
Offers high filtering performance. Allergy UK seal of approval.

product.title: Fine Quality British Scraperboard Plain Black 610x502mm (pack 10)
product.product_body: Fine Quality Scraperboard is heavily coated with china clay, giving a smooth surface which is then overprinted with black ink. A sharp scraper tool engraves a line through the surface ink to expose the white beneath. It offers an artistic medium which is clear and precise. Used by illustrators and professional artists around the world, its super-smooth surface lets you to work in extremely fine detail. It can also be used as an ideal airbrush medium. Engraving is as easy as drawing with a pencil, and with much the same action. The board provides an extreme level of contrast not possible with other media. Scraperboard can be subsequently coloured and reworked to provide many interesting possibilities. Commercial artists value it for the sparkle it can give to the most mundane subjects, it guarantees perfect reproduction on the poorest of papers.
