product.title: Filtrete FAPF03 Ultra Clean Large Air Purifier Replacement Filter - For Filtrete Air Purifier Model: FAP03 - 1 Filter
product.product_body: Style Name: White | Size: 1 - PackProduct Description3M recommends you change the filter of your Filtrete Room Air Purifier after three months of continuous use to ensure the particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning, ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained and maintain its effectiveness. Filtrete Air Purifiers are a new and intelligent solution from the name that delivers cleaner indoor air. They offer an unrivalled combination of low noise, high Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) and value for money and are up to 30% more effective than an equivalent HEPA filter. Filtrete Room Air Purifiers use patented technology that has enabled 3M to produce a less dense filter than equivalent HEPA filters. This means dramatically more air can pass through a Filtrete Room Air Purifer and the result is much quicker circulation and cleaning of the air. Most permanent and washable filters quickly lose their electrostatic properties through washing and clogging. By using replacable filters, Filtrete air purifiers deliver the enhanced filtration of a electrostatic filter on a sustained basis. Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) is a measure of an air cleaner's delivery of particle-free air and is calculated through independent laboratory tests. The CADR indicates volume of filtered air delivered by an air purifier: the higher the tobacco smoke, pollen and dust numbers, the faster the unit filters the air. Filtrete purifiers are up to 99.9% effective at removing pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores from the air and use patented filter technology that allows more air to pass through the purifier. As a result, allergens are removed more quickly.Manufacturer's Description3M recommends you change the filter of your Filtrete Room Air Purifier after three months of continuous use to ensure the particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning, ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained and maintain its effectiveness. Filtrete Air Purifiers are a new and intelligent solution from the name that delivers cleaner indoor air. They offer an unrivalled combination of low noise, high Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) and value for money and are up to 30% more effective than an equivalent HEPA filter. Filtrete Room Air Purifiers use patented technology that has enabled 3M to produce a less dense filter than equivalent HEPA filters. This means dramatically more air can pass through a Filtrete Room Air Purifer and the result is much quicker circulation and cleaning of the air. Most permanent and washable filters quickly lose their electrostatic properties through washing and clogging. By using replacable filters, Filtrete air purifiers deliver the enhanced filtration of a electrostatic filter on a sustained basis. Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) is a measure of an air cleaner's delivery of particle-free air and is calculated through independent laboratory tests. The CADR indicates volume of filtered air delivered by an air purifier: the higher the tobacco smoke, pollen and dust numbers, the faster the unit filters the air. Filtrete purifiers are up to 99.9% effective at removing pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores from the air and use patented filter technology that allows more air to pass through the purifier. As a result, allergens are removed more quickly.See all Product Description

product.title: Nexcare Micropore 2.5 cm x 5 Metre Surgical Tape Dispenser
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe Nexcare First Aid Tape Dispenser is an essential in every medicine cupboard! The leading medical tape used in UK hospitals, Micropore First Aid Tape is porous, breathable and gentle. It's excellent for securing dressings on sensitive areas such as around the eyes and face. And it's flexibility makes it ideal for covering cuts and blisters on small or hard to reach areas.DirectionsInstructions for use:-Use on clean, dry skin.Apply without stretching tape or skin.To remove, gently pull tape towards wound.

features.feature: The leading medical tape used in UK hospitals
Secure dressings or cover cuts, grazes or blisters directly
Supplied in easy-to-use and hygienic dispenser
25 mm wide x 5 m long
Porous, breathable and gentle. Low allergy

product.title: 3M Heart Shaped Post-It Notes | Post It | Sticky Notes| 76mm x 76mm | 225 sheets | Pink Tones
product.product_body: For over 30 years, people have relied on Post-it Notes to communicate and stay organised. It's the clear, simple and effective way to make a note, send a message or leave a reminder. Whatever you use them for, Post-it Notes make it easier and more fun to get organised and get your message across. They come in a wide range of colours, sizes, themes and shapes so you'll always find the perfect match for your message or reminder. Post-it Notes are great for phone messages, shopping lists, to-do lists and instructions. Keep your cube handy by the phone to note down contact details, and then peel and stick the note into your address book until you have time to create a permanent entry. At work, school or college this cube format gives you a long-lasting stock of notes for your desk. Use them to annotate documents, books and projects, or for quick messages, reminders and revision notes. This Post-it Notes Cube contains 225 heart-shaped sheets measuring 76mm x 76mm, in various shades of pink. Post-it Notes are PEFC certified and can be recycled along with your general paper waste. The practical choice for everyday communication, a Post-it Note makes your message really stand out. Post-it is a trademark of 3M Company.

features.feature: 3M Heart Shaped Post-It Notes - A fun way to leave a message or make a note
Heart Shaped Notes in 3 Different Shades of Pink
Contains 225 Sheets in Each Cube
Each Sheet is 76mm x 76mm
Great for sending a special note to that special someone!!

product.title: Scotch Easy Tear Clear Tape 19mm x 66m, tower of 8 rolls
product.product_body: Product DescriptionMake everyday tasks effortless with this strong and sticky clear Scotch Tape. Scotch Easy Tear tape can be quickly and simply torn by hand – no need for scissors, dispensers or teeth! It’s easy to apply, and what’s more, it won’t curl up or stick to itself to leave you with a tangled mess of wasted tape. This tape will tackle most general purpose sealing and repairing applications to leave a secure and permanent bond. Because it is so easy to use, Scotch Easy Tear Tape is ideal for younger children. They can tear the tape straight across its width leaving a neat edge, and won’t need sharp scissors or metal blade dispensers that could prove to be a safety hazard. It is strong enough for school and craft projects, and its tangle-free adhesive makes it super-easy to apply. Practical, easy-to-use tape with the strength to do the job – perfect for every home and office. This pack contains 8 rolls of 19mm-wide tape; each roll is 66 metres long. A 24mm-wide version is also available, as are 33 metre long rolls.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains8 rolls of Scotch Easy Tear Clear Tape

product.title: Scotch Book Repair Tape, 50.8mm x 13.7m, 1 roll
product.product_body: Product DescriptionTrust Scotch Book Repair Tape to help you mend books, magazines, folders and more, giving you many more years of enjoyment. This tough, crystal clear, self-adhesive tape is strong and reliable - perfect for use at home, in the office and at school. Use it to repair or reinforce the spine, edges, covers and pages of books, magazines, journals, binders and even record sleeves, preserving your most useful and treasured items for years to come. Pliable and conformable, this tape will adhere to even the most awkward corners and folds to give a secure, long-lasting seal that flexes with cover or page movements. The acid-free adhesive is safe to use on photographs and sensitive papers, and will not yellow, dry out or split over time. Scotch Book Repair Tape is great for those favourite paperbacks that you come back to time and again, or lend out to friends, only for the cover to start to separate or pages come loose. Use this tape along the length of the spine and fold it around to protect the seam that joins the front and back covers. Run lengths of tape inside the spine to reattach loose pages, and even to repair ones that may have torn. Children’s books are notoriously difficult to keep in a good condition, but Scotch Book Repair Tape will help you mend their all-time favourites, and reinforce the corners and edges of new purchases to make them sturdier. Because the tape is so clear, you could also use it to fix labels to the spines of your books, folders and binders – great for the office, libraries, nurseries, schools, students and the super-organised! Scotch Book Repair Tape is easy to use. It unwinds smoothly and gives you the chance to position and reposition the strip carefully before pressing down to seal it permanently. This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch Book Repair Tape, measuring 50.8mm wide by 13.7m long.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 roll of Scotch Book Repair tape

product.title: Scotch® Filament Packing Tape 8915 Blue, 24mm x 55m
product.product_body: Our super-resilient Scotch® Filament Packing Tape is reinforced with single-direction glass filaments to ensure that once it's in place, whatever you've stuck or bundled together won't budge. Great for packing, repairing or DIY, our durable, reliable tape can be used in both the home and office. Scotch Filament Packing Tape will not stretch along its length, so you can be sure it will hold even large, heavy items exactly where you place them - ideal for DIY and repairs. It can also be used to keep tools and items securely together in the shed or store room, preventing items falling out when you open the door. You'll also find our tape invaluable during house and office moves. It can be used for keeping loose items together - such as computers with their accessories - or to keep drawers and cupboard doors from opening in transit. When it's time to remove the tape, it will leave no adhesive residue behind, even on PVC or stainless steel surfaces. Make daily tasks easier with Scotch - the high-quality, high-performance brand you can trust.

product.title: Scotch GiftWrap Tape, Dispensered Roll 19mm x 16.5m - 1 roll
product.product_body: Product DescriptionWhen you have taken the time to choose a special gift, make your present look perfect with Scotch GiftWrap Tape. It features a unique satin finish that has low reflectivity and almost disappears on most gift wrap papers for a seamless join and professional finish. It is quick and easy to unwind and cut using the child-friendly plastic dispenser supplied, and sticks securely to ensure your presents remain under wraps! Whilst designed to perform on gift wrap papers, Scotch GiftWrap Tape can also come in handy at home and school for general mending, sealing, mounting and craft activities where you need a discreet finish. The adhesive is photo safe and long-ageing: it won’t damage photographs. This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch GiftWrap Tape. The roll measures 19mm wide by 16.5m long and is supplied on a handy, refillable dispenser. The easy-to-use dispenser unwinds the tape smoothly and cuts cleanly and evenly, resisting splits and tears. The dispenser can take any roll up to 33m long on a 1 inch core. Larger, weighted dispensers are also available to enable one-handed tape dispensing and make wrapping easier! There is a wide range of colours, shapes and formats to choose from to fit with your workspace or lifestyle.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 dispensered roll of Scotch GiftWrap Tape

product.title: Scotch Magic Rabbit Tape Dispenser (Pink) with 1 roll of Scotch Magic Tape, 19mm x 15m (C29-P)
product.product_body: Product DescriptionPersonalise your desk with this modern, compact designer tape dispenser. Its quirky rabbit shape and matt pink and white finish will enhance both the look and the practicality of your workspace, making life a whole lot easier and more stylish when it comes to finding and using your Scotch Magic tape. The Scotch Magic Rabbit Tape Dispenser has a weighted base to enable you to unwind and tear off tape with one hand, but is small and compact enough to sit unobtrusively on your desk or other work surface, ready to use when you need it. When your tape runs out, it’s quick and easy to refill the dispenser with Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. The mandrel mechanism is attached to the dispenser so you won’t run the risk of losing it every time you need to change your roll of tape. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape included in the pack. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on; it won’t yellow with age and it won’t ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you’ll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser!Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x tape dispenser ;1 x roll of Scotch Magic Tape

product.title: Scotch Magic Tape 900 Natural Fibre Film 19mm x 33m (Pack of 3)
product.product_body: Product DescriptionScotch Magic Tape is the essential tape for home, school and office. This strong, general purpose tape looks opaque on the roll, but is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matte surface which doesn’t reflect light and therefore won’t draw attention to itself, giving you a neat and seamless look. It can be written on with pen, pencil or marker, so is great for annotating documents or making labels. It won’t dry out or ‘yellow’ with age, and its low reflectivity means that it won’t ghost on photocopies – perfect when you need to attach photos, graphics, or other small items to backing pages in order to photocopy them. It is photo-safe and ideal for all general purpose home, office and school tasks such as document mending, sealing envelopes, school projects, scrapbooks and crafts. Thanks to its gentle adhesive, you can stick then re-stick each piece as your project demands, then jot a helpful note with a pen or pencil on top when you're done. Scotch Magic Tape – A Greener Choice is a more eco-friendly tape than traditional alternatives, but offers the same great performance. It is made from more than 53% plant-based materials, including a plant-based, solvent-free adhesive. The core is made from 100% recycled cardboard, and rolls are packaged in boxes made from more than 83% recycled cardboard. This pack consists of 1 box, containing 3 rolls of tape. Each roll measures 19mm wide by 33m long. Scotch Magic Tape can easily be torn by hand, but a wide range of dispensers are available in a variety of colours, shapes and formats to fit with your workspace or lifestyle.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 box, containing 3 rolls of Scotch Magic Tape - A Greener Choice

product.product_body: Product DescriptionBring a pop of personality to your parcels with this fun and fashionable packaging tape. With good sticking power and long lasting hold, it’s ideal for wrapping lighter boxes and sealing padded envelopes for sending through the post.Want to make an impression when selling online? This tape will make your packages stand out and put a smile on the recipient’s face, which can only help your ratings! When it comes to mailing gifts, treats and birthday surprises, wrap your package with colour and style and make it extra-special.Despite its light-hearted appearance, this tape has been designed for shipping and is the same great quality material that you’d expect from traditional Scotch Packaging Tape. It is strong and sticky, providing a reliable seal without drying out, splitting or coming unstuck. The Easy Start Dispenser unwinds the tape accurately and easily, without tangling or wrinkling, to give a smooth, secure seal in seconds. No more twisted bundles of wasted tape or nasty bits stuck in your teeth - just run the dispenser along the gap to be sealed, then angle it up to cut off the tape at the required length. The dispenser itself is small, neat and easy to store – perfect for the home or office.This pack contains one roll of Scotch Decorative Packaging Tape printed with a black and white criss cross design. The roll is 48mm wide and 12.7m long, and comes pre-loaded onto an Easy Start Dispenser. Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 roll of tape on a dispenser

product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Colour: BrownProduct DescriptionThe general purpose, brown packing tape, still as strong and sticky as ever but now even easier to use as it comes pre-loaded onto a neat Easy Start Dispenser. This general purpose packing tape is ideal for medium duty tasks, like sealing rough parcels, cardboard boxes and cartons for mailing. It provides a reliable seal without drying out, splitting or coming unstuck. The Easy Start Dispenser unwinds the tape accurately and easily, without tangling or wrinkling, to give a smooth, secure seal in seconds. No more twisted bundles of wasted tape or nasty bits stuck in your teeth - just run the dispenser along the gap to be sealed, then angle it up to cut off the tape at the required length! Use it when packing boxes ready to move house or return to college, when you need a strong, reliable tape that is quick and easy to use. The dispenser itself is small, neat and easy to store – perfect for the home or office. This pack contains one roll of Scotch Original Brown Packaging Tape, measuring 50mm wide and 20m long, and comes pre-loaded onto an Easy Start Dispenser. product.title: 3M 1900 Duct Tape; 50mm x 50m Black
product.product_body: 3M 1900 Duct Tape3MTM Duct Tape 1900 is a conformable cloth duct tape, made with a polyethylene coated cloth scrim and synthetic rubber adhesive. Duct Tape 1900 is a good choice for non-critical applications. Duct tape 1900 can be used for many purposes: masking, marking, light duty sealing and holding, bundling. Easy tear, low profile, Polyethylene backing provides moisture resistance to tape applications, synthetic rubber adhesive sticks well to many surfaces. Good curve masking and wrapping irregular surfaces, easy handling, can be used in combination with humidity, conformable, individually wrapped roll for easy identification and to keep the roll clean until ready for use.• Silver polyethylene backing over a cloth scrim resists moisture for reliable tape performance in moist or humid environments• Synthetic rubber pressure sensitive adhesive sticks on contact to metal, glass, plastic, concrete, and other surfaces in non-critical applications• Surface readily accepts writing with markers for temporary labelling• Tape tears easily by hand from the roll• Individually wrapped roll for easy identification and to keep the roll clean until ready for useSold as a single 50mm x 50m roll; the product will be shipped by Royal Mail Second Class Post, and should be delivered within 3-5 working days. Orders submitted and paid before noon on weekdays, will be shipped the same day.

Make Christmas easy this year with Scotch® Tape Strips.

product.title: Scotch Expressions Tape, Blue, 19mm x 7.62mm, C214-BLU, 1 Roll
product.product_body: Product DescriptionDecorate and personalise your craft projects, gift wrapping, home-made cards, stationery and more with this bright and exciting Scotch Expressions Tape. It’s the Scotch Tape you know and trust, in a range of vibrant colours that will really stand out from the crowd!Scotch Magic Tape has always been the essential tape for home, school and office. Scotch Expressions Tape offers many of the same benefits, but with an added burst of fun and personality! Its elegant, matt finish is sleek and contemporary, and can be written on in pen, pencil or marker – great for adding notes and comments to scrapbooks and albums, or for labelling personal items like notebooks, folders and pencil tins. The tried and tested adhesive holds strongly for as long as you need it to and won’t dry out with age, but is easy to remove and even reposition. This makes it a useful addition to your kids’ craft supplies, helping them get their colourful creations and school projects just right. Use it with plain or patterned gift wrap to create a truly unique present, or to seal birthday cards and letters. Because it is photo-safe and removable, it can also help make a colourful display of photos and postcards that can be taken down and rearranged whenever the mood takes you!This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch Expressions Tape in Blue, measuring 19mm wide by 7.62m long. Also available in Pink and Purple. Scotch Expressions Tape fits Scotch Desktop and Handheld Tape Dispensers, which make it super-quick and easy to unwind and cut off tape as you need it. Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 roll of tape

The tried and tested adhesive holds strongly for as long as you need it to and won’t dry out with age, but is easy to remove and even reposition. This makes it a useful addition to your kids’ craft supplies, helping them get their colourful creations and school projects just right. Use it with plain or patterned gift wrap to create a truly unique present, or to seal birthday cards and letters. Because it is photo-safe and removable, it can also help make a colourful display of photos and postcards that can be taken down and rearranged whenever the mood takes you!This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch Expressions Tape in Blue, measuring 19mm wide by 7.62m long. Also available in Pink and Purple. Scotch Expressions Tape fits Scotch Desktop and Handheld Tape Dispensers, which make it super-quick and easy to unwind and cut off tape as you need it. Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 roll of tape

product.title: Scotch Satin Tape Strip Refills Ref 90-ST
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Colour: DESIGN 1Product DescriptionMake wrapping at Christmas and birthdays easy with Scotch Pop Up Tape! Wrapping can be stressful time with bits of tape everywhere, and never having enough hands. Scotch Pop Up Tape Strips can change all that. These clever little pre-cut strips of tape pop up one by one from the Scotch Pop Up Tape Dispenser - leaving both hands free to wrap. The tape features a unique satin finish that has low reflectivity and almost disappears on most gift wrap papers for a seamless join. It makes special gifts and parcels look fantastic, and sticks securely to ensure your presents remain under wraps! Scotch Pop Up Tape Refill Packs are designed for use with Scotch Pop Up Tape Dispensers. This pack of refills contains 3 pads and each pad contains 75 pre-cut strips of tape, measuring 19mm x 50mm (225 strips in total.) Scotch Pop Up Tape Dispensers are available in two formats: the Handband Dispenser is mounted on an elasticated strap to wear around the wrist or hand; the DeskGrip Dispenser has a unique gripper base that sticks to smooth horizontal surfaces without adhesive – great for use on a desk or table.Scotch is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pack of Scotch Pop-Up Tape Refills; 3 pads of refills per pack

product.title: Scotch Expressions Tape, Pink, 19mm x 7.62mm, C214-PNK, 1 Roll
product.product_body: Product DescriptionDecorate and personalise your craft projects, gift wrapping, home-made cards, stationery and more with this bright and exciting Scotch Expressions Tape. It’s the Scotch Tape you know and trust, in a range of vibrant colours that will really stand out from the crowd!Scotch Magic Tape has always been the essential tape for home, school and office. Scotch Expressions Tape offers many of the same benefits, but with an added burst of fun and personality! Its elegant, matt finish is sleek and contemporary, and can be written on in pen, pencil or marker – great for adding notes and comments to scrapbooks and albums, or for labelling personal items like notebooks, folders and pencil tins. The tried and tested adhesive holds strongly for as long as you need it to and won’t dry out with age, but is easy to remove and even reposition. This makes it a useful addition to your kids’ craft supplies, helping them get their colourful creations and school projects just right. Use it with plain or patterned gift wrap to create a truly unique present, or to seal birthday cards and letters. Because it is photo-safe and removable, it can also help make a colourful display of photos and postcards that can be taken down and rearranged whenever the mood takes you!This pack contains 1 roll of Scotch Expressions Tape in Pink, measuring 19mm wide by 7.62m long. Also available in Blue and Purple. Scotch Expressions Tape fits Scotch Desktop and Handheld Tape Dispensers, which make it super-quick and easy to unwind and cut off tape as you need it. Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 roll of tape

product.title: Scotch Red Shoe Tape Dispenser with 1 roll tape
product.product_body: Product DescriptionPersonalise your workspace with this bright, funky tape dispenser in the shape of a red shoe! A great gift for shoe-loving students, colleagues, teachers and friends, this handy desktop essential will make life a whole lot easier and more stylish when it comes to finding and using their Scotch Magic tape. It’s a perfect choice for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, leaving presents and end-of-term ‘thank-you’s’.Scotch Magic Tape dispensers keep your tape within easy reach – great when you’re wrapping presents, sealing envelopes or mending documents and books. The red shoe option is weighted, making it easy to unwind and tear off a piece of tape one-handed.This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape measuring 19mm wide by 33m long - when it runs out, it’s quick and easy to refill with a roll of Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on; it won’t yellow with age and it won’t ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you’ll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser!Scotch and Magic are trademarks of 3M Company.Box ContainsOne tape dispenser in the shape of a red shoe and one roll of Scotch Magic Tape (19mm x 33m)

product.title: Scotch Stiletto Shoe Tape Dispenser - Black
product.product_body: Product DescriptionYou've got the little black dress, now you can accessorise with a little black shoe. Scotch Magic Tape dispensers keep your tape within easy reach – great when you’re wrapping presents, sealing envelopes or mending documents and books. To ensure it stays upright, a clear plastic disc balances the shoe at the heel. This dispenser is supplied with one roll of Scotch Magic Tape measuring 19mm wide by 8.9m long - when it runs out, it’s quick and easy to refill with a roll of Scotch Magic Tape up to 33 metres long. The essential tape for home and office, Scotch Magic Tape is virtually invisible when applied. It has a smooth, matt surface which can be written on; it won’t yellow with age and it won’t ghost on photocopies. Value packs containing multiple rolls are also available, so you’ll always have a supply for your Scotch Tape Dispenser.Box ContainsOne tape dispenser in the shape of a black shoe and one roll of Scotch Magic Tape (19mm x 8.9m)

product.product_body: IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTIONScotch-BriteTM Non Scratch Design Scourers Cellulose Twin Pack 026281From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine yourhousehold surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaningchallenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny ofyour house.Brighten up your kitchen with stylish Scotch-BriteTM Non-Scratch Design Scourers. These colourful sponges are made fromsuper-absorbent cellulose that makes quick work of wiping worktops and soaking up spills. Shaped to provide a comfortable grip,they can reach into tight corners for a really thorough clean when washing up and wiping down. Their light duty scouring compositionis safe to use on non-stick cookware, glass, plastic and even delicate surfaces.This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Non Scratch Design Scourers, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water.Each pack includes 1 x blue sponge and 1 x purple sponge, with a different design on the scouring surface of each. Some delicate cookware,soft plastic or painted surfaces may scratch. Test first on an inconspicuous area with desired pressure. Rinse thoroughly before and aftereach use, especially if using products containing bleach. Not for aquarium use.Multi surface non-scratch sponge scourers to brighten up your kitchenIdeal for delicate cookware, mopping up spills or wiping down surfacesComfortable, easy-to-use shapeHighly effective cleaning with no need for chemicalsEND OF IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTION

product.title: Scotch-Brite Non Scratch Design Sponge Scourer Twin Pack (Pack of 5)
product.product_body: Take the hard graft out of housework with the range of high performance cleaning products from Scotch-Brite. For years, 3M have listened to customers and taken on their cleaning challenges in an effort to make life easier. All Scotch-Brite household products have been developed with those pain points in mind, giving you the right tools to speed through your chores with gleaming results all over the house.A Scotch-Brite Non-Scratch Sponge Scourer adds a pop of cheerful colour to your sink area. Despite their light-hearted appearance, these sponge scourers are made from super-absorbent cellulose that makes quick work of wiping surfaces and mopping up spills. Shaped to provide a comfortable grip, they can reach into tight corners for a really thorough clean and have a light duty scouring surface that is safe to use on non-stick cookware, glass, plastic and delicate surfaces. This item includes 5 packs, each containing 2 Scotch-Brite Non-Scratch Design Sponge Scourers (10 in total). Each pack includes 1 x blue sponge and 1 x purple sponge, with a different design on the scouring surface of each. Keep a stock under the sink, share others with friends or family and enjoy the Scotch-Brite feeling of clean for less.When they need a wash, pop your Scotch-Brite Non-Scratch Sponge Scourers in the dishwasher or sanitise them in boiling water. It is recommended that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage. Not for aquarium use.Scotch-Brite is a trademark of 3M Company.

We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about theircleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook orcranny of your house.Grime and dirt can easily collect in the grout lines of your bathroom, trapping germs and making mould a potential risk.Tight corners, tricky taps and high tiling can also make thorough cleaning a challenge.Scotch-Brite Grout Scrubbers are made from a gentle but highly effective material, for superior non-scratch scrubbing.They are specially designed to thoroughly clean the grout lines in your tub or shower, with a light-weight water-resistanthandle that helps you reach and clean those trickier areas.END OF IDEABRIGHT LTD DESCRIPTION

features.feature: Brand : Scotch-Brite

product.title: 3M Scotch ATG Advanced Tape Glider Kit Pink Plus 2 Refill Rolls, i.e. 2 rolls in the kit plus 2 extra rolls
product.product_body: The Scotch® Pink ATG - The Photo Safe Sticky Tape Glider Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider Kit. The finger trigger allows for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, while the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience! With this handy kit, you get two rolls of photo-safe acid-free tape too, which gives giving you everything you need for mess-free, professional-finish crafting. You'll love how the Advanced Tape Glider cuts out the mess and lets you show off your creative side. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, this clever kit will make your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep through paper and cause wrinkling, the tape leaves flat, neat lines that stick to all sorts of crafting surfaces. Our Acid-Free Adhesive Transfer Tape is perfect for mounting photographs onto card or updating scrapbooks or albums. It won't discolour or damage your photos and it's strong and durable - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page. Popular with craft bloggers and professional stationery makers, this kit is an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. Strong and durable, our General Purpose Tape is great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out, yellow or peel and can be used on all sorts of textiles - an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. For use only with 6 mm rolls of tape.

features.feature: Ideal for scrapbooking, card-making, photo albums and stationery
Accurate hand dispenser for Scotch® ATG adhesive transfer tapes
Safe, quick and easy to use with no messy clean-up
Creates thin, neat adhesive lines
1 Scotch advanced tape glider in pink and 2 rolls of acid-free tape per pack, plus 2 rolls of general purpose.

product.title: Monitor Stand, 350mm wide, 250mm deep, 250mm tall, Various Colours Available (Red)
product.product_body: A bespoke item designed and manufactured by SignLine as we couldn't find a suitable monitor stand available anywhere else. The cast acrylics used give a nice gloss finish, the monitor is at eye level and the compartments give plenty of storage space to help keep your desk tidy. The stand is supplied in flat pack form, I have glued one together and another 3 have been slotted together, a tube of super glue is included which you can use to adhere the stand together if you prefer but it is best to assemble a few times to be sure you are happy doing that before adhering. A small amount of super glue can be placed into a channel at a time before placing the sections in. Assemble as shown in the photo's, the top is last to go on and locks all the sections together.

features.feature: Made in the UK using High Quality 5mm Cast Acrylic by Perspex.
Sized to give a good height position for your monitor, most stands are not tall enough.
Available in Various colours, please request any required colour that is not listed and we will list it if available.
From desk surface to top of monitors in sample photos is 700mm.
350mm wide x 250mm platform, 250mm in height. Storage areas are 148mm wide by 245mm tall and 235mm deep.

product.title: Monitor Stand, 350mm wide, 250mm deep, 250mm tall, Various Colours Available (Dark Blue)
product.product_body: A bespoke item designed and manufactured by SignLine as we couldn't find a suitable monitor stand available anywhere else. The cast acrylics used give a nice gloss finish, the monitor is at eye level and the compartments give plenty of storage space to help keep your desk tidy. The stand is supplied in flat pack form, I have glued one together and another 3 have been slotted together, a tube of super glue is included which you can use to adhere the stand together if you prefer but it is best to assemble a few times to be sure you are happy doing that before adhering. A small amount of super glue can be placed into a channel at a time before placing the sections in. Assemble as shown in the photo's, the top is last to go on and locks all the sections together.

features.feature: Made in the UK using High Quality 5mm Cast Acrylic by Perspex.
Sized to give a good height position for your monitor, most stands are not tall enough.
Available in Various colours, please request any required colour that is not listed and we will list it if available.
From desk surface to top of monitors in sample photos is 700mm.
350mm wide x 250mm platform, 250mm in height. Storage areas are 148mm wide by 245mm tall and 235mm deep.

product.title: Silverline 151212 Chainsaw File - 4.0 mm/5/32 inch
product.product_body: Product DescriptionRound file designed for sharpening chainsaw chains quickly and accurately. Attached guide plate holds file at correct depth, clear markings for easy angle alignment.Manufacturer's DescriptionRecognised and trusted throughout the UK and Europe, Silverline’s comprehensive range of tools meet both current and future demands. These products utilise the better technology, ensuring Silverline customers get better tools. The Silverline range includes over 5000 hand and power tools for use in the home, garden and workshop. Subjected to thorough testing, Silverline delivers tools that comply with the better standards in quality and safety. Through continuous monitoring and improvement of their suppliers, they provide tools that are approved and certified with long guarantees, so you can be sure you’re investing in the best tools on the market today. Silverline cares about the environment. As their products are sourced from factories around the world, they run continuous improvement programmes to ensure they only deliver quality tools that comply with the very latest environmental standards. Silverline is committed to supporting human rights and upholding moral and ethical standards. They monitor their supply chain closely through a controlled programme of factory audits and assessments. To pass their audit, all suppliers must actively comply with all relevant local and international legislation and demonstrate a good, safe and healthy working environment.

product.title: PEARLESCENT PREMIUM LINO PRINTING INKS 300ml Tubes - Pearlescent Violet
product.product_body: Viscous, water based printing inks specially formulated to give a smooth flow resulting in excellent coverage and printing properties. This non permanent ink has been formulated using high quality specialist raw materials to give enhanced tack and transfer for superior printability and performance. The drying time has also been optimised to give a good balance of 'on tray working time' at typical ambient conditions. All tubes are 300ml.

product.title: MOUNTED SOFTCUT PRINTING BLOCKS - 300x200x3mm (Pack of 10)
product.product_body: SoftCut is designed as an alternative to Lino. Formulated for very easy cutting, it holds fine detail without crumbling and yet stands hard against the pressures of printing presses. Can be drawn on with pencil, due to its near white surface. Finely smooth on one side, textured on the other, SoftCut is both double sided and flexible. Mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks, giving extra rigidity allowing the user to achieve consistent, flat prints.

features.feature: Mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks, giving extra rigidity allowing the user to achieve consistent, flat prints.
Formulated for very easy cutting, it holds fine detail without crumbling and yet stands hard against the pressures of printing presses.
SoftCut is both double sided and flexible.
Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.

product.title: SOFTCUT PRINTING BLOCKS - 300x200x3mm (pack 10)
product.product_body: SoftCutTM is manufactured by us to be the bestalternative to Lino - designed to extend the blockprinting experience to a greater range of people.SoftCutTM is formulated for very easy cutting. It holds fine detail without crumbling and yet stands hard against the pressures of printing presses, this new material can be drawn on in pencil, due to its near white surface. Finely smooth on one side, textured on the other, SoftCutTM is both double sided and flexible. Also available in 45mm diameter discs, which whencombined with our specially developed Baren, can be used to create your own stamps.Moulded in a clean environment, fully compliant with both EN 71 and the European Directive for Phthalates.

features.feature: Softcut, the latest innovation in block cutting and printing!
Super-smooth surface makes cutting easy, cutters simply glide through with minimum effort. The finished softcut block can be displayed as a work of art in its own right.
Softcut prints well on most papers, card and fabric, and can even print on curved surfaces due to its flexibility.

product.title: A4 10mm Print Foam (Pack of 10 Sheets)
product.product_body: Our smooth-surface Printfoam is 10mm thick allowing deeper and more detailed impressions and is ideal for use as a fun and safe introduction to block printing for younger users. Impressions can be made in the foam blocks using either pointed or even relatively blunt objects (a pencil or wooden lollypop stick) or draw directly into the sheet to create an image. To make a print simply use an ink roller to apply block printing inkto the surface in the normal way. Printfoam can be easily cut into shapes with a craft knife or scissors, and is commonly used for model making.

features.feature: 10mm thick allowing deeper and more detailed impressions.
A safe introduction to block printing for younger users.
Printfoam can be easily cut into shapes with a craft knife or scissors, and is commonly used for model making.

product.title: 3M NexcareTM Steri-Strip® First Aid Skin Closures
product.product_body: These alow allergy Steri-StripTM skin closures are highly effective for closing deeper wounds and reducing scarring. Use them to close the edges of cuts, reduce bleeding and prevent cuts from reopening. Important: Steri-Strip® skin closures are not an alternative to stitches. If the wound is deep and bleeding continuously, seek medical assistance immediately.

features.feature: Advanced protection for deeper cuts
Easy to apply and remove
Low allergy
Effective for closing deeper wounds and reducing scarring.
Contains 5 x 3mm x 75mm and 3 x 6mm x 75mm sized strips

MDT-A meets the requirements of VDE 0278 part 3.

Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design 2 Packs of 2 Pads
product.product_body: From quick, light tasks to a deep clean, Scotch-Brite has developed the perfect tools for you to clean, scrub or shine your household surfaces until they sparkle! We have spent years listening to our customers and learning about their cleaning challenges, enabling us to develop our high performance range of cleaning products for each surface, nook or cranny of your house. When you need to shift stubborn grease or burnt-on food, Scotch-BriteTM Heavy Duty Scourers With Nailsaver Design will quickly scour and clean, working up to 50% faster than similar sponge scourers and with twice the efficiency. Their easy-grip design makes them comfortable to hold, whilst their coarse scouring surface makes cleaning a breeze. For worry-free washing up, these pads have a unique design which protects your nails, reducing the need for gloves and the likelihood of broken nails. Once you've powered through the pots, use the super absorbent sponge to wipe down surfaces and the sink. Thanks to their heavy duty cleaning power, these scourers are not suitable for non-stick, delicate or highly polished surfaces. This pack contains 2 Scotch-Brite Heavy Duty Scourers with Nailsaver Design, which can be re-used by washing in either the dishwasher or in boiling water. We recommend that before using them on a new surface you test first on an inconspicuous area and allow to dry to verify no surface damage.

features.feature: Heavy duty sponge scourers with a unique ridge to protect finger nails
Make quick work of grease and burnt-on food
Ideal for cleaning stubborn residues from pots, pans ovens and grills
Superior foam sponge helps dry surfaces quickly
Long-lasting and reusable. 2 packs of 2 sponge scourers

product.title: Scotch-BriteTM Mini Lint Roller Coloured Handles
product.product_body: Scotch-BriteTM Mini Lint Roller Coloured Handles. Fluff, pet-hair and dust are part of everyday life, but they can make your clothes, furniture or car look dirty or unkempt. Scotch-BriteTM Lint Rollers have been developed with "sticky" technology to quickly lift lint, fluff, pet-hair, dust and other dry residue from car seats, upholstery and even your clothes without damaging fabric. Hold the lint roller by the ergonomically-designed handle and pass the roll across the fabric you wish to clean. When the top-sheet is covered with fluff and appears to have reduced stickiness, tear it off at the perforation to reveal a new sticky sheet beneath. Save the label to wrap around the outside of your lint roller and you'll stop it from sticking to everything else in your drawer or picking up dirt when you're not using it. A must-have for pet owners, they are also great to keep handy in the car, in your desk or by the front door for a quick spruce up of your clothing before you leave. This mini size is perfectly proportioned for keeping in your briefcase, glove box or handbag - for a neat neckline or a spotless suit on-the-go. This item is a mini lint roller with a comfortably-designed handle and perforated "sticky" sheets. It offers superior adhesion and is quick and easy to use - this is how we roll!

features.feature: Sticky sheets for superior adhesion
Comfortable, ergonomically designed handle
Super sticky technology
Perfect for keeping in a glove box, briefcase or handbag

Futuro Sport Tennis Adjustable Elbow Support with Tendon Pad Cushion in Black - 17.8 cm - 35.6 cm
product.product_body: Product DescriptionFeaturing a patented Tendon Pad cushion, this elbow support can help releive the symptoms associated with tennis or golfer’s elbow, medically known as epicondylitis. It places gentle, targeted pressure on elbow tendons and muscles to help provide relief. It is one of Futuro's supports and braces from 3M--the makers of 3M Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, Micropore First Aid Tape, Littmann Stethoscopes and many other leading healthcare brands. Futuro is among the most trusted names in supports with a strong heritage and is the number-one-selling brand globally. Futuro has been manufacturing joint and knee bandages in the USA since 1917 when the first arch brace was invented. A panel of experts including engineers, physicians and medical professionals are at the centre of the continuous product development of Futuro products, each product being specifically designed to provide the comfort, support and the proper fit needed to continue living an active life and speed recovery from injuries. Compared to other support products available, Futuro is confident that if you choose a Futuro product you will feel the difference of extra comfort in use, owing to the design of each product and the added benefit of adjustable products for a tailored fit. Depending on the injury you have and the compression level required, Futuro can help you choose the right product from their range.IndicationsThis support is designed to offer a firm, stabilising level of support.See all Product Description

features.feature: Support level: firm, stabilising
Patented tendon pad cushion places gentle, targeted pressure on elbow tendons and muscles to help provide relief
Use for tennis/golfer's elbow (epicondylitis), swelling, tendonitis
Breathable moisture wicking material for comfort
Size: adjustable 7 inches to 14 inches / 17.8 cm to 35.6 cm (measure around elbow for correct sizing)

product.title: Futuro Comfort Lift Reversible and Adjustable Beige Knee Support Medium 1 Pack
product.product_body: Product DescriptionWhether it's jogging one more mile, golfing the extra nine holes, or simply being able to keep active around the house when carrying an injury, Futuro braces and supports can help to give you the support, compression and confidence to keep going. Developed by trusted healthcare brand 3M in conjunction with a panel of medical experts, the range offers superb comfort, support and fit for a variety of joint problems and conditions.The knee is one of the largest joints in the human body, and one of the most complex. With its incredible three-dimensional range of motion, it can often be a source of pain due to injury, aging, surgery or physical inactivity. The Futuro Comfort Lift Knee Support provides relief and compression to knees that need it, helping to ease the discomfort of sprains, strains, arthritis and swelling without restricting normal movement. Made from breathable, dual-stretch knitted material, it incorporates a comfort panel to reduce ‘bunching’ behind the knee and is sleek enough to fit discreetly under clothing – enabling you to keep up with your busy schedule and walk through your day with confidence.This pack contains one Futuro Comfort Lift Knee Support in beige, size Medium. It is reversible and can be worn on either the left or the right knee, providing a mild level of support. The Medium size will fit knees with a diameter of 36.8-43.2cm (measure around the kneecap whilst in a standing position). Caution: This product contains natural rubber latex which may cause allergic reactions.Futuro is a trademark of 3M Company.IndicationsThis product is designed to offer a mild level of support.See all Product Description

product.title: 3M NEXCARE 360 ACTIVE ASST N1130ASD03
Nexcare Coldhot Maternity Compress
product.product_body: Product DescriptionNexcare ColdHot Therapy products are gel-filled compresses with dual purpose: they can provide either flexible ice or soothing heat as a drug-free way to treat pain and inflammation locally. The non-toxic gel is encased in a strong, reliable plastic envelope, which is shaped like a horseshoe to leave the nipple area free and flexible enough to mould to your breast and sit comfortably inside your nursing bra.The compresses are hand washable and reusable, and are supplied with soft fabric protective covers. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or warmed up by placing in hot water. Cold therapy can be an effective way to relieve breast congestion and alleviate pain in the case of mastitis or inflammation; when used warm, the compresses can help to stimulate milk flow, unblock ducts and soothe the discomfort of engorgement. They may also be used as an aid to reduce post-operative swelling and discomfort following breast surgery: Please consult your doctor before purchasing for this purpose.This pack contains 2 x maternity compresses, each with its own soft fabric protective cover. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product. Nexcare ColdHot Gel Compresses are also available in different formats for treating joints and other areas of the body.Nexcare and ColdHot are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains2 gel compresses2 soft fabric protective coversInstruction booklet

features.feature: Reusable cool/warm gel compresses for breastfeeding mothers
Ease discomfort caused by engorgement, blocked ducts and inflammation
Natural, immediate pain relief without drugs
Slip comfortably inside your bra
Pack contains 2 compresses, each with a soft fabric protective cover

product.title: Nexcare Neckwarmer Refill
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe neck can be a focal point of tension and stress, often causing pain to spread to the head and the rest of the body. Applying soothing heat is one of the oldest known, natural ways to treat muscular tension, relieving pain and promoting relaxation in the affected area.This pack contains 6 heat pads for use with the Nexcare Neck Warmer (not supplied) - a comfortable, easy-to-use collar that provides medication-free relief from aches and pains in the neck and shoulders. Simply remove one of the heat pads from its packet and shake it for a few seconds – no microwave or hot water required! Contact with the air will activate the heat pad, which will then continue to give off warmth for up to 7 hours. Slip the pad into the pocket of your neck warmer and position it directly over the back of the neck. Should you only need to use the neck warmer for a short period of time, the heat pad can be removed and stored in an airtight plastic bag, ready to use at a later date.Nexcare Neck Warmers are available from Amazon and larger pharmacies. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product for the first time.Nexcare is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains6 heat padsUser instructions

product.title: Nexcare Post Partum Support Medium
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe Nexcare Postpartum Support is a latex-free, elasticated support belt that provides gentle yet firm compression to support weakened abdominal muscles following childbirth. It can be particularly helpful after a caesarean section, giving security, comfort and protection for your abdomen as it heals.Fully adjustable with an easy-to-use Velcro fastening, the amount of support given can be altered by simply stretching the belt a little more or less and adjusting the fastening position. The latex-free composition and soft outer material is gentle on sensitive skin, and the belt is easy to put on and take off without help. Once in place, it sits smoothly and discreetly under your clothes, helping you return to normal activities with confidence.The Nexcare Postpartum Support can be hand washed in cold or warm water with mild detergent. It is not suitable for machine washing or tumble drying. This Medium size fits a waist measurement of 80-96cm; Large and Small sizes are also available. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product.Nexcare is a trademark of 3M Company.Box ContainsBeltInstruction booklet

product.title: Nexcare ColdHot Back and Abdomen Belt S/M
product.product_body: Product DescriptionNexcare Cold Hot Therapy products are gel-filled compresses with dual purpose: they can provide either flexible ice or comforting heat as a drug-free way to treat pain locally. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or freezer, or warmed up in the microwave or by placing in hot water. Choose cold therapy to treat acute injuries and relieve the pain of musculoskeletal injury (the cold will help to reduce the swelling, inflammation and pain); or heat to ease pain and reduce muscle spasm associated with chronic back pain, period pain and rheumatoid arthritis.Nexcare Cold Hot Gel Compresses are hand washable and reusable. This pack includes a simple-to-use, adjustable belt that holds the compress in place against the back or abdomen and gives light support. Simply cool or warm up your compress as per the instructions in the box, slip it into the pocket of the belt and secure the belt firmly in place. The belt is composed of several layers of fabric, including 3M’s patented Thinsulate insulation material. This helps keep the compress at a constant temperature for longer, giving you prolonged periods of pain relief before you need to re-cool or reheat it. Please note that cold therapy should be applied for a maximum of 20 minutes, before removing the compress for another 20 minutes and then reapplying. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product.Nexcare, Cold Hot and Thinsulate are trademarks of 3M Company.Box ContainsHot/cold gel compressInsulation beltUser instructions

features.feature: Reusable cold/hot gel compress with adjustable belt
Natural, drug-free relief from back and abdominal pain
Use cold to reduce swelling and inflammation, or warm to soothe muscular ache
Belt contains Thinsulate insulation fabric that helps to retain temperature for longer
Small/Medium size fits waist measurement up to 100cm

product.title: Nexcare Small/Medium ColdHot Back and Abdomen Belt
product.product_body: Product DescriptionThe Nexcare ColdHot Back & Abdomen Belt is a reusable cold/hot gel-filled compress for natural pain relief. Thanks to the layer of Thinsulate(TM) fabric the cover keeps a more stable temperature of the compress for a longer period of time. Comes is 2 sizes: S/M cm and L/XL cm. Can be used during pregnancy. The gel is safe and non toxic to use and also 99% biodegradable* which makes the product now more environmentally friendly. '* 99% of active ingredients as per Directive 84/449/EEC.'Box Contains1 x Nexcare Small/Medium ColdHot Back and Abdomen Belt

product.title: 3m Nexcare Coldhot Therapy Gel Maxi Pack
product.product_body: When you are suffering from localised pain and aches, sometimes you need relief on the spot. The NexcareTM ColdHot Therapy Gel Maxi Pack is a drug-free remedy which provides targeted soothing, for comfort where you need it the most. Nexcare ColdHot Therapy products are gel-filled compresses with dual purpose: they can provide either flexible ice or comforting heat as a drug-free way to treat pain locally. The non-toxic gel is encased in a strong, reliable plastic envelope which is flexible enough to wrap around joints or mould to a particular area of the body, even when frozen. The compresses are hand washable and reusable, and are supplied with a soft fabric protective cover. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or freezer, or warmed up in the microwave or by placing in hot water. Nexcare ColdHot Gel Compresses can provide effective relief from the pain of sports and soft tissue injuries, rheumatoid arthritis, inflammation, muscle tension, headaches, period pain, back pain and muscle stiffness or spasm. This compress measures 20cm x 30cm and is ideal for use on larger areas of the body such as the thighs, shoulders, back and abdomen. Simply cool or warm it as per the instructions in the box, slip it into the protective cover and hold it in place for as long as is comfortable. Please note that cold therapy should be applied for a maximum of 20 minutes, before removing the compress for another 20 minutes and then reapplying. If used for heat therapy, the compress will generally need re-warming after around 30 minutes. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product. A smaller sized (25.5cm x 10cm) Nexcare ColdHot Comfort Gel Compress is also available.

features.feature: A reusable large size gel compress that can be used hot or cold
A comforting alternative to medicine or pain-killers
Use cold to reduce inflammation or swelling. Use warm or hot to relieve aches and pains, or soothe muscular tension
Compress measures 20 x 30cm and comes with a soft fabric protective cover
Easy to apply position against the body for soothing relief, on the spot

The non-toxic gel is encased in a strong, reliable plastic envelope which is flexible enough to wrap around joints or mould to a particular area of the body, even when frozen. The compresses are hand washable and reusable, and are supplied with a soft fabric protective cover. A great alternative to dripping ice packs or leaky hot water bottles, they can be cooled in the fridge or freezer, or warmed up in the microwave or by placing in hot water. Nexcare Cold Hot Gel Compresses can provide effective relief from the pain of sports and soft tissue injuries, rheumatoid arthritis, inflammation, muscle tension, headaches, period pain, back pain and muscle stiffness or spasm.This compress measures 26.5cm x 10cm and is the ideal size for ankles, knees, elbows and the face or head. Simply cool or warm it as per the instructions in the box, slip it into the protective cover and use the elasticated strap to secure it in place for as long as is comfortable. Please note that cold therapy should be applied for a maximum of 20 minutes, before removing the compress for another 20 minutes and then reapplying. If used for heat therapy, the compress will generally need re-warming after around 30 minutes. Customers are advised to read the enclosed instructions carefully before using this product. Nexcare Cold Hot Gel Compresses are also available in a Maxi size (20cm x 30cm) for treating larger areas of the body.Nexcare and Cold Hot are trademarks of 3M Company.Box ContainsHot/cold gel compressProtective coverUser instructions

product.title: Post-it® Super Sticky Die Cut Star 150 Sheets
product.product_body: Product DescriptionPost-it Super Sticky Notes stick around as long as you need them to. Perfect for vertical and hard-to-stick-to surfaces, they are super-strong, super-adhesive, super-versatile - and super-stand-out. With a range of sizes and bright colours they really get your messages noticed.These notes feature a strong but repositionable adhesive - they can cling to both smooth and rough surfaces and stick for longer on walls, doors, mirrors and fridges. The adhesive won't leave marks on your walls or pages, so you can stick them wherever they’ll be noticed to keep your family, colleagues … and yourself organised!This pack contains 2 pads of star-shaped Post-it Super Sticky Notes – 1 x yellow pad and 1 x orange pad. Each pad contains 75 sheets measuring 73mm x 71mm - the perfect size for a quick reminder! Do your kids forget their lunchboxes or sports kit every morning? Why not leave them a message on the inside of the front door so they see it before they leave the house? Will your husband remember to pick up his dry cleaning on the way home? Stick a note on his laptop or briefcase so he’s got no excuse! The star shape adds a bit of fun and will really catch their attention.For messages that really stick, get organised with Super Sticky Post-it Notes!Box Contains2 star-shaped pads of Post-it Notes, each containing 75 sheets

product.title: TRADITIONAL LINO PRINTING BLOCKS MOUNTED 3.2mm GREY 300x300x3.2mm (pack of 10)
product.product_body: The traditional craft of Lino cutting and printing is a popular and creative educational pastime for children and adults in schools and colleges and an enjoyable creative craft at home. Lino prints well onto most papers, card and fabric giving endless creative opportunities, the opportunity to develop new skills and an appreciation of traditional printing techniques. Students can be encouraged to make their own prints, scrapbook artefacts, greeting cards, party invitations, gift labels, posters or even great works of art! Our Lino, made especially soft for block printing, is ideal for the student and master alike. Made using natural materials such as linseed oil and wood flour, our Lino is even biodegradable. Supplied in popular sizes, this is the first choice for education, hobby and professional use, achieving rapid results without specialist material or equipment. Can be used with oil and water based inks and prints on a wide range of paper, board and fabric.

features.feature: Manufactured in The United Kingdom!
Comes pre-mounted onto 18mm fibreboard blocks
Mounted Lino Printing Blocks
Provides activities for children and adults as well as helping British industry.

product.title: Standard Lino Roller 300mm
product.product_body: Our sturdy hard rubber roller is perfect for printmaking and a default choice for educationand purchasing authorities worldwide. The rigid body and steel brackets give strengthto the durable 70 shore EPDM rubber roller enabling heavy use, out-performing natural rubber. Suitable for use with both waterbased and oil based ink, and also resistant to solvents. The handle is manufactured fromdurable polypropylene with a hanging slot. The roller has self lubricating nylon bearings, EPDMrubber surface, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. It is designed so that wet rollerscan be turned over with the handle doubling as a stand for cleaner working. These versatilerollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than block printing, including scrapbooking,laminating and even industrial processes like the application of window films and vehiclegraphics.

product.title: 3MTM Citrus Cleaner Adhesive Remover Spray 500 ml, 12 Cans.
product.product_body: Adhesive Remover Spray - Eliminate Sticky Residue The strong citrus adhesive removal spray can be used to effectively remove grease, tar and adhesive residue. It is quick and easy to apply and perfect for use in the garage in bike, motorcycle, car and even boat maintenance. This spray can be used on projects large and small from cleaning concrete and printing presses to removing sticky residue left behind from sticky labels and tape. See Technical Data Sheet for 3M Citrus Cleaner Adhesive Remover Spray IMPORTANT: We recommend that you test products prior to use to ensure suitability. 3M can accept no responsibility for accidents resulting from the misuse of 3M products so if you need any guidance regarding applications or product selection, please call the 3M Tapes & Adhesives helpdesk.

features.feature: Super powerful adhesive remover spray cleaner can effectively remove grease, tar and adhesive residue
Aerosol spray can allows quick and easy application
Adhesive remover spray which can also be used to clean and degrease metal parts, motors, tools, printing presses and concrete
Pleasant citrus smell.
Clean annoying residue from sticky labels

product.title: 3M INDCLNRA Citrus Base Cleaner, 500 mL
product.product_body: Our 3M Citrus Base Cleaner helps soften and loosen grease, oil and grime. It is a citrus oil based cleaner that emulsifies when flushed with water and it contains no petroleum distillates. You can use this highly effective aerosol cleaner to clean and degrease metal parts, motors, tools, printing presses, concrete, or almost any dirty or greasy surface. After using this heavy-duty degreaser/cleaner, just wipe away with a shop towel. 3M Citris Base Cleaner also preps surfaces to help improve adhesive bonding. 3M aerosol chemicals contain no methylene chloride, chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs), or 1,1,1-trichloroethane (methyl chloroform). Not for sale or use in California. Consult local air quality rules before use.In thousands of factories and plants, 3M aerosol chemicals are used every day to save time and effort. Lubricating, cleaning, inhibiting rust, and other tough jobs become easy with the convenience and effectiveness of our formulated chemicals. Cleaners can also be used to prep surfaces and help improve adhesive bonding by removing dirt, grease and other contaminants, leaving a clean substrate. The compact cans fit in a tool box and readily go to any job site and help reduce storage space.

features.feature: Contains no chlorinated or petroleum based solvents
Cleans gently and leaves a pleasant citrus scent
Fresh citrus scent helps maintain a satisfactory work environment
Removes grease, oil, ink and most adhesives without harsh chemicals or hours of soaking
Can help prepare surfaces for adhesive bonding

product.title: 3M PERFECT IT III CLEANER CLAY 200g
product.product_body: 3M offers a wide range of paint rectification products designed to help bodyshops and amateur enthusiasts achieve the perfect finish quickly and efficiently. We know how important people's cars are to them and that they will do anything to keep them looking great, which is why we developed 3M Perfect-ItTM III Cleaner Clay.A great solution for denibbing and other paint rectification applications, this detailing clay will safely remove paint overspray and other contaminants from vehicle surfaces, including chrome, glass and paint, without scratching or marring.This product is moderately aggressive, which means that whilst it will not damage surfaces, it is strong enough to remove residues that have been imbedded in the paintwork. Vehicles are left smooth and ready for a more effective application of wax.

product.title: Nexcare Elastic Pregnancy Belly/Bump Support - Size 8-18
product.product_body: Product DescriptionNexcare Maternity Support is an adjustable support belt designed to afford the support you need during pregnancy, helping to spread the weight evenly and reduce pain experienced in the back and abdomen. The support lifts the abdomen to bring relief from increased weight and helps to reduce the severity of pain in the lower back as well as pelvic girdle pain. Improves postures due to stabilisation of the abdomen and back. With 8 out of 10 women complaining of backache during pregnancy it is a common problem that can be addressed with the Nexcare Maternity Support. Product comes with easy to follow instructions on the pack. Nexcare Products from 3M--the makers of 3M Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, Micropore First Aid Tape, Littmann Stethescopes and many other leading healthcare brands.Box Contains1 x Maternity Brace

Lifts the abdomen and helps relieve discomfort in your back & abdomen
Expands to accommodate baby's growth with a fully adjustable hook & loop closure
Suits pre-pregnancy dress size 8 - 18

product.product_body: Product DescriptionUniquely shaped Nexcare Aqua waterproof plasters are designed for a better seal around the wound, providing 360 degree protection. Based on a unique technology from 3M's healthcare division, the plasters are made from a very light, film-like material that provides tremendous waterproof properties and is less likely to be caught on objects due to its low profile. Nexcare Products from 3M--the makers of 3M Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, Micropore First Aid Tape, Littmann Stethescopes and many other leading healthcare brands.DirectionsAttention, see instructions for use.See all Product Description

features.feature: Nexcare Aqua 360 Plasters are seriously waterproof - keeping out dirt & germs.

product.title: 3MTM NexcareTM Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures, x 8 in each pack, 2 Packs.
product.product_body: When you have a deeper wound or cut to the skin, you need something more than a plaster to promote healing and protect against infection. NexcareTM Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures are highly effective for closing deeper wounds, such as cuts or surgery scars. These advanced Skin Closures will reduce bleeding and prevent cuts from re-opening, allowing the skin's natural healing process to take place more efficiently. Nexcare Steri-Strip Skin Closures are easy to apply and remove, and will provide immediate closure and protection for deeper wounds. They are low-allergy, meaning that they are highly tolerated by most people and have long-lasting staying power. The pack contains 5 strips of 3mm x 75 mm and 3 strips of 6 mm x 75 mm. Important: Steri-Strip First Aid Skin Closures are not an alternative to stitches. If the wound is deep and bleeding continuously, seek medical assistance immediately.

features.feature: Advanced protection for deeper cuts
Easy to apply and remove
Low allergy
Effective for closing deeper wounds and reducing scarring
Contains 5 x 3mm x 75mm and 3 x 6mm x 75mm sized strips in each pack

product.title: Command Forever Classic Small Metal Hook, Antique Bronze by 3M Command
Command Forever Classic Medium Metal Hook, Antique Bronze by 3M Command
Command Medium Antique Bronze Hooks with Strips (FC12-AB)
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Style Name: BronzeProduct DescriptionGive your bits and pieces a place to live with Command Antique Bronze Hooks. These decorative metal hooks can each hold up to 1kg in weight, making them the ideal organisational solution for your home or office. They can be applied to almost any flat, clean surface. When you want to rearrange, the hooks are easily and cleanly removed without damaging the surface underneath – no cracks, holes, damaged plaster, sticky residue or stains. Want to use a hook again? Just reattach it using a new Command Adhesive Strip – each pack includes a spare, and refill packs are available. These antique-effect hooks will complement classic home décor perfectly. The medium-sized version is ideal for hanging coats, towels and bathrobes. Many Command fans tell us that they use this type of hook to display their Christmas wreath on the front door, as the antique finish matches the rest of their door furniture. Once January rolls around, it’s easy to take down the hook without damaging the paintwork underneath, and the hook can be used year after year with replacement adhesive strips. Command products are perfect in rented accommodation where you can’t put screws in the walls or are worried about marks and stains. They hold strongly on a whole range of surfaces including paint, wood, metal and tiles, but aren’t suitable for use on wallpapered surfaces or for hanging antiques or other valuable or irreplaceable items. When you want to take one down, grasp the hook and slide it upwards to remove it from the mounting base. The hook and mounting base can be re-used with a new adhesive strip. To remove the Command Adhesive Strip from the wall, hold the plastic base gently and pull the tab straight down, slowly stretching it until the strip releases from the wall. All of these instructions are detailed on the back of the pack. Command is a trademark of 3M Company.Box Contains1 pack, each containing 1 hook and 2 medium adhesive strips.

It conforms snugly around contours that are most difficult to bandage and accommodates movement without loosening.Preferred by veterinary professionals; it allows skin to breathe through its cool, lightweight, porous material and absorbs virtually no moisture.Use it as a hoof wrap, for rundown protection or dressing secural, to support sprains and fractures and as a tail wrap.Available in a wide choice of colours Vetrap is a must for the first aid kit.For support and protection, stick with Vetrap tape.Box ContainsVetrap bandaging tape x 18Individually wrapped with instructions for use

3M 9088 Double-Sided High Performance Clear Tape; 12mm x 50m
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Style Name: MYLAMO3M 9088 High Performance Double-Sided Clear Tape; 12mm x 50mA clear tape with a white paper liner; this modified acrylic adhesive tape offers a temperature range of up to 93°C and has good solvent resistance and very good UV resistance.These products combine a very high level of adhesive peel and shear performance. The adhesive system used on these products provides good adhesion to both high and low surface energy substrates. The excellent initial tack ensures that a bond of good integrity is achieved soon after application.3M Double-Sided tapes are suitable on a wide range of surfaces, including stainless steel, rubber, polycarbonate, felt, foam and non-woven parts, making them ideal for sign makers and shop fitters, for point-of-sale and printers.Sold as a single 12mm x 50m roll; the product will be shipped by Royal Mail Second Class Post, and should be delivered within 3-5 working days. Orders submitted and paid before noon on weekdays, will be shipped the same day.

product.title: 3MTM ScotchgardTM Resilient Floor Protector - 3.8Ltr Pouch/Pouches (2)
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 2Make stripping a thing of the past with the new 3MTM ScotchgardTM Resilient Floor Protector, with its easy application system it provides a quick and simple method for protecting your vinyl floor. Scotchgard Resilient Floor Protector is not a floor finish, it's a proprietary, non yellowing, low odour hybrid formulation that protects and enhances your floors natural appearance. Just two coats produce a clean, bright appearance that's up to twice more resistant to abrasion than traditional floor finishes. Recommended for use with the 3MTM Easy Shine Applicator Kit; suitable for Vinyl Tile and Sheet flooring. - No more stripping - easy and fast to apply - Tough long-lasting protection - Just 2 coats for initial application; 1 coat for future applications - Hardens 40% faster, also reducing the risk of early damage - Low odour - Twice as resistant to abrasion than traditional floor finishes*

features.feature: Tough long-lasting protection

product.title: 3M - Sorbent, High-Capacity, Folded Maintenance, 10 1/2 Gallon Capacity - Sold As 1 Box - Easy-to-use solution for cleaning up spills, drips, and fluid leaks.
product.product_body: Four sorbents in one. It can be used as a boom, pillow, pad, or roll, which means you stock one product to meet your sorbent needs. Perforations every 16 inches allow you to select the length required, so there?s less wasted sorbent. Comes in a handy dispenser box for easy, on-site use. 3M?s high capacity sorbent technology: has increased fluid-holding capacity which means less sorbent used; allows for simple reclamation for recycling of valuable liquids and re-use of sorbent; and minimizes sorbent waste for disposal. Sorbents Type: Roll; Absorbing Volume (Unit): 10 1/2 gal; Length: 50 ft; Width: 5"".

product.title: Scotch-Brite Surface Preparation Pad 15" (10 x Pads)
product.product_body: Scotch-Brite Surface Preperation Pads require only neutral cleaner or water to effectively remove floor finish, preparing the floor for finish application.This premium quality Scotch-BriteTM floor pad effectively removes floor finish, leaving a surface ready for recoating. Unlike most floor stripping pads, the Surface Preparation Pad works efficiently with just neutral cleaner or water, reducing the need for chemical strippers, and reducing labour and material costs normally associated with the process. Application: Stripping For Use On: Concrete, Marble, Terrazzo, Vinyl, Wood Application: Floor Stripping Pad Diameter: 305-501mm Machine Speed: 150-400 RPM Pad Colour: Brown UPC#: 0-48011-29591-6 3M ID: 70071159316

product.title: 3M Protective Eyewear 1880
product.product_body: Can easily be worn over prescription glasses. Exposure to blood, body fluids, flying debris and contaminated materials could impair your vision during surgical procedures and damage your eyes.The adjustable anatomical design of the 3MTM Eyewear incorporates clear panoramic lenses to provide freedom of vision. Combined with the ability to wear them over prescription glasses and their lightweight construction, you can be confident that you are comfortably protected. Health care environments where safety glasses may be required include: * Operating rooms * Casting rooms * Labour and delivery rooms * Emergency rooms * Intensive Care Units * (Central) Sterilisation departments (CSSD) * Laboratories and microbiological processing * Mortuary 3MTM Protective Eyewear 1880 is easy to clean for reuse; wash them under running water with detergent and dry with a soft cloth. They can also be disinfected in accordance with infection control protocols. IMPORTANT- 3MTM Protective Eyewear 1880 WILL NOT PROTECT against nuclear radiation, X-rays, laser beams and low temperature infra-red (IR) radiation emitted by low temperature sources. 3MTM Eyewear 1880 is CE marked and fulfils the requirements of Annex II of the Directive.

features.feature: Easy to clean and reusable; made from durable, impact resistant materials
Adjustable side arms mould comfortably to facial contours for an improved fit
Panoramic lens provide a broad field of vision
Lightweight for improved comfort
Anti-fog and anti-reflective lens coating offer better visual clarity
