product.title: Lino Cutter No 10 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 10 Cutter. Same as number nine but with a wider "vee" shape and a more rounded base to produce lines up to 3.5mm wide. As a number nine cutter, a very easy action.

features.feature: Wider "vee" shape and a more rounded base to produce lines up to 3.5mm wide
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 9 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 9 Cutter. A deep "vee" cutter for narrow lines gives good results in lino but care needed not to go too deep, has a very easy action in tougher materials.

features.feature: A deep "vee" cutter for narrow lines
Very easy action in tougher materials
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 8 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 8 Cutter. A wide and deep cutter able to cut up to 6mm wide. Care is needed not to go too deep but a favourite tool of the experienced lino cutter for bold pieces of work.

features.feature: A wide and deep cutter able to cut up to 6mm wide
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 7 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 7 Cutter. A flat bottomed wide cutter with safety edges each side. Use the unground sides to prevent shaving the edge of a previously cut line and to remove a 3mm (0.120") wide flat trough or tidy up unwanted cut lines in the design background.

features.feature: A flat bottomed wide cutter with safety edges each side
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 6 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 6 Cutter. A flat radius cutter for shallow, wide cuts or for shaving at a side wall to reduce the printed area and leave a strong shallow angle. A clever trick is to use this cutter vertically spun between the fingers to cut a 4mm circle in SoftCutTM (or less with practice) which is useful for the centre of eyes, with either the centre part left to print or the centre removed.

features.feature: A flat radius cutter for shallow, wide cuts
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 5 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 5 Cutter. A thin line marking tool for making the first lines to define the design before using other cutters to remove the unwanted background. It can be pushed or dragged across the surface and turned very easily to describe curves and wavy lines. Cut deep into the lino or SoftCutTM to define the limit of material removal particularly useful with SoftCutTM as the material can cling at the end of a cut.

features.feature: A thin line marking tool for making the first lines to define the design before using other cutters
Can be pushed or dragged across the surface and turned very easily to describe curves and wavy lines
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 4 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 4 Cutter. A wide, rounded bottom "vee" cutter for lines 3mm wide with 45˚ walls for strength of print surface particularly important for fragile detail and unsupported straight lines such as a narrow tree branch with large open spaces each side in lino. A fast remover of material.

features.feature: A wide, rounded bottom "vee" cutter for lines 3mm wide with 45˚ walls
Important for fragile detail and unsupported straight lines
A fast remover of material
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 3 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 3 Cutter. A tight, round cutter able to cut a 2mm deep sided line where needed. Great in straight lines, but more difficult to turn. Great in SoftCutTM but cut too deep in lino and the upright walls of the cut can leave little support and weaken the top surface. With practice, it's useful for cutting small circles by using a swivel motion.

features.feature: A tight, round cutter able to cut a 2mm deep sided line where needed.
Great in straight lines, but more difficult to turn
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 2 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 2 Cutter A universal and easy to use tool with a low angle of attack. Commonly used as a basic first time tool to cut lines up to 1.5mm(0.060") or less.

features.feature: A universal and easy to use tool with a low angle of attack
Commonly used as a basic first time tool to cut lines up to 1.5mm (0.060") or less
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 1 (Box of 5)
product.product_body: No. 1 Cutter For fine lines and cross hatching. Use at a steep angle and push forward with light pressure being sure not to go deep. Never try to plunge any cutter deeper than the ground sides of the point. With practice, a line of 0.5mm (0.020") or less is possible in SoftCutTM material and a little wider in Lino. Care is needed when inking up over lines this fine as it is easy to push the ink into shallow lines with a soft brayer (lino roller).

features.feature: No. 1 Cutter For fine lines and cross hatching
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab3 Kids 7-inch Tablet
product.product_body: Product DescriptionWith a bright, easy-to-use interface and kid-friendly app store, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids is the ideal tablet for your kids' digital playing and learning time. Preloaded with top-ranked apps for kids, the lightweight Galaxy Tab 3 Kids also features a built-in camera and parental controls for access and time limits. It transforms from kid to standard mode so you can enjoy the same familiar features as a regular Galaxy Tab 3.Interactive Kids Mode for playing and learningKids' Store with fun, top-ranked appsParental controls to manage access and set time limitsDurable design withstands daily drops and spillsStandard mode offers features of regular Galaxy Tab 3Fast processor; 7-inch HD display; 8GB memoryFun and Interactive Kids Mode is Easy to UseThe Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids features a kid-centric interface with bright colours and animated characters to make playing and learning more fun for your little one. Each app appears as a card that your child can select by simply tapping. Kids can personalise their play by adding their name, choosing a character to guide them, and changing the background.The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids has a brilliant 7-inch display, with HD 1024x600 resolution, so text is clearer and colours are brighter. The powerful 1.2 GHz dual-core processor makes it ideal for downloading apps and games, and watching your favorite movies.Kids' Store Full of Child-Friendly AppsSamsung's Kids' Store is filled with top apps for learning and playing. The kid-friendly apps are organised by category, so your kids can browse apps based on their preferences. Instead of buying, kids add each app to a wish list that can be accessed through parental controls, letting you choose which ones to purchase.Not only will you have full control over what apps your kids buy and explore, you can also choose your own Google Play apps to add to the Kids Mode by simply checking off those apps in Application Manager. Add Skype if you want to let them video chat with Grandma, or add video apps like Netflix.Easy Camera Lets Your Kid Be the PhotographerThe built-in camera is specially designed for kids to take pictures and shoot videos. They can use the 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera for silly faces, or flip it around to capture their surroundings with the 3-megapixel rear camera. Virtual stickers let them play pretend and dress up their pictures with different features and accessories. Kids Gallery and Kids Video store all their photos and videos so they can revisit their favorite shots. Parental control mode lets you access their work in your gallery and share with other relatives.Parental Controls Keep Kids SafeThe Galaxy Tab 3 Kids includes features just for parents, so you can hand over the tablet with peace of mind. A secure password entry gives you access to parental controls that let you set time restrictions on their usage, control what they view, and choose which apps you want to purchase. Lightweight, Compact Design for Little HandsThe lightweight, 7-inch design makes the Galaxy Tab 3 Kids ideal for little hands. It weighs less than 1lb, so it's easy for little ones to hold in their car seat or for you to carry in your purse or nappy bag. Easily Switch to Familiar Galaxy Tab 3 Home Screen The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids allows you to easily switch from Kids Mode to standard mode, giving you access to the same interface and features of the regular Galaxy Tab 3. Both modes can coexist, so you can switch back and forth without losing content. This makes it easy for parents to stream videos and music, read e-books, or browse up to 750,000 apps from Google Play before switching back to Kids Mode. Product Information This tablet comes installed with Android 4.1.2, Jelly Bean, contains a 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, and has a 7-inch display with 1024x600 resolution, a 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera, and a 3-megapixel rear-facing camera. It also comes with 8GB of internal memory and features a microSD card slot (microSD card sold separately) that allows you to add up to 32GB of additional memory. The tablet measures 7.4 by 4.37 by 0.39 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.67lbs including the battery.Box ContainsGalaxy TabletData CableAC AdapterUser Documentation

product.title: CNC Cut Lettering On Locators, 5mm Cast Acrylic, All of EU Origin (1200mm)
product.product_body: Your one stop shop for all your cnc cut lettering and logo's. You contact us and tell us your requirements, text, font, colour etc, we send you scale designs for approval and make any changes, we advise you what you need to order to get what you require, you order it, we cut it, pack it and send it, you install it using our fitting templates and instructions! All lettering has locator studs on rear, we supply the cups to suit, you tape drawing into place, drill and fix cups, then push the studs on rear of letetrs into cups, done job.

features.feature: Cast acrylic lettering. Complete with locator studs bonded to rear and fixing cups to suit.
Includes paper fitting template. Choice of 1000's of fonts, this can be liased before ordering/production. Choice of 50+ colours, this can be liased before ordering/production.

product.title: 45mm Self Adhesive Softcut Printing Stamps (Pack of 10)
product.product_body: Packs of 10 self-adhesive SoftCutTM Printing Stamps for use with the 3 in 1 Lino Cutter & Baren Kit and the 3 in 1 Lino Cutter & StampCarving Kit. Simply carve your own stamp designsusing these discs of our easy to cut SoftCutTM material.

features.feature: For use with the 3 in 1 Lino Cutter & Baren Kit & 4 in 1 Lino Cutter & Stamp Carving Kit
Add to the Baren Kit and have your own stamp making collection

product.title: Ink Tray 240 x 200mm
product.product_body: New rigid polypropylene easy-clean tray is 243mm x 202mm and a useful 16mm deep.Complete with Euro hanger for planogrammerchandising or convenient storage at home, this tray is for use with roller sizes up to 200mm.Ideal for mixing paint, PVA and other water based materials, its slightly angled walls make it useful for all types of crafts that have 'runaway' items such as bead-making.

features.feature: Easy clean tray
Ideal for mixing paint, PVA and other water based materials
Useful for all types of crafts that have 'runaway' items such as bead-making

product.title: Scotch Atg700 Adhesive Applicator-For .5" & .75" T
product.product_body: home-office-furniture-sets

product.title: Scotch ATG700 - Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator, Clear Cover
product.product_body: Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator

product.title: Brand New Scotch ATG700 Adhesive Applicator-For .5" & .75" Tape
product.product_body: 3M-Scotch ATG 700 Adhesive Applicator. It applies a thin strong adhesive that bonds instantly. The adhesive goes on easily while removing and rewinding the liner. Perfect for: multi-opening mats; small wooden frames and much more! Features: covered gears to minimize applicator jams; transparent cover that shows remaining tape; and it holds up to 60 yards of Scotch Adhesive Transfer tape (not included). This package contains one Adhesive Applicator (9x 8-1/2x1-1/2in) and instructions for use. This applicator uses 1/2in or 3/4in wide ATG transfer tape only. Imported.

product.title: Bench Hook 300 x 400mm
product.product_body: Keep your work steady with these sturdy Bench Hooks. Simply place on the edge of your desk or work surface for tidy, safe working. Adjustable for left or right hand use by simply removing the rails and re-fitting using the pre-drilled holes.

features.feature: Keeps your lino work steady
Ideal for schools and colleges
Provides protection for desks and work surfaces

product.title: Bench Hook 300 x 200mm
product.product_body: Keep your work steady with these sturdy Bench Hooks. Simply place on the edge of your desk or work surface for tidy, safe working. Adjustable for left or right hand use by simply removing the rails and re-fitting using the pre-drilled holes.

features.feature: Keeps your lino work steady
Ideal for schools and colleges
Provides protection for desks and work surfaces

product.title: Safety Hand Guard
product.product_body: This device is an essential safety measure in multi student environments. The natural instinct is to drive a cutting gouge towards the restraining hand holding the work piece, so wehave created a guard that covers the smallest to the more dexterous larger hand, in one item.The guard is held either at the corner of the reliefblock or on top of the carving material close to the area to be cut. Any slippage is caught in theupright walls of the guard protecting the user from harm. An ergonomic, left or right handed, one piece moulding at a price that makes itsinclusion in your tool box and school room a must.

features.feature: Essential safety measure
Left or right handed

product.title: Lino Cutting & Printing Kit
product.product_body: This comprehensive kit includes a wide selection of tools and materials for Lino cutting and printing. You can experiment with artisan printing techniques and compare traditional lino and the new SoftCutTM materials, which add new possibilities for beginners and experienced users alike. The 6 different lino cutters allow varied carving styles, whilst the safety cutter and hand guard ensure safe working for younger or less experienced users. The 3-in-1 Baren is a tool for transfering ink from your lino block to paper, but can also be used as a desk tidy for your cutters and as a stamping tool when used with the included self-adhesive SoftCutTM discs. You can make many prints with the water based ink whilst keeping your work space clean with the handy ink tray. This educational and fun kit is ideal for making unique greeting cards, gifts, posters or even great works of art! Recommended age: 12 and upwards with adult supervision. Contents: 5 x Lino Cutters, Styles 1 to 5 1 x Safety Lino Cutter, Style A 1 x Lino Cutter Handle 1 x Aluminium Ferrule 2 x Linoleum Blocks 7" x 5" / 178 x 127mm 2 x SoftCutTM Blocks 6" x 4" / 150 x 100mm 1 x Practice Piece 1 x Ink Roller (Brayer) 4"/100mm 1 x Ink Tray 9.4" x 7.87" / 240 x 200mm 1 x Safety Hand Guard 1 x Baren Cap 1 x Baren Base 1 x 100ml / 3.3 US fl oz Tube of water based ink 2 x 45mm SoftCutTM Printing Stamps. 1 x Instructions

features.feature: Comprehensive kit includes a wide selection of tools and materials for Lino cutting and printing
6 different lino cutters allow varied carving styles
Safety cutter and hand guard ensure safe working for younger or less
Educational and fun kit is ideal for making unique greeting cards, gifts, posters or even great works of art!
Recommended age: 12 and upwards with adult supervision.

product.title: 3 in 1 Lino cutter & stamp carving kit (10 Cutters & 5 Stamps)
product.product_body: This innovative and versatile stamp carving kit allows you to carve your own SoftCutTM Printing Stamps using Lino cutting tools and techniques for a unique result. Simply pop one of the included printing stamps into the included disc holder, and use the lino cutters and handle to carve your design. The disc holder allows safe and easy manipulation of the printing stamp. Once finished, assemble the Baren by combining the base, lid and handle together. Peel back the protective paper from the printing stamp and apply to the base of the Baren. Ink can be applied using a roller, or by utilising a traditional ink pad. The base of the Baren also doubles as a storage unit for the cutters keeping them safe after use. 10 different cutters and 5 printing stamps.

features.feature: New kit for making your own stamps by carving discs of softcut lino
Carve your design into the discs of softcut material
Great for making Cards, Gifts and all kinds of artwork

product.title: Lino Cutter & Baren Kit 3-in-1 (10 Lino Cutters, Styles 1 to 10)
product.product_body: This innovative and versatile kit can be used as a Lino cutter set with the included Lino cutters and handle, and also as a Baren which is used asa burnishing tool to transfer the ink from your printing block to your paper without the need for a press. The base of the Baren also doubles as a storage unit for the cutters keeping them safeafter use. 10 different cutters this patented set is a true innovation in block printing. The 3 in 1 Baren kit can also be used as a stamp carving kit with the addition of SoftCutTM printing stamps. (Sold Separately)

features.feature: Baren box set includes our excellent new burnishing tool (baren)
10 precision cutters in styles 1 to 10
Sturdy lino cutter handle with expandable collar for easy fitting and tightening
Baren provides internal storage for the cutters, creating a clean and convenient lino tool set

product.title: 3 in 1 Lino Cutter & Stamp Carving Kit (5 Cutters & 2 Stamps)
product.product_body: This innovative and versatile stamp carving kit allows you to carve your own SoftCutTM Printing Stamps using Lino cutting tools and techniques for a unique result. Simply pop one of the included printing stamps into the included disc holder, and use the lino cutters and handle to carve your design. The disc holder allows safe and easy manipulation of the printing stamp. Once finished, assemble the Baren by combining the base, lid and handle together. Peel back theprotective paper from the printing stamp and apply to the base of the Baren. Ink can be applied using a roller, or by utilising a traditional ink pad. The base of the Baren also doubles as a storage unit for the cutters keepingthem safe after use. Available with either 5 or 10different cutters and 2 or 5 printing stamps.

features.feature: New kit for making your own stamps by carving discs of softcut lino
Carve your design into the discs of softcut material
Great for making Cards, Gifts and all kinds of artwork.

The baseof the Baren also doubles as a storage unit for the cutters keeping them safe after use. 5 of our precision cutters in styles 1 to 5
Sturdy lino cutter handle with expandable collar for easy fitting and tightening

product.title: Set of Lino Cutters No.1 to 10 and Handle
product.product_body: This box set includes 10 of our precision cutters in styles 1 to 10, and a sturdy lino cutter handle with expandable collar for easy fitting and tightening. 10 precision ground Linocutters manufactured from highcarbonsteel together with a sturdy polypropylene handle and aluminium ferrule which allows easy fitting and tightening of the cutters. An ideal setfor classrooms.

features.feature: This box set includes 10 of our precision cutters in styles 1 to 10
Handle with expandable collar for easy fitting
An ideal set for classrooms

product.title: Set of Lino Cutters No.1 to 5 and Handle
product.product_body: This box set includes 5 of our precision cutters in styles 1 to 5, and a sturdy lino cutter handle with expandable collar for easy fitting and tighteningManufactured from highcarbon steel together with a sturdy polypropylene handle and aluminium ferrule which allows easy fitting andtightening of the cutters. features.feature: Includes 5 of our precision cutters in styles 1 to 5
Handle with expandable collar for easy fitting and tightening

product.title: Lino Handles (Box of 12)
product.product_body: These sturdy lino cutter handles come complete with an expandable collar which allows the cutters to be fitted and tightened with ease

features.feature: Sturdy lino cutter handles
Complete with an expandable collar
Fitted and tightened with ease

product.title: Safety Lino Cutter (box 12)
product.product_body: Safety Cutter. Made to the same exacting standards as our normal cutters, this is a new concept in lino cutting. The specially designed 'wings' allow safe cutting to an exact depth, providing a consistent, clean-cut line every time. Perfect for the younger or inexperienced user.

features.feature: Especially designed 'wings' allow safe cutting to an exact depth
Perfect for the younger or inexperienced user

product.title: Lino Cutter No. 10 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 10 Cutter. Same as number nine but with a wider "vee" shape and a more rounded base to produce lines up to 3.5mm wide. As a number nine cutter, a very easy action.

features.feature: Wider "vee" shape and a more rounded base to produce lines up to 3.5mm wide
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No. 9 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 9 Cutter. A deep "vee" cutter for narrow lines gives good results in lino but care needed not to go too deep, has a very easy action in tougher materials.

features.feature: A deep "vee" cutter for narrow lines
Very easy action in tougher materials
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No. 8 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 8 Cutter. A wide and deep cutter able to cut up to 6mm wide. Care is needed not to go too deep but a favourite tool of the experienced lino cutter for bold pieces of work.

features.feature: A wide and deep cutter able to cut up to 6mm wide
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No. 7 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 7 Cutter. A flat bottomed wide cutter with safety edges each side. Use the unground sides to prevent shaving the edge of a previously cut line and to remove a 3mm (0.120") wide flat trough or tidy up unwanted cut lines in the design background.

features.feature: A flat bottomed wide cutter with safety edges each side
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 6 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 6 Cutter. A flat radius cutter for shallow, wide cuts or for shaving at a side wall to reduce the printed area and leave a strong shallow angle. A clever trick is to use this cutter vertically spun between the fingers to cut a 4mm circle in SoftCutTM (or less with practice) which is useful for the centre of eyes, with either the centre part left to print or the centre removed.

features.feature: A flat radius cutter for shallow, wide cuts
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 5 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 5 Cutter. A thin line marking tool for making the first lines to define the design before using other cutters to remove the unwanted background. It can be pushed or dragged across the surface and turned very easily to describe curves and wavy lines. Cut deep into the lino or SoftCutTM to define the limit of material removal particularly useful with SoftCutTM as the material can cling at the end of a cut.

features.feature: A thin line marking tool for making the first lines to define the design before using other cutters
Can be pushed or dragged across the surface and turned very easily to describe curves and wavy lines
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 4 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 4 Cutter. A wide, rounded bottom "vee" cutter for lines 3mm wide with 45˚ walls for strength of print surface particularly important for fragile detail and unsupported straight lines such as a narrow tree branch with large open spaces each side in lino. A fast remover of material.

features.feature: A wide, rounded bottom "vee" cutter for lines 3mm wide with 45˚ walls
Important for fragile detail and unsupported straight lines
A fast remover of material
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 3 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 3 Cutter. A tight, round cutter able to cut a 2mm deep sided line where needed. Great in straight lines, but more difficult to turn. Great in SoftCutTM but cut too deep in lino and the upright walls of the cut can leave little support and weaken the top surface. With practice, it's useful for cutting small circles by using a swivel motion.

features.feature: A tight, round cutter able to cut a 2mm deep sided line where needed.
Great in straight lines, but more difficult to turn
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: Lino Cutter No 2 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 2 Cutter A universal and easy to use tool with a low angle of attack. Commonly used as a basic first time tool to cut lines up to 1.5mm(0.060") or less.

features.feature: A universal and easy to use tool with a low angle of attack
Commonly used as a basic first time tool to cut lines up to 1.5mm (0.060") or less
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: EssDee Lino Cutter No 1 (Box of 12)
product.product_body: No. 1 Cutter For fine lines and cross hatching. Use at a steep angle and push forward with light pressure being sure not to go deep. Never try to plunge any cutter deeper than the ground sides of the point. With practice, a line of 0.5mm (0.020") or less is possible in SoftCutTM material and a littlewider in Lino. Care is needed when inking up over lines this fine as it is easy to push the ink into shallow lines with a soft brayer (lino roller).

features.feature: No. 1 Cutter For fine lines and cross hatching
Manufactured from high-carbon steel, these durable and long-lasting cutters are precision ground to an optimum angle providing effortless lino cutting

product.title: 3M SandBlaster Sandpaper Abrasive Sheets Assorted P60, P100 &P180 Pk 3
product.product_body: When you have sanding and prep work to do, 3M offers a wide range of high performance sandpapers, flexible abrasives, sanding sponges and tools. Select the best sanding tool for the task and you will have less work on your hands, with supreme results. SandBlasterTM Sandpaper is coated with mineral and features an advanced, durable backing material that resists tearing, for a satisfying day's work.3M SandBlasterTM Sandpaper can be used on a wide range of surfaces including paint, wood, metal, plastic, filler and fibreglass. This evenly coated sandpaper resists clogging and tearing - when dust builds up, simply knock it off the abrasive surface and carry on! These sheets of sandpaper can be used by hand, or with sanding blocks or machine sanders. When compared to conventional alternatives of comparable grits, SandBlaster Sandpaper cuts up to three times faster, stays sharp and delivers a smoother, long-lasting finish.This pack contains 3 different grades of SandBlaster Sandpaper, each cut into a long-lasting sheet which measures 230 mm x 280 mm. The coarse grit P60 sheet is perfect for paint-stripping; the medium grit P100 sheet is your go-to for levelling bare surfaces; and the fine grit P180 sheet is ideal for a smooth finish or between coats of paint or varnish. To make hand sanding easier, why not try the 3M Rubber Sanding Block? Simply attach a piece of SandBlaster Sandpaper to the heavyweight block for an improved grip, extra power and better sanding control.Material: Aluminium Oxide. It is recommended that a suitable respirator and safety goggles/glasses are worn during sanding. Sanding lead based paints can be hazardous.SandBlaster Sandpaper: Less work. Cuts fast. Lasts long.

features.feature: SandBlaster sandpaper for high performance sanding on any surface
Cuts up to 3 times faster, lasts up to 3 times longer
For hand sanding or use with sanding blocks or machine sanders. Resists clogging.
1 pack of 3 sheets 230 mm x 280 mm (1 x coarse grit p60 , 1 x medium grit p100, 1 x fine grit p180)

product.title: 3MTM ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape 904 1 Roll (6mm x 25m)
product.product_body: If you're keen on craft and card-making and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, they make for cleaner, more accurate crafting. Simply insert your chosen tape into the ATG Gun, press the trigger and away you go. Our general purpose Adhesive Transfer Tape is perfect for bonding to paper and card. It creates thinner bond lines with a uniform thickness, giving you a more professional finish. Whether you're sticking paper, card, tissue, cloth, glitter or sequins, this tape works for so many hobby and craft needs! Ideal for detailed embellishments on cards, invitations and other stationery, it also makes adding inserts quicker and more efficient, without the seeping or wrinkling you can get with traditional glue. Strong and durable, it holds even heavy card and lasts well - great when you're making keepsakes and gifts that people want to treasure or frame. Say goodbye to fiddly double-sided tape - when used with the Scotch ATG Adhesive Tape Applicator Gun, the liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

features.feature: Great For Card-Making, Scrapbooking And Stationery
Quick And Mess-Free Application
For Use With Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun
Prices are per roll

product.title: 3MTM ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape 969 19 mm x 33 m 1 Roll
product.product_body: If you're keen on craft and textile design and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, they make for cleaner, more accurate projects. Simply insert your chosen tape into the Applicator Gun, press the trigger and away you go.Our Adhesive Transfer Tape for plastics, rubbers, leather and textiles is a more heavy-duty adhesive suitable for bonding and mounting fabrics, plastics and more weighty textiles. When used with the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, the 19 mm adhesive tape creates thin, uniform bond lines for clean, accurate sticking that holds securely.Whether you're creating a wall collage for a school project, or ditching the sewing machine and customising your fabrics the easy way, using the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun makes things so much simpler. The adhesive comes out in neat, clean lines with no seeping or wrinkling, and none of the safety issues of a hot glue gun.Strong and durable, it holds well even on heavier textiles, so there's no worrying about your creation falling apart or fabric peeling off when it dries. Even better, when using the ATG Gun, there's no fiddling around with backing tape as the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

features.feature: Great for craft, card-making, projects and textile design
Adheres plastic, rubber and leather
Quick and mess-free application

product.title: 928 ATG Tape (Repositionable): 1/2 in. x 36 yds. (White)
product.product_body: *Acrylic adhesive 1000 is ultra low tack allowing removal without residue from may films, foils, papers *Low tack adhesive is ideal for applications where repositioning is desired *Adhesive is reverse wound on 1" cores for use in Scotch(R) ATG dispensers

product.title: Scotch® ATG Applicator Gun Adaptor for 6 mm (1/4") width ATG tape
product.product_body: Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun. So simple to use, it features a finger trigger that allows you to release a straight, controlled application of adhesive tape while automatically removing the backing liner, so no fiddling afterwards. For more accurate creations using thinner, 6 mm width Adhesive Transfer Tape, you'll need to affix this ATG Applicator Gun Adaptor. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, it's time to show off your creative flair. And when it's detailed crafting that requires thinner adhesive tape, all you need to do is slot this adaptor into your ATG gun, choose your 6 mm wide tape and away you go. Popular with craft bloggers and professional stationery makers, the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun and Adaptor make intricate and delicate designs less fiddly, for quicker, cleaner and more satisfying projects. ATG Applicator Gun and Adhesive Tape NOT included.

product.title: 3MTM ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape 924 Paper, Films & Fabrics 12 mmx55 m (1/2"x60yd) 1 Roll
product.product_body: If you're keen on craft and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun, they make for cleaner, more accurate crafting. Simply insert your chosen tape into the Applicator Gun, press the trigger and away you go.Our Adhesive Transfer Tape for paper, films and fabrics is suitable not just for paper and card, but also for textiles. When used with the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun and Scotch ATG Applicator Gun Adaptor for 6 mm widths, the 6 mm adhesive tape creates thin, uniform bond lines for clean, accurate sticking that holds fast. This tape size offers a thinner adhesive lines.Whether you're attaching a lace border to an invitation or a fabric flower to a greetings card, using the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun makes things so much quicker and neater, and the tape doesn't create the seeping or wrinkling that you can get with traditional glue.Strong and durable, it holds well even on heavier textiles, and you can be assured it will last - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure. Even better, when using the ATG Gun, there's no fiddling around with backing tape as the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

product.product_body: .25X36 Yards 2/Pkg3MScotch Advanced Tape Glider Susan G. Komen For the Cure Pink. The Scotch ATG applies a thin; strong line of adhesive that bonds instantly and goes on easily while removing and rewinding the liner. Perfect for scrapbooking; cardmaking and other paper projects. product.title: Scotch 085-R ATG Advanced Tape Glider Refill Rolls, 1/4-Inch by 36-Yard, 2-Rolls/Box by 3M - Craft Supplies
product.product_body: ATG Tape Refills - Home Crafts Made Easy Make all your arts and crafts projects easier with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider and Refill Rolls. These rolls fit easily into the glider to allow for a quick, controlled application of adhesive in neat, thin lines, giving you a mess-free, professional finish. Whether you're card-making, scrapbooking, mounting photographs or making stationery, our General Purpose Tape covers all your crafting needs. Using the Advanced Tape Glider makes your projects quicker, cleaner and more satisfying. Rather than traditional glue, which can seep and wrinkle, the tape leaves flat, neat lines. The adhesive liner is removed as you stick, too, saving your time and patience! Strong and durable, our General Purpose Tape is great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out, yellow or peel and can be used on all sorts of textiles - an excellent addition to your crafting toolbox. For use with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider, sold separately.

Scotch Advanced Tape Glider Acid-Free Refills 2/Pkg
product.product_body: If you're keen on craft and scrapbooking and like to work mess-free, you'll love our range of adhesive tapes. For use with the Scotch® Advanced Tape Glider, these Acid Free Refill Rolls make for cleaner, more accurate and photo-safe crafting. Simply insert your tape into the Glider, press the trigger and get sticking! Our Acid-Free Tape is just what you need if you're mounting photographs onto card or updating scrapbooks or albums. The tape has been designed so that you don't have to worry about damaging your precious snapshots, as it causes no discolouration or fading. Whether you're attaching your photographs to paper, card or albums, using the Scotch Advanced Tape Glider makes things so much quicker and neater, and the tape doesn't cause the seeping or wrinkling that you can get with traditional glue. Strong and durable, you can be assured it will last - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page, and the liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

product.title: ALUMINIUM CRAFT ROLLER (50mm)
product.product_body: Size Name: 50mmWith its hard polished surface, these Bright Surface Aluminium rollers are used to roll out many hobby or difficult materials, including silicon rubber, air hardening clays and simple Plasticine, leaving the other hand free to control the varying processes.Designed for high levels of applied pressure, this clean roller is more universal in use and more resistant to chemical attack than acrylic plastic.

product.title: SOFT RUBBER LINO INK ROLLER (50mm)
product.product_body: Size Name: 50mmA soft compound EPDM at 40 shore. Resistant to printers chemicals and not ffected by exposure to daylight, this is a long life product. This brayer is designed to give a more compliant coverage than hard rubber material. More forgiving on uneven surfaces , proving to be a favourite with certain printing methods but needing extra care in storage to prevent indentation to its soft surface. Especially developed for relief printing.These high quality rollers, with their distinctive blue handles, have a higher ink capacity. They are made to the same exacting standards as our standard rollers, but have a soft, 40 shore rubber surface for the easy, smooth and fine application of ink. Manufactured from durable polypropylene with self lubricating nylon bearings, robust constuction, EPDM rubber, hanging slot, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. These versatile rollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than lino-printing.

product.title: DELUXE INK ROLLER/BRAYER 300mm
product.product_body: These high quality deluxe rollers, with their distinctive black handles, have a higher ink capacity. They are made to the same exacting standards as our standard rollers, but have a full-ground, concentric rolling surface for the smooth and fine application of ink. Manufactured from durable polypropylene with self lubricating nylon bearings, robust constuction, EPDM rubber, hanging slot, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. These versatile rollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than lino-printing.With a hand-ground surface of over 122mm (4.5"), this perfectly smooth heavy-weight roller holds a greater quantity of ink than our standard range allowing greater coverage and perfect results every time.A hand-ground concentric EPDM rubber surface is a medium hard 60 shore and gives excellent pickup and deposit of all types of ink.This tool is the choice for the artisan printmaker with good recovery to indentation, and resistance to common printing chemicals.Perfect for printmaking, applying self adhesive film/vinyl, wood engraving and woodcut.

product.title: Deluxe Lino Roller 150mm
product.product_body: These high quality deluxe rollers, with their distinctive black handles, have a higher ink capacity. They are made to the same exacting standards as our standard rollers, but have a full-ground, concentric rolling surface for the smooth and fine application of ink. Manufactured from durable polypropylene with self lubricating nylon bearings, robust constuction, EPDM rubber, hanging slot, aluminium core and a continuous steel shaft. These versatile rollers can be used for a variety of purposes other than lino-printing.With a hand-ground surface of over 122mm (4.5"), this perfectly smooth heavy-weight roller holds a greater quantity of ink than our standard range allowing greater coverage and perfect results every time.A hand-ground concentric EPDM rubber surface is a medium hard 60 shore and gives excellent pickup and deposit of all types of ink.This tool is the choice for the artisan printmaker with good recovery to indentation, and resistance to common printing chemicals.Perfect for printmaking, applying self adhesive film/vinyl, wood engraving and woodcut.

product.title: Bellelli B-Travel Bike Trailer With Urban Stroller Kit, Current Version
product.product_body: IMPROVEMENTS IN THE NEW B-TAXI VERSIONWheels have been moved back.The wheels are now better vertically lined up with the children's baricenter, thus improving the weightsdistribution and reducing the weight burdening on the bike. This change brings many positive effects, suchas a better handiness and a higher stability during the braking and the movement in curve.The safety belts have been attached to the frame- before they were sewn on the sitting/back textile .This evolution considerably increases the safety of the system which is directly attached to the plastic baseand to the steel arch holding the cover.Parking brakeWe have introduced a brake that can easily be operated on by foot. The baby trailer is much more stable andsafe both when parked and when babies accede and get off.Closing system modified.We have introduced a second safety mechanism on both sides of the baby trailer, reducing the risk ofpossible wrong operations of parents.HomologationThe baby trailer will soon get the certification according the most recent European norm EN15918. It will beone of the first baby trailers on the market being certified according to this norm.CoverThe accessibility has been improved thanks to the new textile, more airy and bright.Back caseWe have added a piece of textile to better cover the case and protect it from bad weather.Stroller functionThe baby trailer can be also used as stroller: we have developed a kit (included) composed by a front wheel (withlocking and unlocking system very easy, simple and fast) and a handle, to allow the easily shift to this otherfunction.

features.feature: Exclusive, patented plastic base, protects against rocks and mud, exclusively patented by bellelli.
5 point harness, for 1 or 2 children. Wide openings on front and roof
Mult-layer canopy: retractable sunshade, protective mesh and transparent weather cover
20'' wheels with quick release system. Easy to use parking brake Large rear pocket.
Quickly and easily foldable Urban Stroller conversion kit, with 12'' swivelling wheel and handle.

product.title: 3MTM PeltorTM SportTacTM Shooting Ear Muffs Headband
product.product_body: • Developed specifically for hunters and marksmen • Smooth level dependent function, which eliminates abrupt sound cut-off • Interchangable shells make it easy to change colour • Equipped with automatic shut-off function • Collapsible for easy storage'★★★★★ ★★★★★ 5 out of 5 stars.Anonymous· 10 months agoI've used many different types of ear defender thoughout both my military service and civilian employment. I've used ear plugs of all kinds, normal ear muffs and a number of electronic ear muffs.But the Peltor Sportac Electronic's are the BEST I have ever come across. all of the other electronic models I've used when shooting etc, tend to shut off when the shot is taken, then come back on again a second or two later. The Sportac cuts out the damaging high frequency, but still lets you hear what's going on around you.My wife and I both have a pair and we both agree that the only thing we'll be buying in the future, are replacement batteries and hygene kits.In the words of Tina Turner they're, "Simply the Best", what more is there left to say ??? - Baz P, K'

product.title: 3M 80611211568 35 Scotch Electrical Colour Coding Tape, Vinyl, 19 mm x 20 m, Red
product.product_body: 3M Scotch 35 Tape is a superb quality colour coding tape with excellent electrical insulating properties. The tape functions specifically well at colder temperatures and with its elasticated memory properties it dramatically outperforms cheaper alternatives. Scotch 35 vinyl electrical colour coding tape is used in phase identification, colour coding leads and piping systems and for marking safety areas. This tape is abrasion and weather-resistant, with excellent mechanical and electrical insulation properties that wraps smoothly and holds tight over a wide range of temperatures. UL Listed and CSA Certified, and is flame-retardant. Excellent all-weather performance in cold to -18(degree)C or hot to 105(degree)C.

product.title: 3M Scotch Electricians Duct Tape, 2-Inch By 50-Yard
product.product_body: 3M Scotch 2000 gray insulating tape comes in a 2 in width, uses a rubber adhesive and is packaged 12 rolls per case. Can be used to a maximum temperature of +221 F. One of the unique features of this insulating tape is the elongation capabilities. The 3M Scotch 2000 insulating tape can be stretched 100 % for breaking. Provides a tensile strength of 12 lb/in. Many tape products can have either conductive or insulting properties which are used across a variety of applications. This insulating tape is electrically insulating. This product is a single-sided adhesive insulating tape. When purchasing this product, consider the thickness. The variances in thickness often make an important difference in proper performance. This insulating tape has a 6 mil thickness.

product.title: 3M MP160 Pocket Projector
product.product_body: Manufacturer's DescriptionShare your favourite movies, make business presentations, or project photo slideshows virtually anywhere with the 3M PocketProjector MP160. Ideal for mobile professionals and proud parents alike, this palm-sized, versatile projector lets you display crisp images of up to 80 inches from the digital content on your laptop, digital camera, DVD player, smartphone, gaming console, and more. Two hours of battery life and a consistent light output ensure dependable, professional projections and presentations every time. SVGA resolution and 32 lumens of brightness provide crisp images. (View larger) Project Presentations, Movies, Photos, and More 3M PocketProjector MP160 At a Glance: Pocket-sized projector for mobile presentations and sharing photos on the go SVGA-resolution for crisp images Projects up to 80-inch screen size 32 lumens of brightness Built-in 3/4-watt speakers Compatible with some smartphones, laptops, game consoles, and more With the PocketProjector MP160, you won't have to gather around a small phone screen or a difficult-to-read laptop in order to share your digital content. And you can keep your cumbersome office projector back at the office where it belongs. Weighing a mere 300 grams and measuring a compact 150x65x30.5 mm (L x W x H), this versatile projector can be carried comfortably in a bag or pocket and fits in the palm of your hand. It connects to a wide range of devices via the included VGA and composite video cables for native high-resolution projections of up to 800 by 600 pixels. The MP160 can also support SVGA, XGA and WXGA resolution in a 4:3 aspect ratio. The MP160 allows you to instantly project your media content with plug and play simplicity. The dependable MP160, plug and play simplicity (View larger) Share Your Digital Media Virtually Anywhere The MP160 is not only ideal for business presentations, but it is also handy for family gatherings or movies with friends. All you need is a flat surface to project videos, photo slideshows, web sites, and more from your smartphone, laptop, digital camera, DVD player, or other digital device. The MP160 arrives with VGA and composite video cables to ensure you can quickly begin sharing your media. The MP160 can also be connected to Apple products via an adapter cable (sold separately). Boasting twice the lumens of its predecessor, the MP160's display remains consistently bright--even when you're running the device on its lithium-ion polymer battery. A full two hours of battery life increases the projector's versatility, and even when those batteries are getting low you can always rely on the MP160 to maintain the same level of brightness. The included mains charger with different country adapters is ideal for frequent travellers. (View larger) Features Built-In Speakers and Audio Out The MP160 comes equipped with two built-in 3/4-watt speakers that produce robust sound for enjoying music, movies, and videos. It also features audio out, so you can take advantage of headphones or additional speakers via a generic 3.5mm audio jack. The device's intuitive buttons couldn't be easier to operate, a simple on/off function, volume controls with mute option, and a battery life indicator. The MP160 also features a flip stand intuitively built in to the base of the unit, offering a stable height adjustment, while the universal 6.35mm tripod socket allows the user to manipulate height with the 3M tripod supplied, or utilise compatible tripods and security locks. Compatibility and Warranty Information The MP160 is compatible with DVD players, digital camcorders, digital cameras, gaming consoles, laptops, tablets, PCs, smartphones and portable media players. Based on smartphone capability, the MP160 can make the small screen of your phone large and easy to show to groups. Be sure to test with your phones, as some manufacturers block content out of phones, while older devices (such as previous generations of BlackBerry) do not have a video- or TV-out and can therefore not be connected to the MP160. The 3M PocketProjector MP160 is backed by a one-year limited warranty. What's in the Box MP160 Projector, Lithium-Ion Polymer Battery, Mains Charger with AC Adapter (UK, US, EU, AUS), VGA Cable, Composite Video Cable, 3 x RCA Female to Female Adapters, Tripod, Soft Carry Pouch, Quick Start Guide, Product Safety Guide. 3M PocketProjector MP160 Pocket-sized projector for mobile presentations and sharing photos on the go SVGA-resolution for crisp images Projects up to 80-inch screen size 32 lumens of brightness Built-in 3/4-watt speakers

product.title: Filtrete FAPF01/02 Ultra Clean Small Air Purifier Replacement Filter - For Filtrete Air Purifier Model: FAP01 and FAP02 - 1 Filter
product.product_body: Package Quantity: 1 | Colour: WhiteProduct Description3M recommends you change the filter of your Filtrete Room Air Purifier after three months of continuous use to ensure the particles removed during filtration are not returned to the environment during cleaning, ensure the electrostatic benefits of the filter are maintained and maintain its effectiveness. Filtrete Air Purifiers are a new and intelligent solution from the name that delivers cleaner indoor air. They offer an unrivalled combination of low noise, high Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) and value for money and are up to 30% more effective than an equivalent HEPA filter. Filtrete Room Air Purifiers use patented technology that has enabled 3M to produce a less dense filter than equivalent HEPA filters. This means dramatically more air can pass through a Filtrete Room Air Purifer and the result is much quicker circulation and cleaning of the air. Most permanent and washable filters quickly lose their electrostatic properties through washing and clogging. By using replacable filters, Filtrete air purifiers deliver the enhanced filtration of a electrostatic filter on a sustained basis. Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) is a measure of an air cleaner's delivery of particle-free air and is calculated through independent laboratory tests. The CADR indicates volume of filtered air delivered by an air purifier: the higher the tobacco smoke, pollen and dust numbers, the faster the unit filters the air. Filtrete purifiers are up to 99.9% effective at removing pollen, dust mite debris and mould spores from the air and use patented filter technology that allows more air to pass through the purifier. As a result, allergens are removed more quickly.Box Contains1 x Small Air Purifier Replacement Filter

This tape has been designed so that you don't have to worry about damaging your precious snapshots, as it leaves no discoloration and won't cause fading. The adhesive tape creates thin bond lines with a uniform thickness, for clean, accurate sticking. This tape size offers a slightly wider adhesive line compared to the 12 mm x 55 mm roll.Whether you're attaching your photographs to paper, card or albums, using the Scotch ATG Adhesive Transfer Tape Applicator Gun makes things so much quicker and neater, and the tape doesn't create the seeping or wrinkling that you can get with traditional glue.Strong and durable, it holds well and you can be assured it will last - great when you're making keepsakes that people will want to treasure or frame. The adhesive won't dry out and make your photos slip from the page. Even better, when using the ATG Gun, there's no fiddling around, as the adhesive liner is removed as you stick, saving your time and patience!

product.product_body: 3M Boat Polish - Restore Marine Plastic Clarity Water and weather can cause clear marine plastics to become dull and discoloured. Without maintenance, they can let down the overall appearance of your boat. The 3M range of boat cleaning products is designed specifically for the harsh marine environment, helping you to clean and extend the life of these materials, inside and out. Designed to safely remove fine scratches and haziness, 3M Marine Clear Plastic Restorer & Polish restores clarity to most marine plastic surfaces and is ideal for windshields and hatches.Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.This pack contains 1 x 250 ml bottle of 3M Marine Clear Plastic Restorer & Polish. Suitable for use on most tinted plastics; test for suitability in an inconspicuous area first. For best results on polycarbonate plastic, use with a machine.

features.feature: Safely removes fine scratches and haziness from marine plastics
Restores clarity to windshields and hatches
Improves the overall appearance of your boat
Suitable for most tinted plastics

product.title: 3MTM Marine Metal Restorer And Polish 500 ml Can
product.product_body: 3M Marine Metal Restorer & Polish has a light abrasive formulation that cleans, restores and polishes metal components in a single step. Designed to perform in harsh marine environments, it is suitable for use on interior and exterior stainless steel, brass, bronze, copper, chrome and other marine metals. Apply it by hand to remove rust, corrosion, oxidation and tarnish from fixings, window surrounds, railings and other bright work - and restore your boat's original lustre.This pack contains 1 x 500 ml can of 3M Marine Metal Restorer & Polish. For best results apply by hand with a soft cloth.Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: Cleans and restores marine metal components in one step
Removes rust, corrosion and tarnish
Restores original lustre
Suitable for interior and exterior use

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM Marine Ultra Performance Paste Wax
product.product_body: When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Ultra Performance Paste Wax is a professional product with exceptional coverage that goes on easily and polishes off quickly, saving you time and effort. Its unique polymer technology combines the durability of acrylic with the soil-release and water-beading properties of silicone - so you get a deep shine that protects against UV damage for longer. Less time waxing, more time boating.This pack contains 1 x 269g can of 3M Marine Ultra Performance Paste Boat Wax.Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: High performance, professional boat wax
Carnauba wax base for long-lasting protection against uv damage
Leaves a high gloss finish on gel coats, painted and metal parts
Easy on, easy off formula with exceptional coverage

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM Marine Fibreglass Restorer and Wax (1 litre)
product.product_body: Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water. When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax is a dual action product that removes imperfections like medium oxidisation, rust, corrosion, chalking, fading, scratches and exhaust stains to restore shine in half the time. This unique blend of rubbing compound and waxes is suitable for use on all fibreglass and gel coat repairs, where it leaves behind a hard coat of wax that protects surfaces from further damage caused by sunlight, salt water and pollutants. With 3M Marine Fibreglass Restorer & Wax you combine two restoration steps into one - saving you money and leaving you more time to enjoy your boat. Ensure you read the safety data sheet before use http://multimedia.3m.com/mws/mediawebserver?mwsId=SSSSSuUn_zu8lzNvl82xM8tePv70k17zHvu9lxtD7SSSSSS--

Ideal for fibreglass repair, gel coat restoration and general boat detailing

One step restores shine and protects from further damage

product.title: ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface, 25.4mm x 54.8m (2080EL-24E) - 1 roll
product.product_body: Product DescriptionScotchBlue Painter’s Tape gives you the opportunity to achieve a high quality, decorator’s finish to your project – without having to call in the professionals! Traditional masking tape products can leave messy edges and sticky, torn pieces of tape to ruin the effect of your hard work: This ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape features a flat backing, meaning that it sticks smoothly and securely but can be removed cleanly up to 60 days later with no residue or surface damage. It is UV/sunlight resistant so ideal for use on window frames. In addition, ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface features a 3M proprietary technology called Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector, which repels paint away from the edge of the tape to give you super sharp lines with no bleed-through or seepage underneath.ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface is perfect for everyone from DIY painters to commercial and residential professionals. Its low- to medium-adhesion means that it can be applied to freshly painted areas (24 hours old) and other delicate substrates; its flat backing allows for a super sharp line on smooth surfaces – great for design features, accent walls and stripes. What’s more, this tape can be removed cleanly, with no surface damage, up to 60 days later: perfect for longer-term projects or those that require work over several weekends. For easy identification, it now has the ScotchBlue logo and product number printed in orange on the tape itself. You’ll be able to find it easily in a drawer or tool box and know what you're choosing and using. This pack contains 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter’s Tape Advanced Delicate Surface. The roll is 25.4mm wide and 54.8m long.Get the edge you deserve with ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface with Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector – for brilliant looks and unlimited ways to transform your space.ScotchBlue and Edge-Lock are trademarks of 3M Company.Box Contains1 x 1 roll of ScotchBlue Painter's Tape

product.title: 3M 2080EL-2N Scotch Safe-Release With Edge-Lock Painter's Masking Tape
product.product_body: ScotchBlue Advanced Delicate Surface Paint Tape with EdgeLock is the number one selling painter's tape in America for a reason. It's the original blue tape that do-it-yourself painters and pros have loved for more than 20 years. Now this legendary tape is even better! ScotchBlue Painter's Tape Advanced Delicate Surface with Edge-Lock features a 3M proprietary treatment called Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector. It provides extra insurance to achieve super sharp paint lines. This remarkable tape now has the ScotchBlue logo and product number printed in green, right on the tape so you can find it easily in a drawer or tool box and know what you're choosing and using.ScotchBlue Delicate Surface Paint Tape with EdgeLock:Ideal for freshly painted surfaces (24 hours old) and other delicate substratesDelivers sharp paint linesRemoves cleanly with no residueDoes not cause surface damageApplies quickly and easilyComes off the roll easilyPrinted backing (logo and product number)60 day clean removalUV resistantLow-medium adhesion5.1cm x 60 yard

Includes lozenge shaped parts for door edges

product.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7-inch for Kids - (includes Bumper Cover and Carry Case )
product.product_body: Product DescriptionWith a bright, easy-to-use interface, kid-friendly app store, and durable case, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids is the ideal tablet for your kids' digital playing and learning time. Preloaded with top-ranked apps for kids, the lightweight Galaxy Tab 3 Kids also features a built-in camera and parental controls for access and time limits. It transforms from kid to standard mode so you can enjoy the same familiar features as a regular Galaxy Tab 3.Interactive Kids Mode for playing and learningKids' Store with fun, top-ranked appsParental controls to manage access and set time limitsDurable design withstands daily drops and spillsStandard mode offers features of regular Galaxy Tab 3Fast processor; 7-inch HD display; 8GB memoryFun and Interactive Kids Mode is Easy to UseThe Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids features a kid-centric interface with bright colours and animated characters to make playing and learning more fun for your little one. Each app appears as a card that your child can select by simply tapping. Kids can personalise their play by adding their name, choosing a character to guide them, and changing the background.The Galaxy Tab 3 Kids has a brilliant 7-inch display, with HD 1024x600 resolution, so text is clearer and colours are brighter. The powerful 1.2 GHz dual-core processor makes it ideal for downloading apps and games, and watching your favorite movies.Kids' Store Full of Child-Friendly AppsSamsung's Kids' Store is filled with top apps for learning and playing. The kid-friendly apps are organised by category, so your kids can browse apps based on their preferences. Instead of buying, kids add each app to a wish list that can be accessed through parental controls, letting you choose which ones to purchase.Not only will you have full control over what apps your kids buy and explore, you can also choose your own Google Play apps to add to the Kids Mode by simply checking off those apps in Application Manager. Add Skype if you want to let them video chat with Grandma, or add video apps like Netflix.Easy Camera Lets Your Kid Be the PhotographerThe built-in camera is specially designed for kids to take pictures and shoot videos. They can use the 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera for silly faces, or flip it around to capture their surroundings with the 3-megapixel rear camera. Virtual stickers let them play pretend and dress up their pictures with different features and accessories. Kids Gallery and Kids Video store all their photos and videos so they can revisit their favorite shots. Parental control mode lets you access their work in your gallery and share with other relatives.Parental Controls Keep Kids SafeThe Galaxy Tab 3 Kids includes features just for parents, so you can hand over the tablet with peace of mind. A secure password entry gives you access to parental controls that let you set time restrictions on their usage, control what they view, and choose which apps you want to purchase. Durable Case Holds Up against Drops and Spills The drop-tested bump case is tough enough to withstand daily drops and spills. The soft cover is CPSC certified as a nontoxic material, so it's safe if your teething toddler gets hold of it. Lightweight, Compact Design for Little HandsThe lightweight, 7-inch design makes the Galaxy Tab 3 Kids ideal for little hands. It weighs less than 1lb, so it's easy for little ones to hold in their car seat or for you to carry in your purse or nappy bag.Easily Switch to Familiar Galaxy Tab 3 Home ScreenThe Galaxy Tab 3 Kids allows you to easily switch from Kids Mode to standard mode, giving you access to the same interface and features of the regular Galaxy Tab 3. Both modes can coexist, so you can switch back and forth without losing content. This makes it easy for parents to stream videos and music, read e-books, or browse up to 750,000 apps from Google Play before switching back to Kids Mode.Product InformationThis tablet comes installed with Android 4.1.2, Jelly Bean, contains a 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, and has a 7-inch display with 1024x600 resolution, a 1.3-megapixel front-facing camera, and a 3-megapixel rear-facing camera. It also comes with 8GB of internal memory and features a microSD card slot (microSD card sold separately) that allows you to add up to 32GB of additional memory. The tablet measures 7.4 by 4.37 by 0.39 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.67lbs including the battery. Up to 7 hours battery life.Box ContainsSamsung Galaxy Tab 3 Kids Bumper CaseMicro USB ChargerQuick Start GuideWarranty Information

product.title: Photographic Print to Alu-Dibond Dibond Traffic (120 x 80 cms)
product.product_body: Size: 120 x 80 cmsHigh quality print to film applied to Dibond Traffic, CNC routered with either square or radius corners, you send us your photo, we send you a proof, confirm design, fixings, size, matt or gloss finish, then it go's into production. Fixing options are standard being locators and locator cups supplied with fitting template, chrome stand off's with stand off head showing on face.

features.feature: High Quality Print to Dibond Traffic Panel.
For Internal or External Use
Dibond Traffic is highest grade they make, carries a 12 year warranty for external use even in coastal area's where salt in the air significantly increases degradation
Over laminated in gloss or matt finish for extra UV and Abrasion protection

Only EU origin, high quality materials used, Genuine Dibond whereas a lot of people say they use Dibond but in fact use cheap sub standard chinese aluminium composites instead. Dibond is made by 3A Composites who will confirm we are approved users.

Avery Dennison Prismatic High Reflective Conspicuity Tape, For Rigid Surfaces, V-6701B Euro CT Yellow, 3 metres by 50mm
product.product_body: Many accidents are avoidable if the driver of the other vehicle had only been able to detect the truck. Reflective contour markings on trucks make detection easy, giving drivers time to see a vehicle, react and avoid a collision. In fact, NHTSA studies demonstrate 41 percent reduction in side and rear trailer impact when using conspicuity tape. Avery Dennison V-6700B Series Conspicuity Tape provides superior reflectivity and may help reduce accidents, prevent injuries and can decrease related costs such as repairs, insurance expenses and fees.

features.feature: Avery Dennison® V-6701B Series Conspicuity Tape meets the stringent requirements of the ECE 104, Class C regulation.
Designed for use on trucks and trailers with rigid surfaces, V-6700B provides superior reflectivity and enhanced nighttime safety.
It is a high quality, durable, microprismatic retroreflective material with a pressure sensitive adhesive. As with all our products it is of full EU origin, china is barred at SignLine.
The single layer construction does not require edge sealing.
50.8mm x 3m Strips, Available in Red, White and Yellow, Rolls available too.

product.title: Carbon Effect Cast Wrap Film from SignLine.
product.product_body: A high grade of film, very nice carbon effect, gloss finish.If you bought 5000 metres of this branded, EU origin film, you would still be paying twice as much per metre than what BESTWAYTOYOU are saying they can sell it for. Fraudulent listing by BESTWAY. If you want to pass all our wealth to China buying sub standard materials then there are many (the majority) of other sellers for you. If you want High grades of branded materials of EU origin and are willing to pay the price for a clear conscience, then you are the clients we are here for and have been since 1994.If you covered the whole of China, The UK & The USA with trees & let them grow to maturity over 25+ years &never cut them down, you wouldn't neutralise even one year's worth of pollution buying products from China.Morally & ethically we cannot justify it here at SignLine regardless of any monetary savings, there is no monetary saving that justifies the destruction of the environment of our planet and all the life that it supports.Therefore we do not supply any materials manufactured in the far east from undemocratic countries, that have few human rights and absolutely no animal welfare, skinning animals like cats and dogs while they are still alive, and they remain alive afterwards too, if only for a short, painful time, or the same countries that do not have to meet all the stringent regulations and standards to protect consumers and the environment as we have to do in the UK and the rest of Europe.China accounts for 95% of all elephant poaching, slaughtered for their ivory, a recent haul in Africa of ivory bound for China contained the tusks of over 700 elephants, with all the wealth transferred to China based on their cheap prices the Chinese are now building in Africa and living there too, accelerating the demise of our planets largest land mammal and it's environment.

features.feature: A True Wrap Film
Gloss Finish
Highly Conformable
Better than Di-Noc for Intricate Shapes
High Grade Cast Film, EU Origin.

product.title: Avery Dennison Conspicuity Tape, For Flexible Surfaces, V-6772 B Red
product.product_body: Many accidents are avoidable if the driver of the other vehicle had only been able to detect the truck. Reflective contour markings on trucks make detection easy, giving drivers time to see a vehicle, react and avoid a collision. In fact, NHTSA studies demonstrate 41 percent reduction in side and rear trailer impact when using conspicuity tape. Avery Dennison V-6700B Series Conspicuity Tape provides superior reflectivity and may help reduce accidents, prevent injuries and can decrease related costs such as repairs, insurance expenses and fees.

features.feature: Avery Dennison® V-6750B Series Conspicuity Tape meets the stringent requirements of the ECE 104, Class C regulation.
Designed for use on PVC curtain sided vehicles, V-6750B provides superior reflectivity and enhanced night time safety.
It is a high quality, durable, microprismatic retro reflective material with a pressure sensitive adhesive.
The single layer construction does not require edge sealing.
50.8mm x 50m Rolls, Available in Red, White and Yellow

product.product_body: Pet Cross For Pet Graves, Cross 785mm x 263mm, digital print applied to rear of 3mm Perspex cross, bonded to aluminium composite cross using Avery VHB tape, black post made from recycled materials 50mm x 50mm x 850mm.We cut the acrylic cross, apply the self adhesive print of the text and background colour, we fit the Dibond cross to the RP Post with countersunk fixings, we then use Avery vhb tape to fix the Perspex cross to the Dibond cross and to cover the screws, the product is then ready to install into ground which we recommend using post mix for.

features.feature: Pet Cross, you can have as little or as much wording as you like.
785mm x 265mm, Will outlast wooden versions by years without any of the maintenance.
You order, we wait until we receive your wording, we set a design and send to you for approval, once approved we manufacture the cross and despatch, then we take payment.
Made from high grade materials, gold text is 10 Year Avery 900QM Supercast High Metallic gold film, face cross is 3mm Perspex, base cross is 3mm Dibond aluminium composite.
The text is behind the Perspex cross, totally sealed in and made to be long term, I made one for my boy so now offer the same to all.

product.title: Boat Wax - 3MTM ScotchgardTM Marine Protective Liquid Wax
product.product_body: When your boat is on dry land, it's the perfect time to clean and compound the hull to remove oxidisation, polish for a deep gloss and then rub in a protective coating of boat wax. ScotchgardTM Marine Protective Liquid Wax has an easy-on, easy-off formula that is quick and simple to apply. Suitable for use on marine fibreglass and gel coat, marine topside paints, painted aluminium and metal parts, the liquid bonds to surfaces to create a durable protective coating that reduces UV light damage, whilst also producing a deep shine with no swirl marks. Tests show that it is 33% more durable than other leading brands after 39 days - and this long-lasting formulation means less time waxing, more time boating. This pack contains 1 x 500 ml bottle of ScotchgardTM Marine Protective Liquid Boat Wax. It can be applied by hand with a soft cloth or using a mechanical buffer. For best results, apply to small areas at a time. Whether you are restoring a boat or just trying to maintain its shine, gently navigating canals or sail boat racing, our chandlery supplies can help you achieve a high quality, professional finish quickly - leaving you more time to get out on the water.

features.feature: Liquid boat wax for a durable, high gloss finish
Protects against damage from sunlight, salt water and pollutants
Easy on, easy off formula is quick to apply
Suitable for use on marine fibreglass, gel coat, topside paints, painted aluminium and metal parts

product.title: Apple iPhone 4 and iPhone 4s Screen Protection Film Set For Screen and for the Back, Paint Protection Film as Used by Us to Protect Aston Martins to Fiestas from Stone Chips, NOT the cheap acetate type that lasts 5 mins!
product.product_body: Apple iPhone 4 and iPhone 4s Protection Film For Front and Back, Paint Protection Film as Used by Us to Protect car paintwork on Aston Martins to Fiestas from Stone Chips, NOT the cheap acetate type that lasts 5 mins! A very high grade of protective film, overkill for this application so very protective, easy to clean with a quick wipe with polish for a nice glossy screen. Buy 6 cheap acetate type over and over, or buy the right film for the right job off the bat!

features.feature: 150 micron Paint Protection Film Suitable for use on cars to protect from stone chips.
Can vastly reduce any damage from strikes on the screen or bodywork
The kit on the phone in the photo's has been on for 3 months, no problems.
Thicker and softer film than the thin acetate type which are popular but have a very short life.
Easy to apply to your phone, easy to remove.
